MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「おかわりはどうですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Would you like seconds?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Would you like seconds?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いただきます…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, yes please...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, yes please...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「どんどん食べていいからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝Eat to your heart's content.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝Eat to your heart's content.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとうございます…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は箸でご飯を口に運んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I carried some rice to my mouth with my chopsticks.
MESSAGE.Translation: I carried some rice to my mouth with my chopsticks.

MESSAGE.JP: 前のとき同様、よく味がわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like before, I couldn't really taste anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like before, I couldn't really taste anything.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「そういえば葉留佳、最近学園のほうはどう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Now then, Haruka, how's school been lately?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Now then, Haruka, how's school been lately?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「テストが終わっても気を抜くんじゃないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝Don't slack off just because the tests are over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝Don't slack off just because the tests are over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「そうそう、お父さんの言うとおりよ。頑張ってね、葉留佳」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝That's right, just as your father says. Give it your best 'til the end, Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝That's right, just as your father says. Give it your best 'til the end, Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「予習復習もしっかりやるんだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝Make sure you're studying properly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝Make sure you're studying properly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは無言だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san kept silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san kept silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「お友達とは上手くやってる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Have you been making lots of friends?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Have you been making lots of friends?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「寮の隣部屋の子に迷惑掛けるんじゃないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝Don't make any trouble for your neighbors in the dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝Don't make any trouble for your neighbors in the dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「大丈夫よ、葉留佳なら。ねぇ葉留佳？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝It's fine, this is Haruka we're talking about. Right, Haruka?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝It's fine, this is Haruka we're talking about. Right, Haruka?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「そうか、ならいいんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝I see, well that's fine then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝I see, well that's fine then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あのね、おなじかいわして、たのしい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Um, is it fun, saying the same things over and over?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Um, is it fun, saying the same things over and over?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 目の前に座っている大人二人は、箸をおいて黙った。
MESSAGE.EN: The two adults sitting before us put their chopsticks down and fell silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two adults sitting before us put their chopsticks down and fell silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「楽しいの？　ねぇ、こんなことしてて、まんぞく？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Is it fun? Hey, does doing this satisfy some base need?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Is it fun? Hey, does doing this satisfy some base need?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「お山の家（さいぐさのいえ）では食事のときは静かにしなさいって教わったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Back at the Saigusa house I was taught to be silent when eating.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Back at the Saigusa house I was taught to be silent when eating.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私がね、くちをひらこうとするとね、スプーンであたま、叩かれるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If I even so much as opened my mouth, they'd smack my head with a spoon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If I even so much as opened my mouth, they'd smack my head with a spoon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おもいっきり何度もね、叩くんだよ。いたいっていってもいけないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They hit me as many times as they wanted. I wasn't even allowed to say it hurt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They hit me as many times as they wanted. I wasn't even allowed to say it hurt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いったらね、どんどん回数ふえるからね、だからね黙ってたべないといけないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If I said it hurt, they'd hit me even more, so I kept quiet through it all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If I said it hurt, they'd hit me even more, so I kept quiet through it all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ねぇ、楽しい？　楽しい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...So, is this fun for you? Is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...So, is this fun for you? Is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「楽しいわよ、葉留佳」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Of course it is, Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Of course it is, Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「あぁ、楽しんでる…私たちは、楽しんでる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝We enjoy talking with you... Of course we do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝We enjoy talking with you... Of course we do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは右手に持っていた茶碗をいきなり壁に投げ付けた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san suddenly flung her bowl against the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san suddenly flung her bowl against the wall.

MESSAGE.JP: がしゃん！
MESSAGE.EN: *Ka-chink*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Ka-chink*!

MESSAGE.JP: がたん、と椅子から立ち上がった葉留佳さんはテーブルクロスを引っ張った。
MESSAGE.EN: She then leaped to her feet and grabbed the tablecloth, pulling it with all her might.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then leaped to her feet and grabbed the tablecloth, pulling it with all her might.

MESSAGE.JP: ガシャガシャ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Crash*! *Smash*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Crash*! *Smash*!

MESSAGE.JP: 食器も、グラスも、調味料も、花瓶も散乱する。
MESSAGE.EN: Utensils, glassware, plates, and the neat flower vase all crashed onto the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Utensils, glassware, plates, and the neat flower vase all crashed onto the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「楽しい!?　楽しいの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Fun!? Is this fun!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Fun!? Is this fun!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「これが？　こんなのが？　これのどこが!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝This? This!? What about this is enjoyable!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝This? This!? What about this is enjoyable!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こんなの、私、楽しくない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well I don't enjoy it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well I don't enjoy it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんってば！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Come on, Haruka-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Come on, Haruka-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「帰る！　私、こんなとこ、いたくない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm going home! I can't stand this!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm going home! I can't stand this!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「………」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「どこへ帰るの？　葉留佳」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Where will you go ❛home❜ to? Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Where will you go ❛home❜ to? Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんのお母さんの呟くような問いかけ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's mother murmured the question softly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's mother murmured the question softly.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それ…は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That... it's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That... it's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そんなの…それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I'll... I'll go...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I'll... I'll go...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言葉に詰まった葉留佳さんは唇を噛みしめている。
MESSAGE.EN: Unable to think of a reply, Haruka-san bit her lip.
MESSAGE.Translation: Unable to think of a reply, Haruka-san bit her lip.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「…少なくとも…わたしは、あなたを叩いたりしない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝...At the very least, I would never, ever lay a hand on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝...At the very least, I would never, ever lay a hand on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「関係ないじゃんっ！　放っておいてよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's got nothing to do with it! Leave me alone!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's got nothing to do with it! Leave me alone!❞

MESSAGE.JP: がたん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Clatter*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clatter*.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは椅子を蹴倒すと、ダイニングルームを出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san kicked her chair over and then left the dining room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san kicked her chair over and then left the dining room.

MESSAGE.JP: 慌てて後を追う。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurriedly chased after her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurriedly chased after her.

MESSAGE.JP: ばたん！　ドアの音。
MESSAGE.EN: *Slam*! I heard a door shut.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Slam*! I heard a door shut.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Outside...!?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Outside...!?)

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…葉留佳さん…どこに行っちゃったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Haruka-san... where did she go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Haruka-san... where did she go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: あたりをぐるっと回ってみても、葉留佳さんはみつからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I ran around looking for her, but Haruka-san was nowhere to be found.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ran around looking for her, but Haruka-san was nowhere to be found.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「両親がいる生活って…食卓ってああいうものなのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Having parents... I wonder if that's how a normal dinner is supposed to go...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Having parents... I wonder if that's how a normal dinner is supposed to go...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 道ばたで僕は呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I muttered that as I made my way back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I muttered that as I made my way back.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「葉留佳は見つかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Did you find Haruka?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Did you find Haruka?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いえ、見つかりませんでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I didn't see her anywhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I didn't see her anywhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声に振り返ると、葉留佳さんの両親が立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Turning to face the direction of the voice, I found Haruka-san's parents both standing there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Turning to face the direction of the voice, I found Haruka-san's parents both standing there.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「…ごめんなさいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝...I'm very sorry about this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝...I'm very sorry about this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうして謝るんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why should you apologize?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why should you apologize?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「私たちも、あの子にどうしてあげたらいいのか、わからないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝To be honest, we really don't know how to deal with that child.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝To be honest, we really don't know how to deal with that child.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: だって葉留佳さんの親じゃないですか、あなたたちは。
MESSAGE.EN: But aren't you her parents?
MESSAGE.Translation: But aren't you her parents?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それに…あんな会話を、楽しいと言うのは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You... said that kind of conversation is fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You... said that kind of conversation is fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんの様子を見れば、そんなわけはないと思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you look at Haruka-san, you can tell that's not true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you look at Haruka-san, you can tell that's not true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「…もしも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝...Maybe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝...Maybe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「楽しいかと、訊かれて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝She'd always ask us if it's fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝She'd always ask us if it's fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「一度でも『楽しくない』と答えたら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝If even once I'd said ❛No,❜ then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝If even once I'd said ❛No,❜ then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「…あの子は、どう考えるだろうか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝...just what is that girl thinking?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝...just what is that girl thinking?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …葉留佳さんのことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This is Haruka-san we're talking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is Haruka-san we're talking about.

MESSAGE.JP: 楽しくない、と言われたことに傷つくのは想像できた。
MESSAGE.EN: I can imagine she'd have been hurt if they said it wasn't fun.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can imagine she'd have been hurt if they said it wasn't fun.

MESSAGE.JP: 『じゃ話さない』と意地をはって拒むだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She'd assume an attitude of ❝Then let's not talk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd assume an attitude of ❝Then let's not talk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、ますます会話は冷えていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: Then the conversation would just get colder and colder...
MESSAGE.Translation: Then the conversation would just get colder and colder...

MESSAGE.JP: 悲しいことに…このひとたちは、葉留佳さんが変わらない限り。
MESSAGE.EN: These people would keep up this sad routine as long as Haruka-san didn't change.
MESSAGE.Translation: These people would keep up this sad routine as long as Haruka-san didn't change.

MESSAGE.JP: この冷えた会話を続けなければならない。
MESSAGE.EN: These cold conversations had to continue.
MESSAGE.Translation: These cold conversations had to continue.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが、心を許すその日まで。
MESSAGE.EN: Until the day Haruka-san trusted them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Until the day Haruka-san trusted them.

MESSAGE.JP: こんな食卓でも『楽しい』と、言い続けなければならなかったのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: They had to keep sitting around the dinner table and saying it was ❝fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: They had to keep sitting around the dinner table and saying it was ❝fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どんなあたたかい言葉も、全てを憎んでいる葉留佳さんは受け止めることが出来ない。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san, who hates everything, can't accept even warm words.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san, who hates everything, can't accept even warm words.

MESSAGE.JP: 『楽しい』からこうしている、という言葉は、蜘蛛の糸。
MESSAGE.EN: This kind of ❝fun❞ is a spider's thread to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: This kind of ❝fun❞ is a spider's thread to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 細い今にもちぎれそうな糸なのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: A fine thread that seems like it could break at any moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: A fine thread that seems like it could break at any moment.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「あの子と一緒にいるだけで、幸せなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝We're happy just being with her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝We're happy just being with her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「けれど…あの子にとってはそうではない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝But... it seems she doesn't feel the same way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝But... it seems she doesn't feel the same way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「わかっているから、虚ろな会話を繰り返す」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝We realize that, so we keep having these empty conversations.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝We realize that, so we keep having these empty conversations.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「表面すら取り繕えなくなったら、本当に終わってしまう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝If we can't even successfully pretend, than I guess it's really over...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝If we can't even successfully pretend, than I guess it's really over...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「気まずさを感じても一緒にいたいと願うだけしかできない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝All we can do is wish to be with her even if it is awkward.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝All we can do is wish to be with her even if it is awkward.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「あの子が恨むのも当然だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝It's only natural for her to hold a grudge.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝It's only natural for her to hold a grudge.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「私たちは、あの子を助けにいってやれなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝After all, we weren't there to help her when she most needed it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝After all, we weren't there to help her when she most needed it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ――ひどい話だった。本当に、ひどい話だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ――The entire thing was a horrible business. A horrible, miserable story.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――The entire thing was a horrible business. A horrible, miserable story.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰だ、こんな状況を作ったのは。
MESSAGE.EN: Who the hell was responsible for this terrible state of affairs?
MESSAGE.Translation: Who the hell was responsible for this terrible state of affairs?

MESSAGE.JP: 誰なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Just who?
MESSAGE.Translation: Just who?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…葉留佳さんが…その…もうひとりの父親と、あなたの娘だということは本当なんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san is... um... She's the daughter of you and another man, isn't she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san is... um... She's the daughter of you and another man, isn't she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「………」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 目の前の大人二人は答えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Neither of them answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Neither of them answered.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんも知らないみたいです。どうして教えてあげないんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It looks like even Haruka-san doesn't know. Why haven't you told her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It looks like even Haruka-san doesn't know. Why haven't you told her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「君に、それを話すことは、出来ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝I can't explain that, not to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝I can't explain that, not to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なぜです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「…それは『私たち』の問題だからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝...Because it's ❛our❜ problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝...Because it's ❛our❜ problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「勝手な言いぐさだと思うだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝You may think that's a selfish excuse.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝You may think that's a selfish excuse.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「私も、そう思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝In fact I think so, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝In fact I think so, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なら、話してあげてもいいじゃないですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, why not just tell me about it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, why not just tell me about it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…葉留佳さんはあなたの娘ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Is Haruka-san your daughter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Is Haruka-san your daughter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「言えない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝I can't say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝I can't say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…葉留佳さんはあなたの娘ではないのですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Then is she not your daughter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Then is she not your daughter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「言えない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝I can't say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝I can't say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうして！　葉留佳さんはあなたたちの子供じゃないんですか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why! Isn't Haruka-san your child!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why! Isn't Haruka-san your child!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あなたなら、全て証明できるはずじゃないですか！　ＤＮＡ鑑定でも、何でも！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You should be the ones able to prove everything! Get a DNA test or something!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You should be the ones able to prove everything! Get a DNA test or something!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…父親のあなたなら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...If you're her father...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...If you're her father...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「私の口からは…何も言えない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝Those words... can't come from my mouth.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝Those words... can't come from my mouth.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …父親は頑なだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Her father was adamant about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Her father was adamant about it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんは、あなたたちの子供じゃないんですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is Haruka-san... not your child...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is Haruka-san... not your child...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 怒りとも失望ともわからない声が、僕の口から漏れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know if the voice that I spoke in was filled with anger or despair.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know if the voice that I spoke in was filled with anger or despair.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「私の娘よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝She's my daughter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝She's my daughter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…だったらなぜ…なぜなんです！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Then why, why!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Then why, why!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「娘だから、言えないのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝It's because she's my daughter, that I can't say it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝It's because she's my daughter, that I can't say it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「言えないの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝I can't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝I can't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 大人たちは俯いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Both parents hung their heads.
MESSAGE.Translation: Both parents hung their heads.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（どうしてなんだ…どうしたらいいんだ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(What should I do... What can I do?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(What should I do... What can I do?)

MESSAGE.JP: 苛立ちというより焦りに近い感情を抱えながら学校にとりあえず戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Full of frustration, more than anger, I made my way back to the school.
MESSAGE.Translation: Full of frustration, more than anger, I made my way back to the school.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 幽鬼のように立ちつくす人影。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood there, looking like a ghost.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood there, looking like a ghost.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ねぇ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Hey, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Hey, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、探したんだよ。いきなり出て行って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, I was looking for you. You just took off...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, I was looking for you. You just took off...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「調べてみようと思うの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I want to do some research.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I want to do some research.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　調べるって、何を？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What? Research? Research on what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What? Research? Research on what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 唐突過ぎて話が見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: She said it so suddenly I had no idea what she was talking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said it so suddenly I had no idea what she was talking about.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が『どっち』なのかを」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝On 'which one' I am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝On 'which one' I am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今まで、そう言われてきたけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝All this time they've told me what they thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝All this time they've told me what they thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、証拠見せられたことない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But I've never seen any proof.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But I've never seen any proof.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから、調べようと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So I thought I should find out for myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So I thought I should find out for myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「知らないまま、このままでいるなんて…もう、耐えられない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝To go on like this, not knowing the truth... I can't stand it anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝To go on like this, not knowing the truth... I can't stand it anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が『ハズレ』だったのかどうか、知りたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I have to know whether or not I'm the ❛wrong one.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I have to know whether or not I'm the ❛wrong one.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、葉留佳さん…もしも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, Haruka-san... what if...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, Haruka-san... what if...❞

MESSAGE.JP: もしも、自分が『ハズレ』だったらどうするのか？
MESSAGE.EN: If she really was the ❛wrong one,❜ what would she do?
MESSAGE.Translation: If she really was the ❛wrong one,❜ what would she do?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…それならそれでいい。諦め、つくもん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...If that's how it is, that's how it is. I've already resigned myself to that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...If that's how it is, that's how it is. I've already resigned myself to that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もっとはやく調べればよかったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I really should have tried to find out sooner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I really should have tried to find out sooner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あいつのこと…昔の…束…信じてたせいだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I only didn't because I believed in her... thought she'd keep the... mise...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I only didn't because I believed in her... thought she'd keep the... mise...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 俯いて何かぼそぼそと喋っていた葉留佳さんは顔を上げ僕に言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san hung her head, muttering to herself, then she looked up and spoke to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san hung her head, muttering to herself, then she looked up and spoke to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも、あいつがビラ撒いたんだからいいよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But, then she had to go and spread those flyers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But, then she had to go and spread those flyers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、調べてもいいよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So now it's fine for me to find this out, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So now it's fine for me to find this out, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは僕に訊ねてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was asking for my opinion.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was asking for my opinion.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ダメだよ…そんなことしても何も解決しない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think that's good... Just finding that out won't resolve anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think that's good... Just finding that out won't resolve anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは無言だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「止めようよ、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's just stop this, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's just stop this, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: これ以上葉留佳さんが傷つくのは見たくなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't want Haruka-san to be hurt any more than she already had been.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't want Haruka-san to be hurt any more than she already had been.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんが、そういうなら、止める」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If Riki-kun says so, I'll stop.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If Riki-kun says so, I'll stop.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、それがいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, it's better that way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, it's better that way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃまた明日、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright, see you tomorrow, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright, see you tomorrow, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん。ばいばい、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah. Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah. Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は葉留佳さんが頷いてくれたので安心した。
MESSAGE.EN: Seeing Haruka-san nod made me relax a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seeing Haruka-san nod made me relax a little.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮へ戻る道すがら、振り返ると、葉留佳さんはまだ僕を見送っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I walked away, back toward the dorms, I looked back over my shoulder. Haruka-san was watching me go.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I walked away, back toward the dorms, I looked back over my shoulder. Haruka-san was watching me go.

MESSAGE.JP: 翌日からも、教室での葉留佳さんの噂は、やむ事はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The next day in class, the rumors about Haruka-san still hadn't died out.
MESSAGE.Translation: The next day in class, the rumors about Haruka-san still hadn't died out.

MESSAGE.JP: …時間が経てばやがて忘れられる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...They'd forget it all, with time.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...They'd forget it all, with time.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな、希望的観測じみたことを考える事しか、僕にはできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Unfortunately, I knew that was just my wishful thinking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Unfortunately, I knew that was just my wishful thinking.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん。いいと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah. I think that's a fine idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah. I think that's a fine idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕も手伝うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll help you out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll help you out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ありがと、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Thanks, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Thanks, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃ、明日から調査開始だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Then, we'll start our research tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Then, we'll start our research tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかった。また明日ね、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I got it. I'll see you tomorrow, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I got it. I'll see you tomorrow, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん、ばいばい、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah, bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah, bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は葉留佳さんに手を振って歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I waved to Haruka-san, then left.
MESSAGE.Translation: I waved to Haruka-san, then left.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮へ戻る道すがら、振り返ると、葉留佳さんはまだ僕を見送っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I walked away, back toward the dorms, I looked back over my shoulder. Haruka-san was watching me go.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I walked away, back toward the dorms, I looked back over my shoulder. Haruka-san was watching me go.

MESSAGE.JP: ジュースを買いに行った休み時間。
MESSAGE.EN: During break time, I headed down to buy some juice.
MESSAGE.Translation: During break time, I headed down to buy some juice.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（あ、葉留佳さんだ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Ah, it's Haruka-san.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Ah, it's Haruka-san.)

MESSAGE.JP: 『廊下を走るな！　風紀委』というポスターを直している葉留佳さんを見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was fixing up a poster that read ❛No running in the halls! - The disciplinary committee.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was fixing up a poster that read ❛No running in the halls! - The disciplinary committee.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こんにちは、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hello, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hello, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうかしたのこれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What're you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What're you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ポスターが破られてたからさ、直してたとこ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The poster was torn, so I'm fixing it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The poster was torn, so I'm fixing it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなんだ…直してるとこ見つかったら…二木さんに怒られない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see... so you're fixing it... Won't Futaki-san get mad?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see... so you're fixing it... Won't Futaki-san get mad?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん？　あぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hm? Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hm? Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは右手に持った赤ペンをくるくる回しながら頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san nodded as she spun the red pen she was holding around in the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san nodded as she spun the red pen she was holding around in the air.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「気にしないよ。破れてるのはみっともないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Don't worry about it. It'd be a shame to leave it looking like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Don't worry about it. It'd be a shame to leave it looking like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それもそっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess that's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess that's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちが話していると、生徒たちがひそひそ話をしながら通り過ぎた。
MESSAGE.EN: As we talked with each other, several students passed by, whispering to each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: As we talked with each other, several students passed by, whispering to each other.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…噂、相変わらずだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Looks like the rumor mill hasn't let up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Looks like the rumor mill hasn't let up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それも気にしない気にしない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Don't worry about that either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Don't worry about that either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 赤ペンをポケットにしまった葉留佳さんは小さく笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san returned the red marker to her pocket and gave a little smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san returned the red marker to her pocket and gave a little smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝See you, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝See you, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。また放課後」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. See you after school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. See you after school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は葉留佳さんと別れた。
MESSAGE.EN: We went our separate ways.
MESSAGE.Translation: We went our separate ways.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんと落ち合った場所は学食だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san and I met up in the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san and I met up in the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんとの調査開始だ。
MESSAGE.EN: There, we began our research.
MESSAGE.Translation: There, we began our research.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さっきはお疲れさま」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Good work earlier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Good work earlier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん？　うん、それより理樹くん、私、考えてたんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Huh? Oh yeah, anyway, Riki-kun, I've been thinking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Huh? Oh yeah, anyway, Riki-kun, I've been thinking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「まぁ私はあまり頭よくないので、ちょっと手こずったケド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, I'm not really that smart, so I had some trouble, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, I'm not really that smart, so I had some trouble, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やりかたはわかったから用紙とか揃えてみたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I figured out the process and brought the forms we need.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I figured out the process and brought the forms we need.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは僕の台詞を遮るようにまくしたてた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san spoke quickly, cutting me off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san spoke quickly, cutting me off.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと待って葉留佳さん。どういうこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W, wait a second, Haruka-san. What are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W, wait a second, Haruka-san. What are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あのね、とりあえず、戸籍の写しをみてみようと思うんだけど、どうかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, to start with, I was thinking of getting a copy of the family register. What do you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, to start with, I was thinking of getting a copy of the family register. What do you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あぁ…なるほどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah... that sounds good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah... that sounds good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「住民票は見たことあるけど、戸籍は確かにあんまりみない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I've seen a certificate of residence once, but I've never browsed through any official family records.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I've seen a certificate of residence once, but I've never browsed through any official family records.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん。産まれた当時、二人を調べたあと分けて登録してあるのかもしれないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah. If we take a look at the time around my birth date, between the two of us we should be able to find the right record.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah. If we take a look at the time around my birth date, between the two of us we should be able to find the right record.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「戸籍はどこで取るのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But how do we get our hands on the records?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But how do we get our hands on the records?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ちょっと調べてみたんだけど、郵送申請でもいいらしいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I looked into it, and it looks like you can mail in a request for them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I looked into it, and it looks like you can mail in a request for them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが資料を広げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san showed me the documents she had.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san showed me the documents she had.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「書類を書いて送ればいいんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, so we just send in these documents to request it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, so we just send in these documents to request it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん、そうみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah, looks that way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah, looks that way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは書き始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san started writing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san started writing.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃ出してくるね…近くに郵便ポストってあったっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Alright, now I just need to mail it... Is there a mailbox nearby?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Alright, now I just need to mail it... Is there a mailbox nearby?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…そうだ。校門の近くにあったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... I think. There's one by the school gates.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... I think. There's one by the school gates.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クドが手紙を出しているのを見たことがある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I believe I saw Kud mailing something there once.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I believe I saw Kud mailing something there once.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...At least I felt I had.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...At least I felt I had.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ホント？　そこに出してくる。ちょっと待っててね理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Really? Well then, wait here a bit, Riki-kun. I'll go mail it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Really? Well then, wait here a bit, Riki-kun. I'll go mail it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「行ってきたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ポストあった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Was there a mailbox there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Was there a mailbox there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん、あったよ。ありがと理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep, there was. Thanks, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep, there was. Thanks, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「クド公はどこに出してたのかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wonder where Little Kud was sending her letter to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wonder where Little Kud was sending her letter to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「文通とかしてたんじゃないのかな。海外との」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It looked like she was writing to someone. Overseas correspondence, I think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It looked like she was writing to someone. Overseas correspondence, I think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あぁ。ペンパルってやつか。クド公らしいなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahh. A penpal. That's just like Little Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahh. A penpal. That's just like Little Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「とと、それはおいといて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝O-oops, let's get back to the point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝O-oops, let's get back to the point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「これだけで直ぐわかるとは思えないよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't think we'll be able to uncover the whole truth with just this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't think we'll be able to uncover the whole truth with just this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね…あとは…そうだなぁ、母子手帳とかかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess... next... Ah, we could get the Mother and Child Health Record from after you were born.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess... next... Ah, we could get the Mother and Child Health Record from after you were born.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「母子手帳？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Mother and Child Health Record?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Mother and Child Health Record?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「健康診断とか受けるでしょ？　それの記録用」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, you know, after a child is born and the mom goes in for a checkup with the child? They make a record of the information.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, you know, after a child is born and the mom goes in for a checkup with the child? They make a record of the information.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういうのに何か手がかりがあるかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If we could get our hands on it, there might be something there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If we could get our hands on it, there might be something there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本当なら、親の日記とかがいいんだろうけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: To be honest, an actual diary from her parents would be even better.
MESSAGE.Translation: To be honest, an actual diary from her parents would be even better.

MESSAGE.JP: それこそどこにあるかわからないだろうから。
MESSAGE.EN: Though we had no idea where something like that might be found.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though we had no idea where something like that might be found.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なるほど。理樹くん、さすがですヨ。頭いいなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I see. Good thinking, Riki-kun. You're so smart.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I see. Good thinking, Riki-kun. You're so smart.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…でも数日は家にいけないかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...But I can't go home right now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...But I can't go home right now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あいつが家に行く日が続くから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝'Cuz she's still at home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝'Cuz she's still at home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そうなんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん…だから、誰もいないときにしようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah... so, let's go when no one's there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah... so, let's go when no one's there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そっちのほうが探しやすいし、ね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That way it'll be easier to look around, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That way it'll be easier to look around, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかった。そうしよっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I got it. Let's do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I got it. Let's do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ん…今日はこれでおしまいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Hm... I guess that's all for today, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Hm... I guess that's all for today, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 話し込んでいたのでちょっとお腹が空いたかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: While we were talking I had started growing hungry.
MESSAGE.Translation: While we were talking I had started growing hungry.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「マフィン焼いてきたけど、食べる？　理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I baked some muffins, want some? Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I baked some muffins, want some? Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、食べる食べる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'll have some.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'll have some.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんのマフィン、おいしいから好きだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, your muffins are great, I really like them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, your muffins are great, I really like them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…っ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは頬を染めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san blushed a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san blushed a little.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そ、そんなお世辞言ってもなんにもならないですよーだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝F, flattery won't get you anywhere, you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝F, flattery won't get you anywhere, you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お世辞じゃないよ、本当にそう思ってるんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not flattery, I'm being serious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not flattery, I'm being serious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うー、そ、そう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Uh-, y, you really think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Uh-, y, you really think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「まぁ、誉めてくれるのは嬉しいケド…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝W, well I'm happy if that's the case...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝W, well I'm happy if that's the case...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 照れくさそうな葉留佳さんと二人仲良く、マフィンを食べた。
MESSAGE.EN: And so, despite Haruka-san's embarrassment, we happily shared the muffins.
MESSAGE.Translation: And so, despite Haruka-san's embarrassment, we happily shared the muffins.

MESSAGE.JP: 昼休み。
MESSAGE.EN: Lunch time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Lunch time.

MESSAGE.JP: 中庭を通ると、葉留佳さんに呼び止められた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I was passing through the courtyard, Haruka-san called out to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I was passing through the courtyard, Haruka-san called out to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-ku～n.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-ku～n.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, what's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, what's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 噂を気にしていないのは本当らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like she really wasn't taking too much stress over the rumors.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like she really wasn't taking too much stress over the rumors.

MESSAGE.JP: 人通りの多い中庭のベンチに葉留佳さんは座っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was sitting on a bench in the slightly crowded courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was sitting on a bench in the slightly crowded courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはは、ひなたぼっこ中ですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahaha, just doing some sunbathing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahaha, just doing some sunbathing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか。天気いいものね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. The weather sure is fine today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. The weather sure is fine today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうそう、じゃーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh right, lookie here～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh right, lookie here～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは小さなタッパを取りだした。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san took out a small Tupperware.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san took out a small Tupperware.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「シフォンケーキ焼いてみたの。良かったら食べて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I made some chiffon cake. You can have some if you like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I made some chiffon cake. You can have some if you like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おいしそうだね。とうとう焼けるようになったんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It looks great. So you finally got the recipe down?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It looks great. So you finally got the recipe down?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは首をかしげた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san tilted her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san tilted her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん沢山練習したヨー。ほめてほめてー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep, I practiced it a to～n. Tell me what a good girl I am～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep, I practiced it a to～n. Tell me what a good girl I am～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えらいえらい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh-huh, you're great.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh-huh, you're great.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「さぁどうぞー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, dig in～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, dig in～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はひとつ摘んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I took one of the slices.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took one of the slices.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ん…クリームが生地の中に入ってるんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Mmm... it's kinda creamy inside, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Mmm... it's kinda creamy inside, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 凝ってるなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: It really was well made.
MESSAGE.Translation: It really was well made.

MESSAGE.JP: 生地はふわふわで、喉をすっと通っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: The texture was light, and it slipped down the throat with a velvety feeling.
MESSAGE.Translation: The texture was light, and it slipped down the throat with a velvety feeling.

MESSAGE.JP: クリームの甘さもあってとてもおいしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The sweet cream magnified the overall taste.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sweet cream magnified the overall taste.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうかなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What do you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What do you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おいしいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's great!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's great!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ホント？　良かった！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Really? That's good!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Really? That's good!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「また焼いて持ってくるね。今度は何がいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'll make another one for you sometime. Any requests?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'll make another one for you sometime. Any requests?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どんなのがあるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's on the menu?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's on the menu?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「抹茶とかチーズ入りとか。ジャムのせてもおいしいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, there's green tea flavor or cheese filling. It tastes good with jam on it, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, there's green tea flavor or cheese filling. It tastes good with jam on it, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ジャムも用意してあげようか？　どんなのがいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Should I bring some jam next time? What flavor do you like?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Should I bring some jam next time? What flavor do you like?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ジャム？　うーん、そうだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Jam? Hmm, let's see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Jam? Hmm, let's see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「マーマレードとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe marmalade.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe marmalade.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…マーマレード？　…苦いだけのも多いからあんまりオススメじゃないかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Marmalade? ...That's pretty bitter, I don't know if it'd go too well with the cake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Marmalade? ...That's pretty bitter, I don't know if it'd go too well with the cake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あれ…葉留佳さんの反応はいまいちだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Huh... Haruka-san's response was a little strange.
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh... Haruka-san's response was a little strange.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「甘いほうがおいしいんじゃないかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It'd be better to pick something sweet, wouldn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It'd be better to pick something sweet, wouldn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「イチゴジャムとか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And maybe strawberry?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And maybe strawberry?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「リンゴジャムとかね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Or apple jam.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Or apple jam.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ブルーベリーとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Blueberry, maybe?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Blueberry, maybe?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「甘いほうがおいしいよねきっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm sure it'll go well with some sweet jam.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm sure it'll go well with some sweet jam.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「イチゴジャムとか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe strawberry?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe strawberry?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「リンゴジャムとかね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Or apple jam.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Or apple jam.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん、用意しておくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Alright, I'll get some ready for next time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Alright, I'll get some ready for next time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは空のタッパを手に取ると立ち上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san closed the empty Tupperware and stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san closed the empty Tupperware and stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そろそろ行かなくちゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, I've gotta run.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, I've gotta run.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「予鈴がもうすぐだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, the bell's about to sound.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, the bell's about to sound.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん。またね理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep. See you, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep. See you, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ばいばい、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Bye-bye, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Bye-bye, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は葉留佳さんを見送った。
MESSAGE.EN: I watched Haruka-san leave.
MESSAGE.Translation: I watched Haruka-san leave.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「遅くなってごめんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry I'm late!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry I'm late!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 待ち合わせの時間から少し遅れて葉留佳さんがやってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san showed up a little after when we had agreed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san showed up a little after when we had agreed.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「先生に捕まっちゃってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝One of the teachers nabbed me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝One of the teachers nabbed me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「走っちゃいけませんって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Said I shouldn't be running in the halls.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Said I shouldn't be running in the halls.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは災難だったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's too bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's too bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふわり、と砂糖とバターの甘い匂いがした。
MESSAGE.EN: There was the sweet smell of sugar and butter in the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was the sweet smell of sugar and butter in the air.

MESSAGE.JP: あぁそうか、シフォンケーキ焼いていたからかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, I see, she must've been making chiffon cake...
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, I see, she must've been making chiffon cake...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ひょっとして、匂う？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Can you... smell it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Can you... smell it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、まぁね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, sorta.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, sorta.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは照れくさそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was acting demure.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was acting demure.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「結構頑張って練習してるからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's probably because I've been practicing a lot lately.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's probably because I've been practicing a lot lately.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか。頑張ってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. You've been practicing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. You've been practicing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん、がんばるですヨっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep, I'm doing my best!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep, I'm doing my best!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それはともかく、いこっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, that aside, shall we go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, that aside, shall we go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と葉留佳さんは歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of us left walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of us left walking.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日は、葉留佳さんの家の物置から色々引っ張り出す作業をする予定なのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Today, we had decided to go to Haruka-san's house and dig through the storage shed looking for whatever we could find.
MESSAGE.Translation: Today, we had decided to go to Haruka-san's house and dig through the storage shed looking for whatever we could find.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日は誰もいないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So nobody's home today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So nobody's home today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん。誰もいないよ。はじめよっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep. No one's in. Let's get started.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep. No one's in. Let's get started.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちは軍手をはめると、物置へ向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: Pulling on work gloves, we headed for the storage.
MESSAGE.Translation: Pulling on work gloves, we headed for the storage.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわ、埃っぽい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwah, it's dusty...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwah, it's dusty...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「掃除してないっぽいねぇ、ここ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Looks like no one ever cleans this place...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Looks like no one ever cleans this place...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「家は綺麗だったのにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even though your house is usually spotless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even though your house is usually spotless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「定期的に清掃業者を入れてたからかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, a professional cleaner comes by every once in a while to clean the house.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, a professional cleaner comes by every once in a while to clean the house.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「物置は範囲外だったみたいだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Looks like cleaning the storage isn't in their contract.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Looks like cleaning the storage isn't in their contract.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そこの段ボール箱が怪しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That cardboard over there looks like it might have something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That cardboard over there looks like it might have something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どこ？　これ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where? This one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where? This one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうそう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも何か上に乗ってるなぁ…片付けないとダメか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's something on top of it... we'll have to move that first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's something on top of it... we'll have to move that first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よいしょっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Heave!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Heave!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「お、理樹くんすごーい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh, Riki-kun, you're so strong～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh, Riki-kun, you're so strong～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「さすが男の子っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝How manly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝How manly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんも手伝って、ほら、そこ押さえて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Give me a hand too, Haruka-san. Here, grab that side.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Give me a hand too, Haruka-san. Here, grab that side.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ラジャ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Roger!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Roger!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふーっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whew...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whew...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 腰が痛い。
MESSAGE.EN: My back hurt.
MESSAGE.Translation: My back hurt.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの部屋に段ボール箱をいくつか運ぶころには日が暮れかけていた。
MESSAGE.EN: While I carried cardboard boxes to Haruka-san's room, night had started to fall.
MESSAGE.Translation: While I carried cardboard boxes to Haruka-san's room, night had started to fall.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「開けてー、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Open up～, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Open up～, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 扉を開けると、トレイにグラスを載せた葉留佳さんがいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened the door, and Haruka-san was there holding a tray with glasses.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened the door, and Haruka-san was there holding a tray with glasses.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おつかれさまー、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Good work～, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Good work～, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 麦茶の入ったグラスを受け取って飲み干す。
MESSAGE.EN: I took one of the glasses, which held barley tea, and took a long sip.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took one of the glasses, which held barley tea, and took a long sip.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ぷはっ…よく冷えてるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Pu-haa... ah, it's nice and cold.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Pu-haa... ah, it's nice and cold.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あらかじめ作っておいたからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I had it ready in the fridge beforehand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I had it ready in the fridge beforehand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はい、疲れたときは甘いものってことで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Here, sweet things are good for when you're exhausted.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Here, sweet things are good for when you're exhausted.❞

MESSAGE.JP: トレイの上にはいくつかのカップ・スコーンが載っている。
MESSAGE.EN: The tray also held a few scones.
MESSAGE.Translation: The tray also held a few scones.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ジャムを色々用意したからのっけて食べてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I brought some different jams for them, so try a few.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I brought some different jams for them, so try a few.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「黄色いのがマーマレード、紫なのはブルーベリー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The yellow is marmalade, and the purple is blueberry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The yellow is marmalade, and the purple is blueberry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「赤いのはイチジクで、緑のはキウイかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The red one is strawberry, and the green one is kiwi... I think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The red one is strawberry, and the green one is kiwi... I think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はスコーンにマーマレードを載せて口に入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I spread some marmalade on one of the scones and took a bite.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spread some marmalade on one of the scones and took a bite.

MESSAGE.JP: バターの匂いがしたサクサクスコーンにジャムはよく合った。
MESSAGE.EN: The buttery smell, the crispy texture, and the jam all blended together perfectly.
MESSAGE.Translation: The buttery smell, the crispy texture, and the jam all blended together perfectly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おいしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…って僕、気の効いた言葉思いつかないなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I mean, wow, I've been saying that a lot lately...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I mean, wow, I've been saying that a lot lately...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはは、それでいいよ。それ以上言うのはグルメマンガぐらいだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha, it's fine just saying that. Any more than that belongs in a gourmet manga.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha, it's fine just saying that. Any more than that belongs in a gourmet manga.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はスコーンの焼き方とかを葉留佳さんに訊いたりした。
MESSAGE.EN: After that we talked about Haruka-san's scone recipe, among other things.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that we talked about Haruka-san's scone recipe, among other things.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おいしかった。ごちそうさまー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, that was good. Thanks for the food.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, that was good. Thanks for the food.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hmm-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hmm-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうかしたの…って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's up... hey?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's up... hey?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hmm～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hmm～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは僕の指先を摘むと、ティッシュで拭いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san grabbed my hand and used a tissue to wipe my fingertips.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san grabbed my hand and used a tissue to wipe my fingertips.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よし、きれいになった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There, all clean.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There, all clean.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ありがと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それじゃ負けたら罰ゲームだからねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And now if you lose this, there's gonna be a penalty～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And now if you lose this, there's gonna be a penalty～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 脈絡なく指相撲が始まってしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: And out of nowhere she started thumb-wrestling me...
MESSAGE.Translation: And out of nowhere she started thumb-wrestling me...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えい、とりゃー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ei, take that～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ei, take that～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女の子なんかに負けるはずはない…はずはないんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course there was no way I could lose to a girl... or so I thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course there was no way I could lose to a girl... or so I thought.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「っと、あれ、うわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ha, wait, uwahh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ha, wait, uwahh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 押さえ込まれてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: She effortlessly pinned me down.
MESSAGE.Translation: She effortlessly pinned me down.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「一二三四五六七八九拾（ひふみしごろなはっくじゅー）」
`葉留佳@「勝ちー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I win!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I win!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「負けた…っていうか、今気がついたけど葉留佳さん左利きでしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I lost... Wait, Haruka-san, aren't you supposed to be left-handed?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I lost... Wait, Haruka-san, aren't you supposed to be left-handed?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は利き腕じゃないほうだから弱いに決まっている。
MESSAGE.EN: It was no wonder I'd lost to her, since we'd used our left hands and mine was the nondominant one.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was no wonder I'd lost to her, since we'd used our left hands and mine was the nondominant one.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「勝ちは勝ちだもん。ぶー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A win is a win. Boo～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A win is a win. Boo～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひどっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Meanie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Meanie.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「というわけで罰ゲームー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And with that, let's get to your penalty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And with that, let's get to your penalty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いいけど…僕ができないことはやだよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Fine, but... nothing impossible, alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Fine, but... nothing impossible, alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「大丈夫大丈夫。すぐできるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No worries, no worries. You can do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No worries, no worries. You can do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「しょうがないなぁ…どんなこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nothing for it, then... What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nothing for it, then... What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私をほめてー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Praise me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Praise me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当然お願いも脈絡なかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It definitely wasn't what I had expected.
MESSAGE.Translation: It definitely wasn't what I had expected.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかったよ…なんでもいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright... anything?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright... anything?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんでもいいからほめて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep, just lay it on me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep, just lay it on me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんはえらいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, you're a good kid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, you're a good kid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ホント？　やははー。ほめてほめてー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Really? Yahaha. More, more～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Really? Yahaha. More, more～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えらいえらい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Good girl, good girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Good girl, good girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が頭を撫でると、葉留佳さんは深い安堵のため息をついた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I stroked her head and praised her, Haruka-san let out a deep sigh of relief.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I stroked her head and praised her, Haruka-san let out a deep sigh of relief.

MESSAGE.JP: …学校の話は意図的に避けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...We purposefully avoided talking about school.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...We purposefully avoided talking about school.

MESSAGE.JP: 噂は収まる気配もなく、葉留佳さんは寮でも孤立しているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The rumors weren't letting up at all, and Haruka-san was isolated even within the dorms.
MESSAGE.Translation: The rumors weren't letting up at all, and Haruka-san was isolated even within the dorms.

MESSAGE.JP: さすがの女子寮長もフォローのしようがないほどらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Even the dorm head seemed unable to quell the rumors.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even the dorm head seemed unable to quell the rumors.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんにとって、僕の存在がただひとつの救いになっているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: To Haruka-san, me being there might have been the only relief she had in her life right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: To Haruka-san, me being there might have been the only relief she had in her life right now.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はぁ～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Haa～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Haa～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゆるゆるした表情になった葉留佳さんを見るのはなんだか楽しい。
MESSAGE.EN: Seeing Haruka-san's delighted expression made me feel good too.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seeing Haruka-san's delighted expression made me feel good too.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんは、やさしいなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, you're so nice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, you're so nice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 指をにぎにぎと動かしながら葉留佳さんが呟く。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was twiddling her fingers as she murmured that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was twiddling her fingers as she murmured that.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝How come?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝How come?❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうして？　そのいつもの質問に僕は答えをもう用意してる。
MESSAGE.EN: Why? I had already learned the answer to that question.
MESSAGE.Translation: Why? I had already learned the answer to that question.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんが好きだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because I like you, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because I like you, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Aha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Aha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはまたゆるゆるの笑顔を浮かべた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san made another delighted expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san made another delighted expression.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはは…理樹くんはやっぱりやさしいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha... Riki-kun, you really are nice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha... Riki-kun, you really are nice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「キス…しよっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Do you want to... kiss?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Do you want to... kiss?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「な、なにいきなり！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-what, all of a sudden!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-what, all of a sudden!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いつものことじゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝This is how I always act, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝This is how I always act, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 脈絡ないよっ、と言おうとした台詞を先回りされる。
MESSAGE.EN: I started responding before her nonsensical response had really sunk in.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started responding before her nonsensical response had really sunk in.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、それもそうか…ってそうじゃなくって！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I, I guess it... Wait, no it isn't!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I, I guess it... Wait, no it isn't!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いや？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Don't wanna?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Don't wanna?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は首を振る。
MESSAGE.EN: That wasn't it, I shook my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: That wasn't it, I shook my head.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃあ、しよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Then, let's do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Then, let's do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そっと顔を近づけて。
MESSAGE.EN: Slowly, I leaned my face toward hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: Slowly, I leaned my face toward hers.

MESSAGE.JP: ちゅ。
MESSAGE.EN: Chu.
MESSAGE.Translation: Chu.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Nn...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Nn...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちょんと唇をあわすだけのキス。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a kiss light as a feather.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a kiss light as a feather.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ふふっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Hehe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Hehe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ど、どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ファーストキスはマーマレード味なのでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝My first kiss tasted like marmalade.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝My first kiss tasted like marmalade.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは、ぴ、と左の人差し指で自分の唇を押さえる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san softly touched her lips with her left index finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san softly touched her lips with her left index finger.

MESSAGE.JP: 思わず僕は赤面する。
MESSAGE.EN: I blushed unconsciously.
MESSAGE.Translation: I blushed unconsciously.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはは、理樹くん、顔真っ赤だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha, Riki-kun, you're all red.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha, Riki-kun, you're all red.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「は、葉留佳さんこそ、真っ赤じゃないっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H, Haruka-san too, you're blushing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H, Haruka-san too, you're blushing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だって、恥ずかしいんだもん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Because it's embarrassing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Because it's embarrassing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うう、それは僕もだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uuu, I'm embarrassed too...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uuu, I'm embarrassed too...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二人で顔を見合わせる。
MESSAGE.EN: We looked at each other's faces.
MESSAGE.Translation: We looked at each other's faces.

MESSAGE.JP: それから二人でくすくす笑い合った。
MESSAGE.EN: Then, slowly, the two of us smiled.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, slowly, the two of us smiled.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんがいるから。また明日」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun's there for me, so. See you tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun's there for me, so. See you tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: だから、大丈夫だよ、と葉留佳さんは笑って僕を見送ってくれる。
MESSAGE.EN: So everything will be alright, were Haruka-san's unspoken words as she gazed at my face.
MESSAGE.Translation: So everything will be alright, were Haruka-san's unspoken words as she gazed at my face.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「また明日ね。ばいばい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝See you tomorrow. Bye-bye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝See you tomorrow. Bye-bye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ばいばい、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Bye-bye, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Bye-bye, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は歩き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I left.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left.

MESSAGE.JP: 振り返ると、葉留佳さんはまだ立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked over my shoulder, and Haruka-san was still standing there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked over my shoulder, and Haruka-san was still standing there.

MESSAGE.JP: 手を一度振って歩みを再開する。
MESSAGE.EN: I waved to her once, then turned and walked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I waved to her once, then turned and walked away.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（マーマレード味、か）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Tasted like marmalade, huh.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Tasted like marmalade, huh.)

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は我知らず浮かぶ笑みを押えきれなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Without realizing it, I caught myself smiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without realizing it, I caught myself smiling.

MESSAGE.JP: 昼休みも半ばを過ぎるとようやく混雑しなくなってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Lunch was about halfway over when the crowds finally thinned out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Lunch was about halfway over when the crowds finally thinned out.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（メニューが一新されたせいで、学食にするひとが多いんだよなぁ、最近）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I guess since they updated the menu, everyone's been eating in the cafeteria these days.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I guess since they updated the menu, everyone's been eating in the cafeteria these days.)

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん。またいつものおばちゃんの手伝い？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san. Still helping out the lunch lady?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san. Still helping out the lunch lady?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうだよ。ゴミ捨ててきたところ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep. I'm just done taking out the garbage.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep. I'm just done taking out the garbage.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大変だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Must be hard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Must be hard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうでもないよ。自分が役に立ってるって実感するのも嬉しいし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Not at all. It's a good feeling you get from helping out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Not at all. It's a good feeling you get from helping out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: おばちゃんは噂に関係なく今までどおりなのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess the lunch ladies hadn't been paying any attention to the rumors.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess the lunch ladies hadn't been paying any attention to the rumors.

MESSAGE.JP: それは葉留佳さんにとって嬉しいことのはずだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That must have made Haruka-san happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: That must have made Haruka-san happy.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「すみませーん、とおしてくださいですー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Excuse me～, I need to get by...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Excuse me～, I need to get by...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小さなからだが食器を返す列から抜け出してくる。
MESSAGE.EN: A small figure broke away from the line of students returning their trays.
MESSAGE.Translation: A small figure broke away from the line of students returning their trays.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ふーっ…どうしてこんなに混むですかー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Fuuh... why is it so crowded...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Fuuh... why is it so crowded...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド。ハロー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud. Haro-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud. Haro-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はろー、リキー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Haro-, Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Haro-, Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか元気なさそうなクドの挨拶だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud's greeting somehow lacked its usual energy.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud's greeting somehow lacked its usual energy.

MESSAGE.JP: それでもクドは手を揃えてぺこん、とお辞儀をした。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, she held her arms neatly in front of her and gave a little bow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, she held her arms neatly in front of her and gave a little bow.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お昼ご飯は終わりましたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You two are done with lunch?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You two are done with lunch?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。食べ終わったところ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. All done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. All done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですかー…三枝さんも、はろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Is that so... Oh, hello, Saigusa-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Is that so... Oh, hello, Saigusa-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは葉留佳さんに挨拶をしようとして、きょとん、とした。
MESSAGE.EN: As Kud went to say a greeting to Haruka-san she paused, looking puzzled.
MESSAGE.Translation: As Kud went to say a greeting to Haruka-san she paused, looking puzzled.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はろー…です？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ha... Haro-?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ha... Haro-?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうかした？　クド公」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What's up, Little Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What's up, Little Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「え、あ？　あ、いえ、なんでもないです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Eh, ah? Ah, no, it's nothing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Eh, ah? Ah, no, it's nothing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは、ふんふん、と鼻をひくつかせている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud's nose twitched as if she was sniffing at the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud's nose twitched as if she was sniffing at the air.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…相変わらず犬みたいな行動してんね、クド公はー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Always acting like the doggie ya are, Little Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Always acting like the doggie ya are, Little Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わ、わふーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wa, wafuu!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wa, wafuu!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ま、回さないでください、くださーいっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝P, please stop with the spinning, please――!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝P, please stop with the spinning, please――!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「とりゃとりゃー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Round and round ya go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Round and round ya go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふー!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu-!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu-!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「うう、目が回りましたです…しーゆー、ですリキ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uuu, my eyes are still spinning... Shii yu-, Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uuu, my eyes are still spinning... Shii yu-, Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドを見送りながら僕は苦笑する。
MESSAGE.EN: As I watched Kud leave, I gave a wry smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I watched Kud leave, I gave a wry smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだかなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What was that about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What was that about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん、まだ仕事残ってるからまたね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, I've got some work left so I'll see you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, I've got some work left so I'll see you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん。またね、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, okay. See you, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, okay. See you, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは厨房の奥へと消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san vanished back into the kitchen.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san vanished back into the kitchen.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん、まだ仕事残ってるからまたね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, I've got some work left so I'll see you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, I've got some work left so I'll see you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん。またね、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, okay. See you, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, okay. See you, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは厨房の奥へと消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san vanished back into the kitchen.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san vanished back into the kitchen.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「お待たせ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry to keep you waiting, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry to keep you waiting, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「行こうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Shall we go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Shall we go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と葉留佳さんは歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san and I began to walk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san and I began to walk.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「沢山の箱の中全部見るのはつらいなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Looking through every single one of those boxes will be tough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Looking through every single one of those boxes will be tough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひとつずつやっていくしかないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, there's nothing for it but to go through them one by one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, there's nothing for it but to go through them one by one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I guess...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I guess...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは気落ちしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san seemed despondent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san seemed despondent.

MESSAGE.JP: 送られてきた戸籍等の書類に、情報はなかったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently there had been no information in the family register she had been sent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently there had been no information in the family register she had been sent.

MESSAGE.JP: 普通に両親から双子が産まれた、ということだけしかわからなかった、とのこと。
MESSAGE.EN: All that was written there was the record of twins having been born to two parents, just like normal.
MESSAGE.Translation: All that was written there was the record of twins having been born to two parents, just like normal.

MESSAGE.JP: 逆に言えば…その方面から判別されることを防ぐために余計なことはしていないのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm guessing... the family arranged for the listing to read that way to avoid a scandal.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm guessing... the family arranged for the listing to read that way to avoid a scandal.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「アルバムとか、私のはないんだよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There are no albums with me in them or anything...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There are no albums with me in them or anything...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「学校、行ってなかったしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I didn't even go to school, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I didn't even go to school, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「行かせてもらえなかった、と言ったほうがいいかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Rather, I wasn't allowed to go to school...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Rather, I wasn't allowed to go to school...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「登校拒否扱いにされてたみたい、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They told the school I was a shut-in who refused to attend.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They told the school I was a shut-in who refused to attend.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と逆側の箱に手をつけながら続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san grabbed a box on the opposite side of me and continued speaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san grabbed a box on the opposite side of me and continued speaking.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「学校の先生がお山の家（さいぐさのいえ）に来ても追い払ってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And if the teachers tried to visit me at our house on the mountain, the family would chase them away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And if the teachers tried to visit me at our house on the mountain, the family would chase them away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「会わせないようにしてたっぽい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'd never even see them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'd never even see them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「というわけで集団生活とゆーものが未だにイマイチ理解できてないというか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So even now, I'm not really good at living in a community.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So even now, I'm not really good at living in a community.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いつご飯食べたらいいのかとかすごい謎だったんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Like, it takes effort to even figure out when I'm supposed to eat or anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Like, it takes effort to even figure out when I'm supposed to eat or anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「誰も命令してくれないしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No one gives me any orders.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No one gives me any orders.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「何したらいいかもわからなかったんだよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So a lot of the time I just don't know what I'm supposed to do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So a lot of the time I just don't know what I'm supposed to do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 古ぼけた紙の束を整理しながら葉留佳さんはぽつぽつと語った。
MESSAGE.EN: As she sorted through a sheaf of old-looking papers, Haruka-san spoke haltingly.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she sorted through a sheaf of old-looking papers, Haruka-san spoke haltingly.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ま、繰り返してるうちに覚えたんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, with enough repetition I can figure things out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, with enough repetition I can figure things out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「繰り返しって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Repetition?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Repetition?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…失敗を繰り返し、かな。ほら、初めて会ったときから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Repeated failure, I mean. Like, remember when we first met?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Repeated failure, I mean. Like, remember when we first met?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ずっと空気読めてないでしょ。やはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I never could read the mood. Yahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I never could read the mood. Yahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Uh, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Uh, yeah.❞
