MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんなんだから運動会とかも出たことないし…修学旅行も行ったことないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I've never been to a sports day... or on a field trip.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I've never been to a sports day... or on a field trip.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いいおもいでナシ、ってやつだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I have no good memory to name, I guess.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I have no good memory to name, I guess.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y, yeah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y, yeah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんの子供時代はどうだった？　楽しかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝How was your childhood, Riki-kun? Was it fun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝How was your childhood, Riki-kun? Was it fun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はどう答えたらいいか迷った。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea how to reply to that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea how to reply to that.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、結局本当のことしか言えない。
MESSAGE.EN: But in the end, I couldn't say anything but the truth.
MESSAGE.Translation: But in the end, I couldn't say anything but the truth.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「楽しいことばかりじゃなかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It wasn't all fun and games.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It wasn't all fun and games.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはそれ以上訊いてこなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san murmured, then fell silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san murmured, then fell silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんも幸薄そうな顔してるもんねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I could tell from your face that you're an ill-fated person too, Riki-kun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I could tell from your face that you're an ill-fated person too, Riki-kun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どういう意味、それ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's that supposed to mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's that supposed to mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「深い意味はありませーん。あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh, I didn't mean anything serious. Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh, I didn't mean anything serious. Ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…話戻すけど、修学旅行は、だから楽しみだったり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Sorry to derail the conversation, but about field trips, I'm really looking forward to this one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Sorry to derail the conversation, but about field trips, I'm really looking forward to this one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「学校の？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You mean the school one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You mean the school one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん。もうすぐあるでしょ？　観光バスに乗るんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah. It's coming up soon, right? We're gonna take a bus and go sight-seeing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah. It's coming up soon, right? We're gonna take a bus and go sight-seeing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、観光バス乗ったことなくてさぁ。座席が広いってのはいいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I've never ridden a tour bus before. It'll be awesome sitting in a wide seat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I've never ridden a tour bus before. It'll be awesome sitting in a wide seat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんかキラキラした照明があるでしょ？　もらいたいなぁ、とか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You know those sparkling lamps? I want to get one of those.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You know those sparkling lamps? I want to get one of those.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 楽しみだったんだよ、と葉留佳さんは繰り返した。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san kept repeating how much she had been looking forward to the trip over and over.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san kept repeating how much she had been looking forward to the trip over and over.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…クラス、一緒だったら良かったのにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...If only we could be in the same class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...If only we could be in the same class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沈んだ口調の葉留佳さんに、僕はなんと答えたらいいかわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Hearing Haruka-san's depressed tone, I didn't know what I could say to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hearing Haruka-san's depressed tone, I didn't know what I could say to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…クラスで行くこと、考えたら休みたいぐらいだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Thinking about going with my class... almost makes me want to skip it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Thinking about going with my class... almost makes me want to skip it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でもね、私の初めての修学旅行だからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But you know, it's going to be my very first field trip.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But you know, it's going to be my very first field trip.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「頑張って楽しまないと、って思ったんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So I keep telling myself I have to do my best to enjoy it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So I keep telling myself I have to do my best to enjoy it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは笑顔で言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san said with a smile on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san said with a smile on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんのクラスで…教室で、葉留佳さんがどうしているのかは、わからない。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's class... I had no idea how it was for her in there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's class... I had no idea how it was for her in there.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕も訊かないし、葉留佳さんも話さない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't find anything to say, and we sank into silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't find anything to say, and we sank into silence.

MESSAGE.JP: ましてや、二木さんも一緒のクラスなのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I mean, she was in the same class as that Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I mean, she was in the same class as that Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: どんな感じなのか、なんて訊かないでも想像できた。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't even need to ask to imagine how that was.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't even need to ask to imagine how that was.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、修学旅行のバスは僕たちのところに来る？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, for the field trip, why don't you come over to our bus?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, for the field trip, why don't you come over to our bus?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え、いいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh, is that okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh, is that okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「多分ひとりふたり混ざってもわかんないよ。みんな騒いでいるだろうしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think anyone will notice one or two people trading places. Everyone will be making a ruckus anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think anyone will notice one or two people trading places. Everyone will be making a ruckus anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ホント？　いいのかなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Really? I wonder if it'll be okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Really? I wonder if it'll be okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ダメだったらトランクに押し込むから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If that doesn't work out, we'll just stow you in the trunk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If that doesn't work out, we'll just stow you in the trunk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わ、理樹くんひどーい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wah, Riki-kun, that's mean.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wah, Riki-kun, that's mean.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「冗談だけどね、あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just joking, ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just joking, ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ぶーぶー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Boo-boo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Boo-boo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「きっと大丈夫だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure it'll be fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure it'll be fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そのときは理樹くんの隣に座りたいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...When the time comes, I want to sit next to Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...When the time comes, I want to sit next to Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ダメ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's no good?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's no good?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんがひどく傷ついた顔をしているので僕は慌てて答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san made a really hurt face, so I answered her in a fluster.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san made a really hurt face, so I answered her in a fluster.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そんなことはないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝N, no, it's not like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝N, no, it's not like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh, good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh, good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは心底ほっとした表情を浮かべた。
MESSAGE.EN: Relief spread across Haruka-san's face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Relief spread across Haruka-san's face.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そういってもらえて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm so glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm so glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「例えそれができなかったとしても、お返事が聞けて嬉しいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Even if we can't do it, just your response alone makes me happy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Even if we can't do it, just your response alone makes me happy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とても嬉しそうな笑顔だな、と僕は思った。
MESSAGE.EN: Her smile really was a happy one, I thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her smile really was a happy one, I thought.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん。その箱に積み上げてもいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun. Can I put this box up atop that one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun. Can I put this box up atop that one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん？　いいよ。ちょっと待ってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm? Sure. Just wait a second.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm? Sure. Just wait a second.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よいしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Heave!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Heave!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、そこ古雑誌が…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, watch out for the magazines...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, watch out for the magazines...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え？　…ぁわっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh? ...Awah!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh? ...Awah!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 足を滑らせた葉留佳さんを受け止めようとしたけれど間に合わなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I lunged to catch Haruka-san as she slipped, but I didn't make it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lunged to catch Haruka-san as she slipped, but I didn't make it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いたた…葉留佳さん、大丈夫？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oww... Haruka-san, you okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oww... Haruka-san, you okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いつつ…う、うん…だいじょーぶ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oww... Y, yeah... I'm okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oww... Y, yeah... I'm okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ…その、理樹くん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah... um, Riki-kun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah... um, Riki-kun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「手…当ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Your hand... It's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Your hand... It's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁ！　ご、ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwah! S, sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwah! S, sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 抱き留めた葉留佳さんの胸から慌てて僕は手を離した。
MESSAGE.EN: In a panic I pulled my hand from Haruka-san's chest, where it had ended up when I caught her.
MESSAGE.Translation: In a panic I pulled my hand from Haruka-san's chest, where it had ended up when I caught her.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…いいけど、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...It's fine, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...It's fine, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「な、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「キスして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Kiss me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Kiss me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…みゃ、脈絡なくいきなりまた!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Wh, why are you always so random!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Wh, why are you always so random!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから、脈絡ないの、いつものことじゃん、私…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's just how I am. When will you learn...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's just how I am. When will you learn...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それもそっか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, that's true...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, that's true...❞

MESSAGE.JP: って納得していいのか、僕はっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Is it really okay for me to agree with her?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is it really okay for me to agree with her?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…して、くれないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...You... don't wanna?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...You... don't wanna?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頬を染めたまま、拗ねたように言う葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san asked in a sulky tone while her cheeks reddened.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san asked in a sulky tone while her cheeks reddened.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I, I do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I, I do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの瞳が閉じられた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san closed her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san closed her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: ちゅ、と口づける。
MESSAGE.EN: Our lips met with a soft sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our lips met with a soft sound.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Nn...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Nn...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は唇を離した。
MESSAGE.EN: I separated from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I separated from her.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Nnn...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Nnn...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんがちょっと不満そうだったので、僕はもう一度唇を合わせた。
MESSAGE.EN: Noticing that Haruka-san looked slightly unsatisfied, I pressed my lips against hers again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Noticing that Haruka-san looked slightly unsatisfied, I pressed my lips against hers again.

MESSAGE.JP: 深いキス。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a deep kiss.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a deep kiss.

MESSAGE.JP: 間近で見る葉留佳さんは、ぼーっとしている。
MESSAGE.EN: As I gazed at her from that close up, Haruka-san seemed spaced out a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I gazed at her from that close up, Haruka-san seemed spaced out a little.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの、葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Something wrong, Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Something wrong, Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…理樹くん、キスじょーずだよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Riki-kun, you're good at kissing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Riki-kun, you're good at kissing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、そ、そう…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝E, y, you think so...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝E, y, you think so...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなことないと思うけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I, I don't think I am...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I, I don't think I am...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 雑誌でかじった程度の知識しか、僕にはない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't really know much about kissing, except what I'd seen in a few magazines.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't really know much about kissing, except what I'd seen in a few magazines.

MESSAGE.JP: 軽く当てたり触れるだけなのに、上手も何もない。
MESSAGE.EN: It was just lightly touching our lips together, I didn't see what there was to be ❛good❜ about.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was just lightly touching our lips together, I didn't see what there was to be ❛good❜ about.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こないだが…初めてじゃないでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wasn't the other day... your first time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wasn't the other day... your first time?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「も、もちろん初めてだったよ！　け、経験なんか、ないよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝O, of course that was my first time! I, I have absolutely no experience.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝O, of course that was my first time! I, I have absolutely no experience.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が慌てたように言うと、葉留佳さんは目を丸くした。
MESSAGE.EN: I said that in a panic. Haruka-san's eyes widened.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said that in a panic. Haruka-san's eyes widened.

MESSAGE.JP: それからくすくす笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she began to laugh lightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she began to laugh lightly.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そっか。そっか…そういえば、そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I see. I got it... Now that you mention it, yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I see. I got it... Now that you mention it, yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は顔を赤くする。
MESSAGE.EN: My face was turning beet red.
MESSAGE.Translation: My face was turning beet red.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃ、理樹くんの初めてのキスは私なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Then, I got Riki-kun's first kiss.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Then, I got Riki-kun's first kiss.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんだか嬉しいな…やはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That makes me a little happy... yahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That makes me a little happy... yahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは、額を僕の肩にとん、と押し当てた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san placed her forehead on my shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san placed her forehead on my shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、めんどくさい女の子だと思うんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I think I'm an annoying girl...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I think I'm an annoying girl...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ひととの距離の測り方がわかんないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't know how to judge how close I am to people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't know how to judge how close I am to people.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「教えてくれる家族も…いなかったからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Probably because I didn't have a family to teach me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Probably because I didn't have a family to teach me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「離れるか、くっつくかしか知らないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I only know if we're really distant or really close.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I only know if we're really distant or really close.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「きっと依存、っていうんだろうなぁ、こういうの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You could definitely say I'm dependent.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You could definitely say I'm dependent.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほんとうに私はよわくてだめな子だって…思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I really think I'm a weak, useless girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I really think I'm a weak, useless girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 下を向いた葉留佳さんの表情は見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was looking down so I couldn't see her expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was looking down so I couldn't see her expression.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それでも…それでも、私は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Even so, I... I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Even so, I... I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…誰かの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...want to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...want to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんのためになるなら、私、なんでもやるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If it's for you Riki-kun, I'd do anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If it's for you Riki-kun, I'd do anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「脇役でも、道化でも、なんでもやるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Even if I only play a minor role or the buffoon, I'd do anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Even if I only play a minor role or the buffoon, I'd do anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんが望むなら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Anything you want.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Anything you want.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いのちだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝My life.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝My life.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「たましいだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝My soul.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝My soul.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんだって、理樹くんにあげてもいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What ever you want, I'll give it to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What ever you want, I'll give it to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の肩に額を押し当てたまま。
MESSAGE.EN: She still had her forehead on my shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: She still had her forehead on my shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の両腕をぎゅっと掴みながら葉留佳さんはそんなことを言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san said those words while tightly gripping both my arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san said those words while tightly gripping both my arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 悲しすぎた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was too sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was too sad.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなことをいう葉留佳さんが。
MESSAGE.EN: Hearing Haruka-san say such things.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hearing Haruka-san say such things.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…たましい、というかこころは葉留佳さん自身のために必要だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...your soul and your heart are things you need for yourself, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...your soul and your heart are things you need for yourself, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうかな…必要かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Do I... need it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Do I... need it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほんとうに、必要なのかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Do I really... need it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Do I really... need it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: かすれ声で、呟く葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san whispered in a hoarse voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san whispered in a hoarse voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こころまで僕にあげちゃったら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you're going to go as far as to give me your heart,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you're going to go as far as to give me your heart,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんは僕を好きって言えなくなっちゃうよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝don't you need it to be able to say you like me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝don't you need it to be able to say you like me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…う。それは困るなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...ah. That'd be a problem...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...ah. That'd be a problem...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「好きって言えないのは…困るなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Not being able to say I like you would be a problem...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Not being able to say I like you would be a problem...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、こころは葉留佳さんのために取っておいてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why you need to hold on to your heart for your own sake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why you need to hold on to your heart for your own sake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃ、私は何を理樹くんにあげればいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, what should I give you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, what should I give you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「キス？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A kiss?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A kiss?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…それとも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...that or...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...that or...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もっと先のこと…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You want to keep going further...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You want to keep going further...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは、えーと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's, uh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's, uh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「キス、かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How about a kiss.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How about a kiss.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん、いいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Okay, a kiss.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Okay, a kiss.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Nn...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Nn...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少し長めのキス。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a somewhat long kiss.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a somewhat long kiss.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…どうかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...how was it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...how was it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もう少し…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あはは。そだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...ahaha. Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...ahaha. Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは悪戯っぽく笑うと、ちょん、と僕の頬をつついた。
MESSAGE.EN: With a poke at my cheek, Haruka-san gave me a slightly teasing smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a poke at my cheek, Haruka-san gave me a slightly teasing smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん…っ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Nn...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Nn...❞

MESSAGE.JP: もう一度僕たちはキスをする。
MESSAGE.EN: We kissed again.
MESSAGE.Translation: We kissed again.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…理樹くん、大好きー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Riki-kun, I love you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Riki-kun, I love you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 幸せそうに葉留佳さんは笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san smiled happily.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san smiled happily.

MESSAGE.JP: 一通り色々なものを引っ張り出してみたころには、日が暮れようとする時刻になっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We spent the rest of the time looking through various things until sunset.
MESSAGE.Translation: We spent the rest of the time looking through various things until sunset.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日は帰らないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you not going back to the dorms tonight?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you not going back to the dorms tonight?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もうちょっと探してみる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I want to keep looking around some more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I want to keep looking around some more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「誰もいない日だからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Since no one is home today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Since no one is home today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「最後まで手伝えるといいんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'd like to stay and help 'til the end, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'd like to stay and help 'til the end, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「寮の門限があるからしょうがないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There's the curfew, so you can't really help it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There's the curfew, so you can't really help it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「資料探し、手伝ってくれてありがとね、理樹くん。また明日」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Thanks for helping me shift through all these though, Riki-kun. See you tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Thanks for helping me shift through all these though, Riki-kun. See you tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。また、明日」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. See you tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. See you tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうだ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh yeah, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh yeah, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…またキスしようね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Let's kiss again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Let's kiss again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 背伸びした葉留佳さんは僕の耳元でそう囁いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Standing on her tiptoes, Haruka-san whispered right in my ear.
MESSAGE.Translation: Standing on her tiptoes, Haruka-san whispered right in my ear.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なーんて、ね？　ドキドキした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Just pulling your leg. Did I get your heart racing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Just pulling your leg. Did I get your heart racing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y, yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y, yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「くすくす…ばいばい、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hehe... Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hehe... Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばいばい、と小さく手を振る葉留佳さんに見送られながら、僕は少しだけ眠たい体を引きずって、帰路についた。
MESSAGE.EN: After giving a small farewell wave to Haruka-san, I turned my tired body and headed toward the dorms.
MESSAGE.Translation: After giving a small farewell wave to Haruka-san, I turned my tired body and headed toward the dorms.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Good morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Good morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下で小毬さんと出会う。
MESSAGE.EN: I ran into Komari-san in the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ran into Komari-san in the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの、こんなところで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's up? Why are you here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's up? Why are you here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「理樹君…うん、その、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, um, well, you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, um, well, you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんは言いよどんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san hesitated.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san hesitated.

MESSAGE.JP: 視線が廊下の掲示板に向く。
MESSAGE.EN: She was looking at the hallway bulletin board.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was looking at the hallway bulletin board.

MESSAGE.JP: ぽっかりと角の場所が空いている。
MESSAGE.EN: One corner was wide open.
MESSAGE.Translation: One corner was wide open.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…小毬さん、ひょっとして…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Komari-san, did you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Komari-san, did you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんは頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こまりちゃん、捨ててきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You took it down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You took it down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹か。おはよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hey Riki, good morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hey Riki, good morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ぐっどもーにんぐです、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Good morning Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Good morning Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「クーちゃん、どうだった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Kuu-chan, how'd it go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Kuu-chan, how'd it go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「北校舎をぐるっと回ってきましたが、貼ってなかったです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I went around the north school building, but there weren't any up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I went around the north school building, but there weren't any up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん、そっか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oh, I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oh, I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃ、もう一度放課後、見回ろう、クーちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then let's go around again after school, Kuu-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then let's go around again after school, Kuu-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝OK.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝OK.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…葉留佳さんは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Where's Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Where's Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「どこかにいるとは思うんだけど…寮でもあんまり見かけないんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I've been wondering where she is, but I haven't seen her around the dorm much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I've been wondering where she is, but I haven't seen her around the dorm much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「私たちの部屋にも来てくれなくなっちゃったし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝She hasn't been coming to our room either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝She hasn't been coming to our room either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちは無言で掲示板を見つめた。
MESSAGE.EN: We silently stared at the bulletin board.
MESSAGE.Translation: We silently stared at the bulletin board.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「これぐらいしか出来ないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝This is all we can do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝This is all we can do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「はるちゃんのためになってるかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I hope it helps Haru-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I hope it helps Haru-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なってると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんや鈴たちは見つけたら葉留佳さんについてのビラをはがしているらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently, Komari-san, Rin and Kud had been tearing down posters about Haruka-san whenever they saw them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently, Komari-san, Rin and Kud had been tearing down posters about Haruka-san whenever they saw them.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「私たちだけじゃないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's not just us, you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's not just us, you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 他のクラスのひとにも呼びかけてるんだ、と小毬さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san was appealing to people in other classes for help too.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san was appealing to people in other classes for help too.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（それでも面白がる人間はいる、ってことか）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(But there are still people out there who find it amusing.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(But there are still people out there who find it amusing.)

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「貼ってるやつを見つけたら蹴ってやるのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If I find whoever's putting them up, I'll kick 'em.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If I find whoever's putting them up, I'll kick 'em.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「だめだよ、りんちゃん。暴力はよくないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝No Rin-chan. Violence is bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝No Rin-chan. Violence is bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…うーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Uuu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Uuu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴はもどかしそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin looked frustrated.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin looked frustrated.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴だけじゃない。みんなそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't just Rin. Everyone seemed that way.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't just Rin. Everyone seemed that way.

MESSAGE.JP: チャイムが鳴る。
MESSAGE.EN: The bell rang.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bell rang.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちは教室へ言葉少なく足を向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: We all headed toward the classroom with nary a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: We all headed toward the classroom with nary a word.

MESSAGE.JP: 校門で頭を下げている二木さんを見かけた。
MESSAGE.EN: In front of the school gate, I saw Futaki-san respectfully bowing her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: In front of the school gate, I saw Futaki-san respectfully bowing her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「お疲れ様でした、おじ様、おば様方」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Thank you very much, Uncle, Aunt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Thank you very much, Uncle, Aunt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…はい、至らぬ案内で申し訳ありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Yes, I apologize for the inconvenience.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Yes, I apologize for the inconvenience.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 校門の前に停まっている車から聞こえるのはだみ声だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear an abrasive voice speak from a car parked in front of the school gate.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear an abrasive voice speak from a car parked in front of the school gate.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「わかっております、仰せの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I understand, your wish is my...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I understand, your wish is my...❞

MESSAGE.JP: バン、と音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: There was the sound of a door closing.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was the sound of a door closing.

MESSAGE.JP: 車が走り去っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Then the car pulled away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then the car pulled away.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…ねばいいのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...wish he'd just...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...wish he'd just...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頬を押えた二木さんは車の去る方を見据えて、何事か呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: With one hand on her cheek, Futaki-san watched the car drive away and muttered something to herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: With one hand on her cheek, Futaki-san watched the car drive away and muttered something to herself.

MESSAGE.JP: 校舎のほうへ向かってくる二木さんは僕に気がついたようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: As she turned back to the school building, Futaki-san noticed me.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she turned back to the school building, Futaki-san noticed me.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…何か用？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Did you need something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Did you need something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今のは、誰？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who was that, just now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who was that, just now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…あなたには関係ないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...That doesn't concern you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...That doesn't concern you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「『お山の家』のひと、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Someone from the ❛house on the mountain,❜ huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Someone from the ❛house on the mountain,❜ huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは頬から手を離した。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san let her hand drop from her cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san let her hand drop from her cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: 頬が赤く腫れている。
MESSAGE.EN: Her cheek was red.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her cheek was red.

MESSAGE.JP: 何かをぶつけられたあとのようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Like something had hit her there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like something had hit her there.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…本家がここまで来るのは珍しいのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...It's unusual for anyone from the main family to come out this far.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...It's unusual for anyone from the main family to come out this far.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「何？　そんな顔をして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What? Why are you making such a face?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What? Why are you making such a face?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、いや…答えてくれるとは思わなかったから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, well... I just didn't think you'd actually answer me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, well... I just didn't think you'd actually answer me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは鼻で笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san gave a derisive laugh.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san gave a derisive laugh.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「世間体が何より大事なのよね、あのひとたち」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝To those people, appearances are everything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝To those people, appearances are everything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…父さんも戻ってくるせいか…ぴりぴりしすぎね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Are they tense because... father's come back, I wonder...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Are they tense because... father's come back, I wonder...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…何か言った？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Did you say something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Did you say something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なんでもない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ねぇ、あの子と何を調べているの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Hey, what are you and that girl trying to find out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Hey, what are you and that girl trying to find out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはもう『三枝葉留佳』とは言わなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san didn't even bother saying Haruka-san's name.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san didn't even bother saying Haruka-san's name.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「調べるな、と言っても調べるのよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Even if I told you to stop, I don't suppose you would?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Even if I told you to stop, I don't suppose you would?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あの子のためにそこまでする必要があるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Is it really necessary for you to do that much for her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Is it really necessary for you to do that much for her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そんなに好きなの、あの子が？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Do you really like her that much?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Do you really like her that much?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたならもっとお似合いの子がいるでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There are girls here who would suit you much better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There are girls here who would suit you much better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あの子は他人に依存しすぎるし、優柔不断だし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That girl depends on others too much, she's indecisive,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That girl depends on others too much, she's indecisive,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「承認欲求さえ満たされれば誰でもいいのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝she doesn't care who it is, as long as someone showers her with attention.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝she doesn't care who it is, as long as someone showers her with attention.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それとも…同情しているの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Or is it just... sympathy you're feeling?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Or is it just... sympathy you're feeling?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「同情なんかじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not sympathy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not sympathy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もしきみがそう思っているなら、そんなことは二度と口にしてほしくない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If that's what you really think, please don't ever say that again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If that's what you really think, please don't ever say that again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 不幸を知っているからといって、不幸な人間に惹かれるわけじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I knew about her problems, it wasn't like I was beguiled by her misfortune.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I knew about her problems, it wasn't like I was beguiled by her misfortune.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そうね。謝るわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I see. I apologize.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I see. I apologize.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「誰もが自分が一番不幸だと…思いがちよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I guess everyone... believes themselves to be the most unfortunate one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I guess everyone... believes themselves to be the most unfortunate one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「世界には色々な事情がある――かくしてここはそのように出来ているのである、と言うワケね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There are many different circumstances in the world―― and at the same time, they are also what make up this world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There are many different circumstances in the world―― and at the same time, they are also what make up this world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さっきから聞いていると…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Listening to you, I'm starting to think...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Listening to you, I'm starting to think...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんは葉留佳さんのことを心配してるみたいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...that you're actually really concerned about Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...that you're actually really concerned about Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは僕をじっと見た。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san fixed me with her gaze.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san fixed me with her gaze.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ひょっとして…きみも二木の家で『不幸』なのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Could it be... that you're also ❛unhappy❜ at the Futakis?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Could it be... that you're also ❛unhappy❜ at the Futakis?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは答えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san did not respond.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san did not respond.

MESSAGE.JP: そのまま無言で僕の横を通り過ぎた。
MESSAGE.EN: And, wordlessly, she passed by me and walked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: And, wordlessly, she passed by me and walked away.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、縮尺版は資料室書庫だって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, there's some newspaper collections in the reference room archives.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, there's some newspaper collections in the reference room archives.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「図書室にはやっぱり、ない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There weren't any in the library, after all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There weren't any in the library, after all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。マイクロフィルムはあるみたいだけど、見せてもらえないものらしいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. They've got some on microfilm, but it seems not just anyone is allowed to view those.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. They've got some on microfilm, but it seems not just anyone is allowed to view those.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃ、資料室で探すしかないね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Then, I guess we should look in the reference room...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Then, I guess we should look in the reference room...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今日は事件当時の新聞記事を探すことにしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Today we were looking for newspaper articles from around the time of the incident.
MESSAGE.Translation: Today we were looking for newspaper articles from around the time of the incident.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「鍵、借りてくるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'll go borrow the key.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'll go borrow the key.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「借りてきたよ。いこっか、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I got the key. Let's go, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I got the key. Let's go, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 下校を促す放送が流れて、僕たちは資料室から出てきた。
MESSAGE.EN: We finally left the reference room around the time the school closing broadcast was playing.
MESSAGE.Translation: We finally left the reference room around the time the school closing broadcast was playing.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「目が痛い…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝My eyes are tired...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝My eyes are tired...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんも僕も疲労の度合いが強い。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san and I were both exhausted.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san and I were both exhausted.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「事件が起こった日の前後がなくなってたね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There weren't any papers from around the time that incident took place, were there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There weren't any papers from around the time that incident took place, were there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 裁判があったと思われる日の分もすっぽりなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There wasn't even a copy of the papers that talked about the trial.
MESSAGE.Translation: There wasn't even a copy of the papers that talked about the trial.

MESSAGE.JP: 見付かったのは、判決日のものだけ。
MESSAGE.EN: All we found was a mention of the final verdict and sentence.
MESSAGE.Translation: All we found was a mention of the final verdict and sentence.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「県の図書館に、問い合わせしてみるしかないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Looks like we'll have to ask at the prefectural library.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Looks like we'll have to ask at the prefectural library.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちは徒労感だけ抱えて、それぞれの寮へ戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: With nothing but weariness as our reward, we returned to our dorms.
MESSAGE.Translation: With nothing but weariness as our reward, we returned to our dorms.

MESSAGE.JP: …女子寮の廊下は静かだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...This hallway of the girls' dorm is silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...This hallway of the girls' dorm is silent.

MESSAGE.JP: 早起きして私は部屋を出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I woke up early and left my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I woke up early and left my room.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰とも会いたくなかったから。
MESSAGE.EN: I did that because I didn't want to see anyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I did that because I didn't want to see anyone.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…お早いですね、三枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...You're up early, Saigusa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...You're up early, Saigusa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 振り返ると、クド公がいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned around and found Little Kud there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned around and found Little Kud there.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…あの」
`葉留佳@「何か用？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What do you want?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What do you want?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 素っ気なく聞こえるように言う。
MESSAGE.EN: I made myself sound as blunt as I could.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made myself sound as blunt as I could.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…あの、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Well, uh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Well, uh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…三枝さん、あの、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Saigusa-san, well, I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Saigusa-san, well, I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「クド公」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Little Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Little Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「前から、言おうと思ってたんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I've been meaning to say something to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I've been meaning to say something to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「クド公は人がよすぎるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're too nice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You're too nice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…三枝さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Saigusa-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Saigusa-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「でも、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いつか、辛い目に会ったとき、苦しむよ、そんなんじゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm sure the likes of you will suffer when you have a hard time some day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm sure the likes of you will suffer when you have a hard time some day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…三枝さんのように、ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Just like you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Just like you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド公は、まっすぐ私を見つめてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was looking me straight in the eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was looking me straight in the eye.

MESSAGE.JP: 透き通ったその瞳は、私の心の底まで見通していそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her unclouded eyes made me feel like she could see through to the bottom of my heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her unclouded eyes made me feel like she could see through to the bottom of my heart.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「だから、その『辛い目』に私たちを会わせないように、避けるのですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Is that why you're avoiding us, so we don't have to have a hard time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Is that why you're avoiding us, so we don't have to have a hard time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「みなさん心配してます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Everybody's worried about you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Everybody's worried about you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「三枝さん、私たちの誰も、噂を信じてません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Saigusa-san, none of us believe the rumors.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Saigusa-san, none of us believe the rumors.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それだけ、言いたかったんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I wanted you to know that much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I wanted you to know that much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…余計なお節介だよ、クド公」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Just mind your own business, Little Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Just mind your own business, Little Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…あはは。来ヶ谷さんにも同じことを言われました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Ahaha, that's what Kurugaya-san told me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Ahaha, that's what Kurugaya-san told me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それは三枝さんの問題だから、見守らなければならない、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She said that since this is your problem, all we can do is not interfere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She said that since this is your problem, all we can do is not interfere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それでも…私は伝えたかったんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But I still wanted to tell you that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But I still wanted to tell you that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…佳奈多さんにも、同じようなことを言いました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I said something similar to Kanata-san, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I said something similar to Kanata-san, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…クド公」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Little Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Little Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お、怒りますよね、わ、わかってます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I-I knew that would make you angry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I-I knew that would make you angry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「でも、私、だって、悲しいんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But I'm sad too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But I'm sad too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「家族がいるのに…それなのに、どうして嫌う必要があるんでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Why do family members have to hate each other?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Why do family members have to hate each other?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「よくお話してみれば、解決するかもしれないと思うのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I think you can talk it out with them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I think you can talk it out with them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド公が家族に対して思い入れがあることは知ってる。
MESSAGE.EN: I know how important her family is to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I know how important her family is to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 普段はここまでしないクド公が、私に話しかけてくるぐらい。
MESSAGE.EN: It's so important she's actually poking her nose into my problem right now, something she usually never would.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's so important she's actually poking her nose into my problem right now, something she usually never would.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、言った。
MESSAGE.EN: So I said it.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I said it.

MESSAGE.JP: だからこそ、言った。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why I decided to say it.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why I decided to say it.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「本当に、話せばわかるのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I doubt talking will fix it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I doubt talking will fix it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「クド公は、家族のひとと、しっかり話せるほど、仲がいいのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Since when are you a family issue expert?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Since when are you a family issue expert?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うまく行ってるのかな、クド公は。家族のひとたちと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wish my family relationship were as healthy as yours.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wish my family relationship were as healthy as yours.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド公の顔が青ざめる。
MESSAGE.EN: She went all pale.
MESSAGE.Translation: She went all pale.

MESSAGE.JP: それが答えだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's the answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's the answer.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（ごめん、クド公…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(I'm sorry, Little Kud...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(I'm sorry, Little Kud...)

MESSAGE.JP: こんなこと、言いたくない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't want to say anything like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't want to say anything like this.

MESSAGE.JP: 八つ当たりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I just took it out on her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I just took it out on her.

MESSAGE.JP: 知っていても、踏み込んじゃいけないことがある。
MESSAGE.EN: There are things that you know about but should not pry any further into.
MESSAGE.Translation: There are things that you know about but should not pry any further into.

MESSAGE.JP: そう、クド公は私が羨ましいのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe she's jealous of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe she's jealous of me.

MESSAGE.JP: クド公にはない『存在』が、私には、いる。
MESSAGE.EN: I have the kind of ❝people❞ that she doesn't have.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have the kind of ❝people❞ that she doesn't have.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、羨ましいのは私だって同じだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But then again, I'm jealous of Little Kud, too.
MESSAGE.Translation: But then again, I'm jealous of Little Kud, too.

MESSAGE.JP: 私に向けられない、笑顔、
MESSAGE.EN: Of the smile that she never shows to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of the smile that she never shows to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 優しい笑顔。
MESSAGE.EN: The kind smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: The kind smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@（…それを受け取ってるのは私じゃない）
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@(...And it's not me that gets it.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@(...And it's not me that gets it.)

MESSAGE.JP: 遠くからみた『ふたり』は姉妹みたいで。
MESSAGE.EN: The ❝two❞ of them look like sisters from a distance.
MESSAGE.Translation: The ❝two❞ of them look like sisters from a distance.

MESSAGE.JP: とても羨ましかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm really envious about that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm really envious about that.

MESSAGE.JP: そして羨ましがっている自分が、ひどくみじめだった。
MESSAGE.EN: And I feel horribly miserable for being so.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I feel horribly miserable for being so.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@『…その呼び方は、だめだ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@'...Don't call me that.'
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@'...Don't call me that.'

MESSAGE.JP: 記憶が蘇る。
MESSAGE.EN: I recalled something.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recalled something.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『…ど、どうして。いいじゃないですか』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@'...W-why not? It's not a big deal.'
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@'...W-why not? It's not a big deal.'

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『姉っぽいから、姉っぽい呼び名で…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@'Since you have the air of a big sister, I want to call you something big-sisterly...'
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@'Since you have the air of a big sister, I want to call you something big-sisterly...'

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@『私はキミの姉ではない』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@'But I'm not your big sister.'
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@'But I'm not your big sister.'

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@『そうだろう、葉留佳君』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@'And you know that, don't you, Haruka-kun?'
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@'And you know that, don't you, Haruka-kun?'

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『…そう…だけど…でも…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@'...That's... right... but...'
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@'...That's... right... but...'

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@『そう呼ぶことで、キミは私を二重に貶めている』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@'Addressing me that would humble me in two ways.'
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@'Addressing me that would humble me in two ways.'

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@『私を誰かの代用品として見ていること』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@'Firstly, you see me as a substitute for someone else.'
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@'Firstly, you see me as a substitute for someone else.'

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@『友人であろうとしている私自身を認めないこと』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@'Secondly, you deny me and my efforts to be your friend.'
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@'Secondly, you deny me and my efforts to be your friend.'

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@『キミが、その呼び名をするということは、そういうことだ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@'That's what it means to address me that way.'
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@'That's what it means to address me that way.'

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『…ごめんなさい…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@'...I'm sorry...'
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@'...I'm sorry...'

MESSAGE.JP: 唯ねえの声は厳しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Yui-nee sounded harsh the whole time she was telling me that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yui-nee sounded harsh the whole time she was telling me that.

MESSAGE.JP: 唯ねえの言うとおりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: But she was completely right.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she was completely right.

MESSAGE.JP: そのとおりだったから…私は、謝ることしかできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: And that was why... all I could do was apologize to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that was why... all I could do was apologize to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 唯ねえは『友達』でいてくれる、と。
MESSAGE.EN: But at the same time, she said that she would stay as my friend.
MESSAGE.Translation: But at the same time, she said that she would stay as my friend.

MESSAGE.JP: そういう意味で言ってくれたことは嬉しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: And that made my day.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that made my day.

MESSAGE.JP: でも甘えたいと私は思っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Though I wanted someone who'd let me do anything I wanted.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though I wanted someone who'd let me do anything I wanted.

MESSAGE.JP: 依存してしまう私を…唯ねえは、気がついていたのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe Yui-nee was aware of that dependency of mine...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe Yui-nee was aware of that dependency of mine...

MESSAGE.JP: 『…クド公はいいよ、可愛がってもらって』
MESSAGE.EN: '...I wish I were you, Little Kud. Everybody likes you and treats you well.'
MESSAGE.Translation: '...I wish I were you, Little Kud. Everybody likes you and treats you well.'

MESSAGE.JP: 『本当なら、私が優しくしてもらえるはずだったのに』
MESSAGE.EN: 'Everybody should be nice to me instead of you.'
MESSAGE.Translation: 'Everybody should be nice to me instead of you.'

MESSAGE.JP: そう何度言いたかっただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know how many times I've held those words back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know how many times I've held those words back.

MESSAGE.JP: でも口にしたら、きっと私は後悔する。
MESSAGE.EN: But I know I would've regretted it otherwise.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I know I would've regretted it otherwise.

MESSAGE.JP: 嫌いで、大嫌いで、口もききたくないあいつに、甘えたい、なんて…。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't believe that I want ❝her❞ to spoil me, the one that I hate so much I don't even want to talk to her...
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't believe that I want ❝her❞ to spoil me, the one that I hate so much I don't even want to talk to her...

MESSAGE.JP: 思っている自分が、すごくすごく、嫌いだった。
MESSAGE.EN: And I hate myself for wanting that.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I hate myself for wanting that.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…それでも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Even so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Even so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド公は、青ざめた顔のまま、ぎこちなく、笑みを作った。
MESSAGE.EN: Little Kud awkwardly put on a smile, still looking pale.
MESSAGE.Translation: Little Kud awkwardly put on a smile, still looking pale.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それでも、三枝さんは、お話すべきです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Even so, you should talk to them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Even so, you should talk to them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「手遅れにならないうちに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Before it's too late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Before it's too late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「後悔したときには…本当に後悔したときには」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝When you regret not doing it... when you really, really regret it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝When you regret not doing it... when you really, really regret it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それは叶わないものなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You can't turn back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You can't turn back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「手が届くうちに…せめて、話せるうちに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝While you can reach them... while you can still talk to them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝While you can reach them... while you can still talk to them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「でないと…私のように、後悔することになります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Or else... you'll regret it just like me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Or else... you'll regret it just like me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それだけです。私が言いたいのは、それだけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And that's it. That's all I wanted to say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And that's it. That's all I wanted to say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ごめんなさい…三枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm sorry... Saigusa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm sorry... Saigusa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 深くお辞儀するクド公。
MESSAGE.EN: She bowed deeply to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She bowed deeply to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を上げたクド公の表情は、悲しそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked sad as she raised her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked sad as she raised her face.

MESSAGE.JP: まるで我がことのように、目の前の子は考えている。
MESSAGE.EN: I can tell that this girl right before me is considering my problem hers, too.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can tell that this girl right before me is considering my problem hers, too.

MESSAGE.JP: 私にはそんなことできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: That's not something I can do.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's not something I can do.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな私を、じっと見ているクド公。
MESSAGE.EN: She's staring at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's staring at me.

MESSAGE.JP: そのまっすぐな視線が耐え難くて、目を逸らした。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't stand the look, and avoid it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't stand the look, and avoid it.

MESSAGE.JP: ＨＲがそろそろ始まる時間。
MESSAGE.EN: It was around time for homeroom to start.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was around time for homeroom to start.

MESSAGE.JP: トイレから戻ってきた僕は呼び止められた。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone called out to me as I was returning from the toilet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone called out to me as I was returning from the toilet.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おはよう、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Morning, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Morning, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おはよう、葉留佳さん。どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning, Haruka-san. What's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning, Haruka-san. What's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はい、これ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Here, take this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Here, take this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今日、お弁当作ったんだけどさ、作りすぎたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I was making lunch for myself today, but it looks like I happened to make too much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I was making lunch for myself today, but it looks like I happened to make too much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ついでに理樹くんの分も作ってみたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So, I figured I'd make a lunch box for Riki-kun too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So, I figured I'd make a lunch box for Riki-kun too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「食べて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Go ahead and take it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Go ahead and take it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Th, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Th, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「容器は使い捨てだから返さなくていいよ。じゃね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The box is disposable, so don't worry about returning it. See you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The box is disposable, so don't worry about returning it. See you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん。ありがとう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝O, okay. Thanks...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝O, okay. Thanks...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「直枝、ＨＲ始めるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝Naoe, homeroom's starting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝Naoe, homeroom's starting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「すみません、席戻ります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, I'm coming.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, I'm coming.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 怪訝な顔の教師に急かされて僕は教室へ戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: After being scolded by the teacher, who was eyeing me suspiciously, I returned to my seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: After being scolded by the teacher, who was eyeing me suspiciously, I returned to my seat.

MESSAGE.JP: 昼休み。早速、葉留佳さんお手製弁当を頂くことにする。
MESSAGE.EN: Lunch break. I quickly dug in to Haruka-san's hand-made lunch.
MESSAGE.Translation: Lunch break. I quickly dug in to Haruka-san's hand-made lunch.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹、学食行こうぜ！
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki, let's go to the cafeteria!
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki, let's go to the cafeteria!

MESSAGE.JP: …ってなんだよ弁当かよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: ...Wait, isn't that a lunch box!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Wait, isn't that a lunch box!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんかよ…おまえがどんどん遠くにいっちまうようだぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Lately... it feels like you've been drifting farther and farther away...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Lately... it feels like you've been drifting farther and farther away...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「部屋では毎日一緒じゃん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're roommates, we're together every day...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're roommates, we're together every day...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どうした…
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's going...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's going...

MESSAGE.EN: hm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: hm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾に弁当の中身を覗き見られる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo peered at the contents of the lunch box.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo peered at the contents of the lunch box.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ほぅ、なかなか美味そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Oho, that looks tasty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Oho, that looks tasty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ハンバーグにカラアゲ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a fried hamburger steak.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a fried hamburger steak.

MESSAGE.JP: ポテトサラダにキュウリとニンジンのスティック。
MESSAGE.EN: And potato salad with cucumber and carrot sticks.
MESSAGE.Translation: And potato salad with cucumber and carrot sticks.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…三枝か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Is that from Saigusa?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Is that from Saigusa?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。らしいんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. I guess it is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. I guess it is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ご飯の上にはのりたまふりかけ、端っこに梅干し。
MESSAGE.EN: There was seaweed sprinkled on the rice, with a pickled plum right in the center.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was seaweed sprinkled on the rice, with a pickled plum right in the center.

MESSAGE.JP: いかにも『おべんとー』って感じだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It irrefutably had a traditional lunch box feel to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It irrefutably had a traditional lunch box feel to it.

MESSAGE.JP: おかずはちょっと子供っぽいけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Though the choice of side dishes seemed more suited for a younger kid.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though the choice of side dishes seemed more suited for a younger kid.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふぅん…食べられそうに見えるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hmm... No matter how I look at it, that looks edible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hmm... No matter how I look at it, that looks edible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひどい言いようだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's a pretty cruel evaluation...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's a pretty cruel evaluation...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「三枝は神北の駄菓子をすり替えたりしてたしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I saw Saigusa replace Kamikita's cheap sweets with fakes, before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I saw Saigusa replace Kamikita's cheap sweets with fakes, before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「あいつの持ってくる食べ物は信用できん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I can't really trust any food brought by her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I can't really trust any food brought by her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうかな。おいしいよマフィンとかスコーンとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess. The muffins and scones she makes are pretty good, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess. The muffins and scones she makes are pretty good, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「シフォンケーキもそうだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Her chiffon cake too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Her chiffon cake too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹、餌付けされてんだぞそれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝She's feeding you like a pet, isn't she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝She's feeding you like a pet, isn't she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そうなのかなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Th, that's not it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Th, that's not it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ま、いいけどな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, whatever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, whatever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「しょうがねぇ、パンにして理樹と一緒に食うか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Nothing for it, let's grab some bread and eat with Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Nothing for it, let's grab some bread and eat with Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「悪いね…って、そこまでして僕と居たがるのが気持ち悪いけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry about that... Wait, I'd feel bad if you went that far to have lunch with me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry about that... Wait, I'd feel bad if you went that far to have lunch with me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだとぅ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What did you say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What did you say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: しまった…来るぞ、ものすごい言いがかりが。
MESSAGE.EN: Crap... now I set him off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Crap... now I set him off.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレと一緒だとオレの食いっぷりを見ているだけで膨満感を覚え、食欲が落ちるが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Are you saying that even watching me eat makes you feel stuffed and you lose your appetite...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Are you saying that even watching me eat makes you feel stuffed and you lose your appetite...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ほらきた…
MESSAGE.EN: Here it comes...
MESSAGE.Translation: Here it comes...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「でも今日は女の子の手作り弁当で量も少なめだから、今回はそれほど影響しないかなって顔だなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But, since today you've got a little lunch made by a girl, something like that doesn't really bother you!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But, since today you've got a little lunch made by a girl, something like that doesn't really bother you!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 割とポジティブだった！
MESSAGE.EN: That was surprisingly positive!
MESSAGE.Translation: That was surprisingly positive!

MESSAGE.JP: そんな風にして僕は昼休みを過ごした。
MESSAGE.EN: And so that was how we spent the lunch break.
MESSAGE.Translation: And so that was how we spent the lunch break.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お待たせ、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry to keep you waiting, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry to keep you waiting, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ううん、そんなに待ってないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Nah, it was nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Nah, it was nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「寮で着替えてから来たし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I just got done changing at the dorms and came over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I just got done changing at the dorms and came over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日はありがとね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks for earlier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks for earlier.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはきょとんとしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san tilted her head quizzically.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san tilted her head quizzically.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんでもない。今日は何をするんだっけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Never mind. What are we doing today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Never mind. What are we doing today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: さりげなくお礼を言うのも難しいな…僕は話題を変えた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was hard to make my thanks sound nonchalant... so I changed the subject.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was hard to make my thanks sound nonchalant... so I changed the subject.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん。商店街の本屋さんで、双子の本、探してみたいなって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Right. I was thinking today we could go to the bookstore in town and look up books on twins.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Right. I was thinking today we could go to the bookstore in town and look up books on twins.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あぁ、異父重複受精のことを調べたいのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Ahh, she must want to do some research on twin children born from different fathers...
MESSAGE.Translation: Ahh, she must want to do some research on twin children born from different fathers...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかった。じゃ商店街へ行こうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright, let's head for the shopping district then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright, let's head for the shopping district then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ネットで調べてみたんだけど、本の中身までは読めないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I found some books on the Internet, but I couldn't read their contents online.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I found some books on the Internet, but I couldn't read their contents online.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「実物を見た方が早いのは確かだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, it'll probably be easier to just get the real thing and look there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, it'll probably be easier to just get the real thing and look there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本屋の前で葉留佳さんは立ち止まった。
MESSAGE.EN: When we got to the bookstore, Haruka-san paused out front.
MESSAGE.Translation: When we got to the bookstore, Haruka-san paused out front.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ちょっとお店のひとに訊いてくるね。理樹くん、待ってて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm just gonna go in and ask the clerks. Riki-kun, wait here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm just gonna go in and ask the clerks. Riki-kun, wait here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一緒に行かなくていい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't want me to come too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't want me to come too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん、大丈夫。じゃ行ってくるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Nope, I'll be fine. Here I go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Nope, I'll be fine. Here I go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はいはい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よく考えたら女の子と一緒に医学書を探してる、ってなんか恥ずかしいな。
MESSAGE.EN: I admit it would be pretty embarrassing looking for a health manual together with a girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: I admit it would be pretty embarrassing looking for a health manual together with a girl.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さん、気遣ってくれたのかも。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess Haruka-san was being considerate of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess Haruka-san was being considerate of me.

MESSAGE.JP: と、僕はふと視線を彷徨わせたときだった。
MESSAGE.EN: So, I stood by idly, letting my gaze wander, until...
MESSAGE.Translation: So, I stood by idly, letting my gaze wander, until...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（あれ？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Huh?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Huh?)

MESSAGE.JP: 通りの前でひとりのお婆さんが男に手を掴まれている。
MESSAGE.EN: By the roadside, a man was holding onto an older woman.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the roadside, a man was holding onto an older woman.

MESSAGE.JP: 困っているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like there was some sort of a problem.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like there was some sort of a problem.

MESSAGE.JP: 周りのひとは視線を交わすだけで誰も話しかけない。
MESSAGE.EN: The people walking around them just averted their gaze and passed by without doing anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: The people walking around them just averted their gaze and passed by without doing anything.

MESSAGE.JP: どうしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: What to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: What to do.

MESSAGE.JP: …恭介がいたら、きっと助けに行くな。
MESSAGE.EN: ...If Kyousuke were there, he'd definitely help her.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...If Kyousuke were there, he'd definitely help her.

MESSAGE.JP: そう考えたら、足が動いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking that, I moved toward them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking that, I moved toward them.

MESSAGE.JP: `お婆さん@「そ、そんなこと言われても…困るのじゃが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Old Woman@❝E, even if you say that... it's something I can't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Old Woman@❝E, even if you say that... it's something I can't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうかしましたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is something the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is something the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `お婆さん@「いや、この人がワシの鞄を持ってくれるらし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Old Woman@❝No, this man is just holding my bag for me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Old Woman@❝No, this man is just holding my bag for me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「チっ…行けよ婆さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Che... Beat it, old woman.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Che... Beat it, old woman.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手を掴んでいた男はお婆さんをドン、と突き飛ばした。
MESSAGE.EN: The man gave the lady a sharp shove.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man gave the lady a sharp shove.

MESSAGE.JP: `お婆さん@「!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Old Woman@❝!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Old Woman@❝!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だ、だいじょうぶですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A, are you alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A, are you alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は慌ててお婆さんを支えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurriedly gave the old lady a hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurriedly gave the old lady a hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `お婆さん@「いたた…すみませんの…はぁ、どうしたもんかのぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Old Woman@❝Oww... sorry about this... Haa, why do such things have to happen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Old Woman@❝Oww... sorry about this... Haa, why do such things have to happen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `お婆さん@「どうも、どうも。ご面倒おかけしましたのぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Old Woman@❝Thank you, thank you. I'm sorry for the trouble.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Old Woman@❝Thank you, thank you. I'm sorry for the trouble.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いえいえ、気をつけて帰ってください…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it was nothing, please be careful on your way home...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it was nothing, please be careful on your way home...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はお婆さんに鞄を持たすと、背中を押した。
MESSAGE.EN: I handed the bag back to the old woman and gave her a gentle push on the back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I handed the bag back to the old woman and gave her a gentle push on the back.

MESSAGE.JP: 男はチ、と舌打ちをすると商店街の奥へ消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: The man clicked his tongue in annoyance and headed off toward the other end of the shopping district.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man clicked his tongue in annoyance and headed off toward the other end of the shopping district.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「お待たせ、理樹くん…どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry for the wait, Riki-kun... Hm, did something happen?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry for the wait, Riki-kun... Hm, did something happen?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本屋さんから葉留佳さんが出てきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san came out of the bookstore.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san came out of the bookstore.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お年寄りを脅してるひとがいたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There was this guy threatening an elderly lady.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There was this guy threatening an elderly lady.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうなんだ…どんなひと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Really... What kind of guy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Really... What kind of guy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「派手なシャツ着て、顔に傷があるいかにもチンピラな男だったけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He was wearing a really eye-catching shirt, and he had a scar on his face... looked like a total punk...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He was wearing a really eye-catching shirt, and he had a scar on his face... looked like a total punk...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが不安そうな顔をする。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san made an uneasy face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san made an uneasy face.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ううん…なんでもない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh... it's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh... it's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは首を振って否定した。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san shook her head as she gave a negative reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san shook her head as she gave a negative reply.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「本、見つかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did you find the books?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did you find the books?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「見つかったから読んでみたけど、よくわからなかった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I found some and I tried to read them, but I didn't really get it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I found some and I tried to read them, but I didn't really get it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、馬鹿だからかなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's because I'm an idiot...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's because I'm an idiot...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはしょんぼりとした。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san looked depressed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san looked depressed.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うう、わかりづらい説明でごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uuu, sorry for the difficult explanation, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uuu, sorry for the difficult explanation, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんがつっかえつっかえ説明してくれたことを整理すると、こんな感じだった。
MESSAGE.EN: If I properly arranged everything she told me, it would go something like this...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I properly arranged everything she told me, it would go something like this...

MESSAGE.JP: ●「Heteropaternal superfecundation」（異父重複受精）
MESSAGE.EN: ●❛Heteropaternal superfecundation.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ●❛Heteropaternal superfecundation.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 二卵性双生児は２つの卵子に別々の精子が受精することで誕生するが、その時の精子が別々の男性の精子であった場合、その双子は異父兄弟になる、という現象。
MESSAGE.EN: Two separate ova fertilized during the same cycle from separate acts of intercourse. If the fathers were different, the twins will be heteropaternal fraternal twins.
MESSAGE.Translation: Two separate ova fertilized during the same cycle from separate acts of intercourse. If the fathers were different, the twins will be heteropaternal fraternal twins.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それが起きる条件は以下のとーりである」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The only way for that to happen is as follows:❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The only way for that to happen is as follows:❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『女性がふたりの男性と約７２時間以内にそれぞれせいこ…』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝❛The woman must, with 2 different men and within 72 hours, have coitus...❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝❛The woman must, with 2 different men and within 72 hours, have coitus...❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…つまりえっちする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...In other words, have sex.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...In other words, have sex.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの顔が微かに赤いけれど僕は気がつかない振りをした。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's face was turning red, but I pretended not to notice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's face was turning red, but I pretended not to notice.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『女性の卵子が２つ排卵されている』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝❛The woman ovulates two separate eggs.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝❛The woman ovulates two separate eggs.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『別々の男性の精子、つまりえっちの相手の二人の男性の精子がそれぞれの卵子と受精する』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝❛And then those two eggs are fertilized by different sperm, in other words, the sperm of two different men.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝❛And then those two eggs are fertilized by different sperm, in other words, the sperm of two different men.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「という上記のような条件を満たしている場合」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So, if the above conditions take place,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So, if the above conditions take place,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『父親違いの双子が生まれる可能性が存在する』…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝❛there is the possibility that heteropaternal fraternal twins can be born❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝❛there is the possibility that heteropaternal fraternal twins can be born❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「アメリカでも牛さんでそういう例があるらしいんだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There are examples here of it happening with cows in America.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There are examples here of it happening with cows in America.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「英語の論文もあるみたいだけど…読めなかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There was an essay on it in English... but I couldn't read it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There was an essay on it in English... but I couldn't read it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「トホホ。私ってほんとお馬鹿だなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Doo-hoo. I really am an idiot...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Doo-hoo. I really am an idiot...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とはいえ、葉留佳さんにとっては自分たちが置かれた現象を理解し直す意味はあったみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: At least, it seemed like Haruka-san had really come to terms with the phenomenon that had produced her and her twin.
MESSAGE.Translation: At least, it seemed like Haruka-san had really come to terms with the phenomenon that had produced her and her twin.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…こんな事情、すごく迷惑だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...This situation, it's really inconvenient...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...This situation, it's really inconvenient...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それでも、普通の双子だったら、よかったのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Really, it'd be so much better if we were just normal twins...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Really, it'd be so much better if we were just normal twins...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんと喧嘩しなくてもよかったから？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because you wouldn't always fight with each other?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because you wouldn't always fight with each other?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは首を振って何も答えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san just shook her head and kept silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san just shook her head and kept silent.

MESSAGE.JP: 朝食をとりにきた僕は、葉留佳さんを見つけて声を掛けた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I went to get breakfast, I spotted Haruka-san and called out to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I went to get breakfast, I spotted Haruka-san and called out to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おはよう、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…おはよ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Morning, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Morning, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは浮かない顔をしてパンケーキをフォークでつついている。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was poking her pancake with a fork, wearing a glum expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was poking her pancake with a fork, wearing a glum expression.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…どうかしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Something the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Something the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: また何か嫌がらせを受けたのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if she is getting bullied again?
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if she is getting bullied again?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ちがうよ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's nothing like that, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's nothing like that, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …僕の表情を読んだのか、葉留佳さんは小さく笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...As if she had read my mind, Haruka-san gave a small smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...As if she had read my mind, Haruka-san gave a small smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今日はご飯食べたら直ぐ帰ってくるようにって言われてるからさ」
