MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's just that today they told me to come here for breakfast only and then go straight home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's just that today they told me to come here for breakfast only and then go straight home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「気が重たいだけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So I'm sorta bummed out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So I'm sorta bummed out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「家？　葉留佳さんの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Home? You mean your house?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Home? You mean your house?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん。お山じゃないほうの三枝の家」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah. Not the Saigusa mountain house, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah. Not the Saigusa mountain house, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: フォークがカツ、カツと食器に当たる音が響く。
MESSAGE.EN: Her fork kept clanking against the plate.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her fork kept clanking against the plate.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「家にあった資料からは手がかりは得られてないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wasn't able to get any clues from the papers back home after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wasn't able to get any clues from the papers back home after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「とうとうオーブン使えなくなっちゃったし…はぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And now I'm forbidden to use the oven... haa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And now I'm forbidden to use the oven... haa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「使えなくなったってどういうこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Forbidden, how come?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Forbidden, how come?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が厨房の中に入ると何があるかわからないって言ったひとがいたらしくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Some people warned the cafeteria aunties that having me in the kitchen could cause trouble some day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Some people warned the cafeteria aunties that having me in the kitchen could cause trouble some day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「さすがのおばちゃんも庇いきれなくなったってトコ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They were so persistent the aunties finally had no choice but to accede to the warning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They were so persistent the aunties finally had no choice but to accede to the warning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、それは…そんなことを言うひとがいるなんて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I, I can't believe there are people like that here in this school...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I, I can't believe there are people like that here in this school...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「別に驚くことじゃないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's not really that surprising.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's not really that surprising.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは淡々と続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san continued in an uninterested tone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san continued in an uninterested tone.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「購買部の列で突き飛ばされるとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I get pushed out of line in the school store.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I get pushed out of line in the school store.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「混んでるときの学食で嫌な顔されるとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝People make nasty faces when they're crowded together with me in the cafeteria.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝People make nasty faces when they're crowded together with me in the cafeteria.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「体育のとき柔軟体操、誰も組んでくれないとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝When we're doing warm-ups for gym, nobody wants to pair up with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝When we're doing warm-ups for gym, nobody wants to pair up with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「購買ワゴンのパンでも残り物にしないといけないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝At the sandwich wagon, I have to settle for the leftovers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝At the sandwich wagon, I have to settle for the leftovers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が触ったの、汚れてるみたいに見るひともいるからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There are even people who act as though just touching me will infect them or something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There are even people who act as though just touching me will infect them or something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 歩く迷惑、といったところかなぁ、と葉留佳さんは呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛They think I'm a walking nuisance, I guess,❜ Haruka-san murmured.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛They think I'm a walking nuisance, I guess,❜ Haruka-san murmured.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「何かしてたときはみんなスルーしてくれたのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Whenever I do something, everyone just ignores me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Whenever I do something, everyone just ignores me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「何もしてないときはみんな色々してくるんだよ。おかしいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And if I don't do anything, people accuse me of stuff. It's strange.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And if I don't do anything, people accuse me of stuff. It's strange.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san smiled.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san smiled.

MESSAGE.JP: 痛々しい笑みだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a really pathetic smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a really pathetic smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…思い出したんだけど、少しだけ小学校行ってたときがこんな風で」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...It's just making me a little reminiscent; it used to be like this in elementary school too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...It's just making me a little reminiscent; it used to be like this in elementary school too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「懐かしい感じかもだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wonder if you could call this nostalgia?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wonder if you could call this nostalgia?❞

MESSAGE.JP: カッ、カッ、カッ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Tap*, *tap*, *tap*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Tap*, *tap*, *tap*.

MESSAGE.JP: フォークと皿は音を立て続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of her fork hitting the plate continued.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of her fork hitting the plate continued.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「辛く…ないの、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't it... hard, Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't it... hard, Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 愚問なのに、僕はそう口にした。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a stupid question, but I asked it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a stupid question, but I asked it.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…辛い、苦しい、助けて、って言ったら今見ているものは変わるのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...❛It's hard,❜ ❛it's painful,❜ ❛help me,❜ if I said those things, would it change anything?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...❛It's hard,❜ ❛it's painful,❜ ❛help me,❜ if I said those things, would it change anything?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの問いに、僕は答えられなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was nothing I could say in response to Haruka-san's question.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was nothing I could say in response to Haruka-san's question.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「変わりはしないよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It won't, will it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It won't, will it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…むしろ変わらないほうが私はスキかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Maybe I like things not changing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Maybe I like things not changing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あのね、私たちがいる場所はさ、大きな時計なんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You know, the place we are right now? It's like a huge clock.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You know, the place we are right now? It's like a huge clock.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「歯車が、動いてる。カチコチ、カチコチ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The cogs are all moving. Tick-tock, tick-tock.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The cogs are all moving. Tick-tock, tick-tock.❞

MESSAGE.JP: カッ、カッ、カッ…フォークを動かすのを葉留佳さんは止めない。
MESSAGE.EN: *Tap*, *tap*, *tap*. Haruka-san never stopped moving her fork.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Tap*, *tap*, *tap*. Haruka-san never stopped moving her fork.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「歯車が一つ欠けたところで時計の働きにはあまり影響がでない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Even if one of the little cogs gets chipped, it won't much affect the entire clockwork.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Even if one of the little cogs gets chipped, it won't much affect the entire clockwork.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そう考えると、なんだか楽じゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Isn't that a reassuring way of thinking?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Isn't that a reassuring way of thinking?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「本当に…辛いときは、小さな部品が一つ『なく』なってもきっと平気だなぁって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝During the really painful times... I always remind myself that it will be no problem even if I'm ❛gone❜ since I'm just another little cog...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝During the really painful times... I always remind myself that it will be no problem even if I'm ❛gone❜ since I'm just another little cog...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そう考えたりして気を紛らわすんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Thinking that way helps me get my mind off the bothersome stuff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Thinking that way helps me get my mind off the bothersome stuff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: からん。葉留佳さんはフォークを投げ出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san threw her fork down with a clatter.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san threw her fork down with a clatter.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも、自分を自分で否定しない、って約束したから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But, I promised not to deny myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But, I promised not to deny myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「頑張ってるよ、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'll endure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'll endure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…多分、頑張ってる。自信、あまりないケド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I think I'll endure, at least. I'm not that confident.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I think I'll endure, at least. I'm not that confident.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。頑張ってる。葉留佳さんは頑張ってると思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. You'll endure. I know you'll pull through.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. You'll endure. I know you'll pull through.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…今日ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Today, you see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Today, you see...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もう一人の父親と会うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm going to meet with my other dad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm going to meet with my other dad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「早く帰れ、って言われてる理由は、それなんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The reason I was told to come home early, was that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The reason I was told to come home early, was that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: その話題を出すのもイヤ、という表情だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She made a face like the words tasted sour on her tongue.
MESSAGE.Translation: She made a face like the words tasted sour on her tongue.

MESSAGE.JP: 放課後、葉留佳さんの家。
MESSAGE.EN: After school, at Haruka-san's house.
MESSAGE.Translation: After school, at Haruka-san's house.

MESSAGE.JP: 中では、葉留佳さんが話をしているはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Inside, Haruka-san should be talking with him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Inside, Haruka-san should be talking with him.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は玄関先で待つことになった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was waiting for her by the front door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was waiting for her by the front door.

MESSAGE.JP: …葉留佳さんが家から出てくる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Then Haruka-san stepped out of the house.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Then Haruka-san stepped out of the house.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…あれ、もういいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Huh, already done?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Huh, already done?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん…今日はいいみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah... looks like that's it for today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah... looks like that's it for today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「歩きながら話そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Can we walk while we talk...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Can we walk while we talk...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんと僕は家を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san and I left the house.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san and I left the house.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「付き合ってもらったのに、ごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry for dragging you along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry for dragging you along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ううん。いいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nah. It's no problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nah. It's no problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんと家に行ったものの『もう一人の父親』には会えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Though we had gone to Haruka-san's house, she had not met with her ❛other father.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Though we had gone to Haruka-san's house, she had not met with her ❛other father.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 電話で『会わない』とそのひとから連絡があったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: From what I could tell, he had called earlier and told her he ❛wouldn't show.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: From what I could tell, he had called earlier and told her he ❛wouldn't show.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「仮出所かなにかしたらしいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I gather that he's out on parole or something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I gather that he's out on parole or something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…大体、二人ともあのひとに会わせてどうしろっていうのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I mean, even if I met him, I wouldn't know what to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I mean, even if I met him, I wouldn't know what to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんは会ったことはないんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's right, you've never met him, have you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's right, you've never met him, have you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ないよ。写真はみたことあるけど…今更会いたいとも思わないし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No. I've just seen his picture... After all this time, I don't think I even want to see him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No. I've just seen his picture... After all this time, I don't think I even want to see him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「会わなくても嫌いだもん。大嫌い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't need to meet him to know I hate him. Detest him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't need to meet him to know I hate him. Detest him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは、低い声で吐き捨てた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san spat that out in a low voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san spat that out in a low voice.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 商店街のベンチに男がふんぞり返って座っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: In the shopping district, a man was lying on a bench with his head thrown back and legs stretched out.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the shopping district, a man was lying on a bench with his head thrown back and legs stretched out.

MESSAGE.JP: 道行くひとを威圧するように眺めている。
MESSAGE.EN: He was giving the people passing by hostile glares.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was giving the people passing by hostile glares.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうしたの、理樹くん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What is it, Riki-kun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What is it, Riki-kun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは足を止めた僕の視線の先を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san stopped walking and followed my gaze.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san stopped walking and followed my gaze.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは唇を噛みしめた。
MESSAGE.EN: She bit her lip.
MESSAGE.Translation: She bit her lip.

MESSAGE.JP: その男はこの間、お婆さんの手を掴んでいた男だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The man was the one I had seen grabbing that old lady earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man was the one I had seen grabbing that old lady earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: ずかずか、と葉留佳さんは男に近づく。
MESSAGE.EN: Cautiously, Haruka-san drew closer to where the man lay.
MESSAGE.Translation: Cautiously, Haruka-san drew closer to where the man lay.

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「あぁ？　なんだテメェ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Aaa? What the hell do you want?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Aaa? What the hell do you want?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…三枝晶？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Shou Saigusa?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Shou Saigusa?❞

MESSAGE.JP: サングラス越しでわからないが、男は訝しがっているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Though I couldn't tell through his sunglasses, I think the man looked suddenly guarded.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though I couldn't tell through his sunglasses, I think the man looked suddenly guarded.

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「…違うね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝...You've got the wrong guy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝...You've got the wrong guy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「違わない。写真で見たとおりだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No I don't. You look just like your picture.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No I don't. You look just like your picture.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ゴクツブシでロクデナシのヤクタタズ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A bum, a worthless deadbeat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A bum, a worthless deadbeat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「…なんだと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝...What'd ya say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝...What'd ya say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「殺すぞ、クソガキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Wanna die, brat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Wanna die, brat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「は、葉留佳さんっ、やめなって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H, Haruka-san, that's enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H, Haruka-san, that's enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「…『はるか』だと…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝...Did you just say ❛Haruka❜...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝...Did you just say ❛Haruka❜...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男の口調が少し変わった。
MESSAGE.EN: The man's tone was strange.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man's tone was strange.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ガキじゃない。ちゃんと、葉留佳って名前、ある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm not a brat. I have a name, and it's ❛Haruka.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm not a brat. I have a name, and it's ❛Haruka.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男は鼻を鳴らした。
MESSAGE.EN: The man made an indistinct noise.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man made an indistinct noise.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「三枝晶でしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Shou Saigusa, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Shou Saigusa, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「違うね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝You've got the wrong guy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝You've got the wrong guy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「オレはそんな名前じゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝That ain't my name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝That ain't my name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの表情に怒気が浮かんだのを見て、僕は慌てて葉留佳さんを背に回した。
MESSAGE.EN: I could see anger filling Haruka-san's face, so I hurriedly interposed myself between them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could see anger filling Haruka-san's face, so I hurriedly interposed myself between them.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なに、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、頭に血が上ってるから…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, you're getting too heated up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, you're getting too heated up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「なんだかしらねぇが、ウザいガキどもだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝I dunno what's going on, but you're some annoying brats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝I dunno what's going on, but you're some annoying brats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男はベンチから立ち上がると、いきなり僕の胸元を掴んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The man stood up from the bench, then suddenly lashed out and grabbed me by the front of my shirt.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man stood up from the bench, then suddenly lashed out and grabbed me by the front of my shirt.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「後ろのメスガキ連れてさっさと消えろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Take that runt behind you and get the hell outta here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Take that runt behind you and get the hell outta here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「今度顔見せたら――潰すぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝If I ever see your face again―― I'll mess it up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝If I ever see your face again―― I'll mess it up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 安っぽい台詞…そう言い返そうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛You even talk like a worthless bum❜... is what I considered saying to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛You even talk like a worthless bum❜... is what I considered saying to him.

MESSAGE.JP: きついアルコール臭と煙草の匂い。
MESSAGE.EN: He reeked of alcohol and tobacco.
MESSAGE.Translation: He reeked of alcohol and tobacco.

MESSAGE.JP: …荒んだ目を間近にして僕は何も言えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Meeting his angry gaze, I wisely kept quiet.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Meeting his angry gaze, I wisely kept quiet.

MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝...Hmph.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝...Hmph.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ガシャァン！
MESSAGE.EN: *Crash*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Crash*!

MESSAGE.JP: 男は外に出ている店のテーブルを蹴り飛ばしながら歩き去った。
MESSAGE.EN: The man walked away, making sure to kick a cafe table on his way.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man walked away, making sure to kick a cafe table on his way.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんてヤツだ。…あ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What a guy. ...Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What a guy. ...Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言ってから気がつく。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized something even as I said that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized something even as I said that.

MESSAGE.JP: あれが『もう一人の父親』ならば…
MESSAGE.EN: If that was the ❛other father,❜ then...
MESSAGE.Translation: If that was the ❛other father,❜ then...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…いいよ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...It's fine, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...It's fine, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「見たとおりのひとだよ。お酒に溺れて、薬に手をだして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝As you can see. He's a drunk and a junkie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝As you can see. He's a drunk and a junkie.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「スリとかひったくりなんて朝飯前だって考えてるんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The kind of person who would pick someone's pocket or snatch a purse before breakfast.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The kind of person who would pick someone's pocket or snatch a purse before breakfast.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そういう男の娘だって…そういうことに、私はなってるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Since I'm that person's daughter... I guess that's what everyone thinks of me too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Since I'm that person's daughter... I guess that's what everyone thinks of me too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは拳を振わせて悔しそうに言い捨てる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's clenched fist trembled in frustration as she hurled out those words.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's clenched fist trembled in frustration as she hurled out those words.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうしてあんなのがいるんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Why does that guy have to exist?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Why does that guy have to exist?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あんなのが、私の…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝For that jerk to be my...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝For that jerk to be my...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 漏れ続ける呟きに、感情はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san continued to let slip low mutters.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san continued to let slip low mutters.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮の前の階段で葉留佳さんは座り込んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was sitting on the steps in front of the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was sitting on the steps in front of the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「家、帰らなくていいの？　葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you alright not going home tonight, Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you alright not going home tonight, Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あのひとも来ないし、同じ会話聞くだけだからもういいよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That guy's not coming, and I'm fine without listening to the same old conversation anyway...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That guy's not coming, and I'm fine without listening to the same old conversation anyway...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…でも…おかしいよ…こんなの…しらないことだらけ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...But... it's weird... there's... so many things I don't get about this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...But... it's weird... there's... so many things I don't get about this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはぶつぶつ呟いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was muttering to herself again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was muttering to herself again.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わからなくておぼえてないことが…増えてくる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The things I don't know or can't remember... just keep on piling up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The things I don't know or can't remember... just keep on piling up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いつからだっただろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wonder when it all started...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wonder when it all started...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、寮へ戻るなら戻らないと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, if you're going to the dorms, you'd better go now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, if you're going to the dorms, you'd better go now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 門限時間を過ぎたらまた厄介なことになる。
MESSAGE.EN: If the curfew set in and they closed the doors, it'd be a problem.
MESSAGE.Translation: If the curfew set in and they closed the doors, it'd be a problem.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「あなたたち、そろそろ門限よ…あら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝You over there, it's almost curfew... hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝You over there, it's almost curfew... hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「門限ぎりぎりまで逢瀬とはね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Sharing a little tryst right up to curfew, are we?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Sharing a little tryst right up to curfew, are we?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなんじゃないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's nothing like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's nothing like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが顔を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san raised her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san raised her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 一瞬二人の視線が絡み合う。
MESSAGE.EN: For an instant their eyes met.
MESSAGE.Translation: For an instant their eyes met.

MESSAGE.JP: どちらからともなく、視線を逸らした。
MESSAGE.EN: Then they both looked away in unison.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then they both looked away in unison.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「また明日ね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝See you tomorrow, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝See you tomorrow, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あとでメールする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'll text you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'll text you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん。また明日、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, right. See you tomorrow, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, right. See you tomorrow, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは振り返りもせず、女子寮のほうへ歩いていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Without looking back, Haruka-san walked off into the girls' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without looking back, Haruka-san walked off into the girls' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: その姿が見えなくなってから僕は二木さんに視線を移した。
MESSAGE.EN: When I could no longer see her, I turned my gaze to Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I could no longer see her, I turned my gaze to Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…何？　直枝理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...What is it? Riki Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...What is it? Riki Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もうひとりの父親っていうひとに会ったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We met with the other father today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We met with the other father today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう、ってそれだけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝❛I see,❜ that's all you have to say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝❛I see,❜ that's all you have to say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それ以外に何を言えと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What else do you expect me to say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What else do you expect me to say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで今更顔を見るようになったのさ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why'd he decide to show his face now after all this time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why'd he decide to show his face now after all this time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…あのひとはこの街にくるしかないのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...He had no choice but to come to this town.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...He had no choice but to come to this town.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「身元引受人が母さんたちだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Those two are the ones sponsoring his parole, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Those two are the ones sponsoring his parole, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんより…よく知ってるんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It seems you know more than Haruka-san... don't you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It seems you know more than Haruka-san... don't you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「何のために本家が釘を刺しにきたと思ってるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Why did you think the family showed up to warn me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Why did you think the family showed up to warn me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは肩をすくめた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san shrugged.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san shrugged.

MESSAGE.JP: そうか…そのために親戚が来ていたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: I see... so that's why her relatives had shown up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I see... so that's why her relatives had shown up.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「時間よ。寮へ戻りなさい、直枝理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's time. Get back to your dorm, Riki Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's time. Get back to your dorm, Riki Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは僕にそう告げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san informed me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san informed me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかってるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Fine...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Fine...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は自分の部屋に戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I went back to my own room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went back to my own room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ただいまー…って、誰もいないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm back... though it's not like anyone's here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm back... though it's not like anyone's here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おかえり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Welcome back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Welcome back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「部屋間違えた!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did I enter the wrong room!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did I enter the wrong room!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「合ってるぞ。別にいいだろう、待ってるのが俺でも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No, it's yours. But surely it's no problem for me to just wait here for you to get back, is it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No, it's yours. But surely it's no problem for me to just wait here for you to get back, is it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もちろんいいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, of course not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, of course not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where's Masato?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where's Masato?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「トイレじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I think he's in the bathroom?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I think he's in the bathroom?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はベッドに倒れ込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I flopped onto my bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I flopped onto my bed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whew...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whew...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「すぐ遊ぶ、というわけにはいかないようだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I guess you're not really in the mood for some fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I guess you're not really in the mood for some fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…最近、色々考えることが多くて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... I've had a lot on my mind lately.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... I've had a lot on my mind lately.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ね、謙吾」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が読んでいるのは恭介の漫画だろうか。見覚えがある。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo was reading a manga, I think it was Kyousuke's. I'd seen it before.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo was reading a manga, I think it was Kyousuke's. I'd seen it before.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、謙吾。真人は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, Kengo. Where's Masato?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, Kengo. Where's Masato?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「トイレじゃないのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝He's in the bathroom, I guess.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝He's in the bathroom, I guess.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「疲れたのか、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You tired, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You tired, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…最近、色々考えることが多くて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... lately I've had a lot on my mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... lately I've had a lot on my mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ね、謙吾」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が読んでいるのは剣道の本だろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo was reading a book on kendo... I think?
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo was reading a book on kendo... I think?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「両親がいても幸せとは限らないんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I learned that just because your parents are around doesn't automatically mean you're happy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I learned that just because your parents are around doesn't automatically mean you're happy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「幸せなことのほうが多いだろうが例外はあるだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well, I'm sure most people are happier that way, but there must be exceptions.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well, I'm sure most people are happier that way, but there must be exceptions.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんはその例外、なんだろうな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san would be one of those exceptions, I guess...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san would be one of those exceptions, I guess...❞

MESSAGE.JP: お互いを嫌悪して、憎み合って、傷つけてあって。
MESSAGE.EN: Being disgusted with and hating each other, hurting each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: Being disgusted with and hating each other, hurting each other.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…僕は正しいのかな、謙吾？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Is what I'm doing right, Kengo?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Is what I'm doing right, Kengo?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…そういうことは恭介に訊け」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...You should ask Kyousuke that kind of thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...You should ask Kyousuke that kind of thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「訊いたら教えてくれると思う？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If I asked him, do you think he'd tell me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If I asked him, do you think he'd tell me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「理樹はどう思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What do you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What do you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…今回は教えてくれない気がするな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I don't think he would...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I don't think he would...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「じゃあ、自分で考えるしかあるまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Then, there's nothing for it but to decide on the answer yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Then, there's nothing for it but to decide on the answer yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess you're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess you're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの調査は行き詰まっている。
MESSAGE.EN: My investigation with Haruka-san had hit a dead end.
MESSAGE.Translation: My investigation with Haruka-san had hit a dead end.

MESSAGE.JP: 両親たちは教えられない、と言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Her parents wouldn't tell her anything, for one.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her parents wouldn't tell her anything, for one.

MESSAGE.JP: 資料の中から証拠は見つからない。
MESSAGE.EN: And we couldn't find anything in any of the documents we had gone through.
MESSAGE.Translation: And we couldn't find anything in any of the documents we had gone through.

MESSAGE.JP: これ以上僕たちはどうしたらいいのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: What else were we supposed to do?
MESSAGE.Translation: What else were we supposed to do?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕たちは『見えないなにか』と戦っているのかもしれないなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's like we're fighting against an... ❛invisible something❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's like we're fighting against an... ❛invisible something❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: それは世界の…社会の仕組みというか。
MESSAGE.EN: Like we were up against the world... or the plot of a secret society, or something.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like we were up against the world... or the plot of a secret society, or something.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、違うな。
MESSAGE.EN: No, that's not right.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, that's not right.

MESSAGE.JP: 人が作り出した見えない鎖の輪みたいなものと戦っているのじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: It was more like we were struggling against an unseen chain whose links had been long forged by other people.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was more like we were struggling against an unseen chain whose links had been long forged by other people.

MESSAGE.JP: その輪は見えない刃でもある。
MESSAGE.EN: A chain whose links were sharp as blades.
MESSAGE.Translation: A chain whose links were sharp as blades.

MESSAGE.JP: ひととひとを分かつ、見えない刃。
MESSAGE.EN: Blades that could sever the connections between people. Unseen blades.
MESSAGE.Translation: Blades that could sever the connections between people. Unseen blades.

MESSAGE.JP: 対抗手段は容易に見つかりそうにはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There didn't seem to be any easy way to oppose it.
MESSAGE.Translation: There didn't seem to be any easy way to oppose it.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日は日直だったので早めに教室へ行かなければならない。
MESSAGE.EN: Today I was on day duty, so I had to get over to the classroom early.
MESSAGE.Translation: Today I was on day duty, so I had to get over to the classroom early.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: がらり、と扉を開けるともう先客がいた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I swung open the door, I saw that there was already someone there.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I swung open the door, I saw that there was already someone there.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん。おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san. Good morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san. Good morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おはよう、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Morning, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Morning, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは窓際の席に座っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was sitting by a window.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was sitting by a window.

MESSAGE.JP: 頬杖をついて校庭を眺めている。
MESSAGE.EN: With her chin on her hands, she was gazing out at the schoolyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: With her chin on her hands, she was gazing out at the schoolyard.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の教室で葉留佳さんを見るのは久しぶりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It had been a long time since Haruka-san had come over to my classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: It had been a long time since Haruka-san had come over to my classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今朝はどうかした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's up this morning?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's up this morning?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「特に何も」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Nothing special.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Nothing special.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんとなく来てみたくなったの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I just felt like coming to see you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I just felt like coming to see you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは立ち上がると、僕をじっと見た。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san stood up, and gazed fixedly at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san stood up, and gazed fixedly at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 右手をポケットに突っ込んだまま、葉留佳さんは何も言わない。
MESSAGE.EN: With her right hand in her pocket she stood there, saying nothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: With her right hand in her pocket she stood there, saying nothing.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…どうかした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで謝るの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why are you apologizing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why are you apologizing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんだか申し訳なくって。なんとなく、かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I just felt like I've done something wrong. Somehow, I don't really know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I just felt like I've done something wrong. Somehow, I don't really know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんとなくで謝らないでよ。葉留佳さんは何も悪くないんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't need to apologize for a reason like that. You haven't done anything wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't need to apologize for a reason like that. You haven't done anything wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が言うと、葉留佳さんは無言で笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: When I said that, Haruka-san silently smiled.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I said that, Haruka-san silently smiled.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…じゃ、またね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Well, I'll see you later, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Well, I'll see you later, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は葉留佳さんが教室を出て行ったあと、日直の仕事に取りかかった。
MESSAGE.EN: After Haruka-san left the classroom, I got down to performing the morning duties.
MESSAGE.Translation: After Haruka-san left the classroom, I got down to performing the morning duties.

MESSAGE.JP: 昼食後、ぼんやり考えていると真人が声をかけてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: After lunch, I was sitting around, spacing out, when Masato called out to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: After lunch, I was sitting around, spacing out, when Masato called out to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹、腹ごなしにミニバスケでもしねーか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki, let's do some mini-basketball or something to help with the digestion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki, let's do some mini-basketball or something to help with the digestion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「野球ばっかだったからな…たまにはいいだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝We've been doing nothing but baseball lately... sometimes you just need a little change, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝We've been doing nothing but baseball lately... sometimes you just need a little change, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んー…今日は止めとくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm... I think I'll pass today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm... I think I'll pass today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「考えたいこともあるしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's stuff I need to think about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's stuff I need to think about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あんまり考えてばっかいると体に毒だぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't you know that too much thinking is poisonous for your body?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't you know that too much thinking is poisonous for your body?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「毒が回りすぎるとおまえみたいになるしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝And if the poison spreads too far, he'll end up like you, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝And if the poison spreads too far, he'll end up like you, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだと!?だったら、オレはすげぇ考えてるみてぇになるじゃねぇか、何も考えてねーよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What was that!? When you say it like that, it almost makes me sound like I'm some kind of great thinker. I never think about nothin'!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What was that!? When you say it like that, it almost makes me sound like I'm some kind of great thinker. I never think about nothin'!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ほらほら、続きは学食の外でだ。理樹、行こう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Alright, alright, let's finish this outside. Let's go, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Alright, alright, let's finish this outside. Let's go, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、ふたりで行ってきてよ。僕はいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nah, you guys go on without me. I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nah, you guys go on without me. I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだ、つまらんな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Huh, how boring...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Huh, how boring...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「じゃあ、真人行くか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Then, let's go, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Then, let's go, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ。恭介と鈴も捕まえよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah. Let's see if we can pick up Kyousuke and Rin too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah. Let's see if we can pick up Kyousuke and Rin too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 昼食後、ぼんやり考えていると真人が声をかけてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: After lunch, I was sitting around, spacing out, when Masato called out to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: After lunch, I was sitting around, spacing out, when Masato called out to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹、腹ごなしにミニバスケでもしねーか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki, let's do some mini-basketball or something to help with the digestion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki, let's do some mini-basketball or something to help with the digestion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「野球ばっかだったからな…たまにはいいだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝We've been doing nothing but baseball lately... sometimes you just need a little change, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝We've been doing nothing but baseball lately... sometimes you just need a little change, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んー…今日は止めとくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm... I think I'll pass for today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm... I think I'll pass for today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「考えたいこともあるしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's stuff I need to think about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's stuff I need to think about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あんまり考えてばっかいると体に毒だぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't you know that too much thinking is poisonous for your body?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't you know that too much thinking is poisonous for your body?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「毒が回りすぎるとおまえみたいになるしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝And if the poison spreads too far, he'll end up like you, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝And if the poison spreads too far, he'll end up like you, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだと!?だったら、オレはすげぇ考えてるみてぇになるじゃねぇか、何も考えてねーよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What was that!? When you say it like that, it almost makes me sound like I'm some kind of great thinker. I never think about nothin'!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What was that!? When you say it like that, it almost makes me sound like I'm some kind of great thinker. I never think about nothin'!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ほらほら、続きは学食の外でだ。理樹はここにいるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Alright, alright, let's finish this outside. Are you going to stay here, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Alright, alright, let's finish this outside. Are you going to stay here, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どんだけ天才なんだよ、オレはっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Just how much of a genius am I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Just how much of a genius am I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人と謙吾を見送ってから、僕は再び考えに沈む。
MESSAGE.EN: After watching Masato and Kengo leave, I sank deep into thought again.
MESSAGE.Translation: After watching Masato and Kengo leave, I sank deep into thought again.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（葉留佳さんとの調査の行き詰まりどうしたものかな…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I wonder what we should do, now that Haruka-san's research has hit a dead end...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I wonder what we should do, now that Haruka-san's research has hit a dead end...)

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ここ、空いてる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Is this seat free?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Is this seat free?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、空いてるよ…って、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, it's free... Wait, Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, it's free... Wait, Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やは、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yaha, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yaha, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは小さな箱を抱えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was holding a small box.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was holding a small box.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ふー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Whew-...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Whew-...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはその箱を開ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san opened the box.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san opened the box.

MESSAGE.JP: 甘いバターの香りが漂った。
MESSAGE.EN: The sweet scent of butter wafted out.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sweet scent of butter wafted out.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やっとなんとか納得のいくシフォンケーキが焼けたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I think I finally got down how to bake chiffon cake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I think I finally got down how to bake chiffon cake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「厨房で焼いたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did you cook it in the cafeteria kitchen?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did you cook it in the cafeteria kitchen?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ううん。料理研のオーブンレンジ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No. I used the cooking club's oven.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No. I used the cooking club's oven.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「最初は門前払いだったけど。土下座したら使わせてくれたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They turned me away at first. But when I got down on my knees and begged, they finally let me use it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They turned me away at first. But when I got down on my knees and begged, they finally let me use it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「土下座って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Got down on your knees...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Got down on your knees...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ずっと頭下げてたら、おかしな子だって言われたけど貸してもらえたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I just kept my head bowed the whole time, so they said I was a weirdo but in the end let me in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I just kept my head bowed the whole time, so they said I was a weirdo but in the end let me in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはにこにこ笑っているけれど、僕はなんと言ったらいいかわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was smiling brightly, but I couldn't think of a thing to say to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was smiling brightly, but I couldn't think of a thing to say to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「プレーンシフォンだから生地の甘みだけじゃ物足りないかもだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's just plain chiffon, so I'm not sure if it'll be sweet enough by itself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's just plain chiffon, so I'm not sure if it'll be sweet enough by itself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「良かったら試食してみてー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If you'd like to, give it a little taste test...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If you'd like to, give it a little taste test...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん。じゃあ、いただきます…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S, sure. Alright, here goes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S, sure. Alright, here goes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 切られた欠片を口に入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I cut off a portion and put it in my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: I cut off a portion and put it in my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（あれ…？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Huh...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Huh...?)

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうかなぁ。柔らかさがなかなか出せずにいたんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝How is it? To tell the truth, I've been trying hard to make the cake soft enough...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝How is it? To tell the truth, I've been trying hard to make the cake soft enough...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「焼く時間とか色々調整してみたんだけどなんとかシフォンっぽくなったと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I baked a lot of them to find the right baking time, and I think at last I managed to make a pretty chiffon-y one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I baked a lot of them to find the right baking time, and I think at last I managed to make a pretty chiffon-y one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…ちょっとぱさぱさしてる感じがする）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...It tastes kind of dry.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...It tastes kind of dry.)

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（前、食べたもののほうが上手くできてたような…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(The one I ate before was a lot better than this...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(The one I ate before was a lot better than this...)

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あんまり、おいしくない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Is it... not that good?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Is it... not that good?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の反応を見て、葉留佳さんの顔が曇った。
MESSAGE.EN: As she gauged my reaction, Haruka-san's face clouded.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she gauged my reaction, Haruka-san's face clouded.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そんなことはないよ…んぐ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝T, that's not true... ngh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝T, that's not true... ngh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うーん、まだダメかー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Hmm, so it's another failure...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Hmm, so it's another failure...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは残念そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san looked deeply disappointed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san looked deeply disappointed.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やっぱり使い慣れたオーブンじゃないとダメかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I guess it's no good using an oven I've had no practice with...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I guess it's no good using an oven I've had no practice with...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「前のときは厨房のオーブンだったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You were using the cafeteria kitchen before?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You were using the cafeteria kitchen before?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん。今まではね。でも最近入れてもらえなくなっちゃったから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah. Up to now I was, but lately I haven't been able to get in to use it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah. Up to now I was, but lately I haven't been able to get in to use it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「失敗するときもあるよ、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, you can't win 'em all, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, you can't win 'em all, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうなんだけどー…いつも失敗ばっかりだから凹むなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's true, but... it's no good if you never get it right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's true, but... it's no good if you never get it right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうかな？　前のときは上手く焼けてたじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really? I thought the one you made before was pretty good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really? I thought the one you made before was pretty good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…前？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Before?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Before?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは怪訝そうな顔をした。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san made a puzzled expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san made a puzzled expression.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…前って…私、理樹くんにシフォン、持っていった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...By before you mean... I, gave Riki-kun a chiffon cake... before?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...By before you mean... I, gave Riki-kun a chiffon cake... before?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Eh?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Eh?)

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは左手の人差し指を額についた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san raised the index finger of her left hand to her temple in consternation.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san raised the index finger of her left hand to her temple in consternation.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あったかもしれない…ううん…まさかね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...It could have been... nah... It couldn't have...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...It could have been... nah... It couldn't have...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ごめん、理樹くん。なんでもない…忘れて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry, Riki-kun. It's nothing... forget about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry, Riki-kun. It's nothing... forget about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「まだまだ修行が足りないなぁ、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Looks like I still haven't had enough practice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Looks like I still haven't had enough practice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「調査、今日はどうしようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What are we gonna do about today's research?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What are we gonna do about today's research?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうだった。本題はそっちだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right. That was the real question of the hour.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right. That was the real question of the hour.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「書類もだめ、資料に手がかりなし、ときたら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There's nothing in the documents, not a single clue in all that stuff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There's nothing in the documents, not a single clue in all that stuff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もうどうしていいかわからないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't know what else we can do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't know what else we can do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が食卓で訊ねても、葉留佳さんのお母さんたちは教えてくれなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had asked them after that dinner, but Haruka-san's parents wouldn't answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had asked them after that dinner, but Haruka-san's parents wouldn't answer.

MESSAGE.JP: だとしたらあとはどうしたらいいんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: With that, what else was there left to do...
MESSAGE.Translation: With that, what else was there left to do...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そうだ、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Oh yeah, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Oh yeah, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝?❞

MESSAGE.JP: まだ手がかりはある。
MESSAGE.EN: There was still one more option.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was still one more option.

MESSAGE.JP: 話を訊くべき人間が残っている。
MESSAGE.EN: There was one more person we could ask.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was one more person we could ask.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…二木さんに訊いてみようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Let's ask Futaki-san about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Let's ask Futaki-san about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「嫌」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が口にすると、拒絶が返ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: The words had barely left my mouth as she shot them down.
MESSAGE.Translation: The words had barely left my mouth as she shot them down.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうして、あいつに話を訊かないといけないのっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Why should we have to ask her anything?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Why should we have to ask her anything?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「話すのも嫌だし、一緒の空気吸うのも嫌！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't want to talk to her, I don't even want to breathe the same air as her!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't want to talk to her, I don't even want to breathe the same air as her!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは膨れてそっぽを向いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san sulkily turned her gaze away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san sulkily turned her gaze away.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも葉留佳さんの知らないことを知ってるかもしれないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But she might know something you don't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But she might know something you don't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんなの訊きたくない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If she does, I don't want to hear it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If she does, I don't want to hear it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「訊きたくない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't want to talk to her!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't want to talk to her!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私のほうから頼んだから話してくれると思う？　はっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Even if I asked, do you think she'd tell me anything? Ha!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Even if I asked, do you think she'd tell me anything? Ha!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「教えてくれるわけないよっ。だって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There's no way she'd answer. I mean,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There's no way she'd answer. I mean,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今の状態があいつにとって都合が良いんだもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝she's probably enjoying this whole situation, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝she's probably enjoying this whole situation, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それを壊すようなことなんかするもんか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Why would she do anything to change it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Why would she do anything to change it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが二木さんを罵るとき、その瞳は濁ったような昏い光を放っている。
MESSAGE.EN: As she spoke ill of Futaki-san, Haruka-san's eyes shone with a dark, impure light.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she spoke ill of Futaki-san, Haruka-san's eyes shone with a dark, impure light.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「行き詰まりを打破できるかもしれないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But we might be able to get over this roadblock we've hit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But we might be able to get over this roadblock we've hit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕に向き直った葉留佳さんは、じっと僕を見つめた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san returned her gaze to mine, and I held it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san returned her gaze to mine, and I held it.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あいつになにか言われたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Did she say something to you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Did she say something to you?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…言われたんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...She did, didn't she...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...She did, didn't she...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゆらり、と伸びた左手が僕の腕を掴む。
MESSAGE.EN: Shakily, Haruka-san reached out her left hand and gripped my shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: Shakily, Haruka-san reached out her left hand and gripped my shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なにを言われたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What did she say to you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What did she say to you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「は、葉留佳さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ha, Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ha, Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いいよ。言って。大抵のこと、言われ慣れてるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's fine. Go ahead and say it. It's not like I haven't heard it all before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's fine. Go ahead and say it. It's not like I haven't heard it all before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「言って、いいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Say it, just say it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Say it, just say it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「な、何も言われてないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She, she didn't say anything to me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She, she didn't say anything to me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ほんと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、本当」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, really.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, really.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なら…いいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Then... that's fine, I guess.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Then... that's fine, I guess.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 腕を握る力が抜けた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her grip on my shoulder slackened.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her grip on my shoulder slackened.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ごめん、私、勝手な子だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Sorry, I'm such a selfish person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Sorry, I'm such a selfish person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「誰も彼も嘘つきなんて…思い込んじゃうなんて…いやな子だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I suspect anyone and everyone of being a liar... I'm such a... terrible person...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I suspect anyone and everyone of being a liar... I'm such a... terrible person...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは俯いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san hung her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san hung her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: それきり、沈黙が落ちる。
MESSAGE.EN: After that, an awkward silence fell upon us.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that, an awkward silence fell upon us.

MESSAGE.JP: 学食の喧噪がとても遠くから聞こえてくる気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt as if the usual sounds of the cafeteria were coming from afar.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt as if the usual sounds of the cafeteria were coming from afar.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はもうひとつ提案してみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to try something else.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to try something else.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それじゃ、もうひとりのお父さんに訊いてみようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, let's ask your other father.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, let's ask your other father.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…嫌」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が口にすると、弱々しい拒絶が返ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as I had said it, Haruka-san weakly voiced her rejection.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as I had said it, Haruka-san weakly voiced her rejection.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうしてあのひとに訊かなきゃいけないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Why should we ask that person?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Why should we ask that person?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも葉留佳さんの知らないことを知ってるかもしれないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's possible he might know something you don't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's possible he might know something you don't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんなの訊きたくない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't want to ask him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't want to ask him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「訊きたくない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't want to ask him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't want to ask him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私のほうから頼んだからって、話してくれるひとじゃないと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I doubt he's the kind of person who will tell me anything even if I ask him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I doubt he's the kind of person who will tell me anything even if I ask him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「教えてくれるわけないよ…それに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There's no way he'll answer my questions... and...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There's no way he'll answer my questions... and...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…なんでもない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Never mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Never mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは俯いて黙りこくった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san hung her head and fell silent again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san hung her head and fell silent again.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんはちゃんと話したことがないんだよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But you've never properly spoken with him, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But you've never properly spoken with him, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: それに…それに、葉留佳さんの父親が本当にそのひとであるのならば。
MESSAGE.EN: And... if that man really was Haruka-san's dad,
MESSAGE.Translation: And... if that man really was Haruka-san's dad,

MESSAGE.JP: 会って話をすることは無駄ではないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: you couldn't really call meeting and speaking with him pointless.
MESSAGE.Translation: you couldn't really call meeting and speaking with him pointless.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だったら一度訊ねてみたらどうかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We should go try asking him, at least once.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We should go try asking him, at least once.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…う…それは、そうなんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Uuu... I, I guess...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Uuu... I, I guess...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕も一緒にいってあげるから。ね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll be right there with you. Alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll be right there with you. Alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 上目遣いでちらちらと僕を見る葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san looked up at me from under her eyelashes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san looked up at me from under her eyelashes.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…理樹くんがついてきてくれるなら、訊きにいってみる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...If Riki-kun's coming with me, I'll go ask him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...If Riki-kun's coming with me, I'll go ask him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。そうしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. Let's do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. Let's do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 男はいつかのようにベンチにふんぞりかえって座っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We found the man reclining on a bench just like before.
MESSAGE.Translation: We found the man reclining on a bench just like before.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…いるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...There he is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...There he is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何をしているのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: What was he doing?
MESSAGE.Translation: What was he doing?

MESSAGE.JP: 辺りをじろじろ見ているので、必然的に通行人は遠ざかる。
MESSAGE.EN: He was just sitting there, glaring at the passersby who were giving him a wide berth.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was just sitting there, glaring at the passersby who were giving him a wide berth.

MESSAGE.JP: 近寄るのは怖いが、意を決して近づいた。
MESSAGE.EN: The thought of approaching him was frightening, but I sucked in a breath and walked over.
MESSAGE.Translation: The thought of approaching him was frightening, but I sucked in a breath and walked over.

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「…また来たのか、おまえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝...So you've showed up again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝...So you've showed up again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気圧される僕。
MESSAGE.EN: The pressure felt paralyzing.
MESSAGE.Translation: The pressure felt paralyzing.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、僕の後ろで小さくなっている葉留佳さんの存在が僕に口を開かせた。
MESSAGE.EN: But, when I remembered the small presence of Haruka-san behind me, I spoke up.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, when I remembered the small presence of Haruka-san behind me, I spoke up.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「話がある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We need to talk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We need to talk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「俺にはねぇよ。ガキに話すことはない。帰れ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝No we don't. I don't chat with brats. Go home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝No we don't. I don't chat with brats. Go home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「訊きたいことがあるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's something we want to ask you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's something we want to ask you.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Aaaa?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Aaaa?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「…ふん。何を訊きたいんだよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝...Hah. And what do you want to ask?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝...Hah. And what do you want to ask?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が質問を口にしようとしかけたその瞬間、
MESSAGE.EN: Just as I was forming the question,
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as I was forming the question,

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「って言うとでも思ったか？　バーカ。帰れ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Did you think I'd really say that? Idiot. Get outta here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Did you think I'd really say that? Idiot. Get outta here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「さっさと俺の目の前から消えねぇと、その顔、潰すぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Get yourself outta my sight right now, or I'll do your pretty face in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Get yourself outta my sight right now, or I'll do your pretty face in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「メスガキ連れて乳繰りあってろや。このクソガキどもが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Take that runt with you and go flirt around somewhere else. Damn brats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Take that runt with you and go flirt around somewhere else. Damn brats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「質問が、あるって言ってるっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm telling you there's something we want to ask you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm telling you there's something we want to ask you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「チっ…最近のガキはマジうぜぇのな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝God... brats these days don't know when to shut up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝God... brats these days don't know when to shut up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「なんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Whaddya want?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Whaddya want?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あなたは、三枝晶さんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you Shou Saigusa-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you Shou Saigusa-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: まずはここからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to start from there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to start from there.

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「ふん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Hmph.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Hmph.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男は鼻で笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: The man laughed through his nose.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man laughed through his nose.

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「違う。何度言ったらわかるんだ？　アホウどもが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝No. How many times I gotta tell ya? Idiot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝No. How many times I gotta tell ya? Idiot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…帰ろ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Let's leave, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Let's leave, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、でも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, Haruka-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, Haruka-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いいよ、もう…そもそも認めるつもりもないんだよ、このひと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's fine. This guy's not going to admit to anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's fine. This guy's not going to admit to anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「時間の無駄だよ。帰ろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's just a waste of time. Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's just a waste of time. Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さっさと身を翻す葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san turned and started away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san turned and started away.

MESSAGE.JP: しょうがなく僕も後を追った。
MESSAGE.EN: There was nothing for it, so I chased after her.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was nothing for it, so I chased after her.

MESSAGE.JP: 一瞬男が無表情を崩したように見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: For an instant, there was a shift in the man's emotionless face.
MESSAGE.Translation: For an instant, there was a shift in the man's emotionless face.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…どうしたものかな…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...What was that all about...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...What was that all about...)

MESSAGE.JP: 無言で歩く葉留佳さんに歩調を合わせながら、僕は考えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I hurried to catch up with the silent Haruka-san, I thought about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I hurried to catch up with the silent Haruka-san, I thought about it.

MESSAGE.JP: 休み時間、寮長室を訪ねた。
MESSAGE.EN: During a break, I went to talk with the dorm head.
MESSAGE.Translation: During a break, I went to talk with the dorm head.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「すみません、失礼します」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, excuse me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, excuse me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長は相変わらず忙しそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm head was as busy as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm head was as busy as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: 書類を段ボール箱に詰めている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was stacking documents into a cardboard box.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was stacking documents into a cardboard box.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「いらっしゃい…あら、直枝くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Welcome... ah, it's Naoe-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Welcome... ah, it's Naoe-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お仕事中にすみません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry to interrupt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry to interrupt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「いいのよ、別に。よっと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝No, it's fine. Hup...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝No, it's fine. Hup...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の視線に気がついたのか、寮長が仕事の内容を教えてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Following my gaze, the dorm head told me what she was working on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Following my gaze, the dorm head told me what she was working on.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「そろそろ指名の引き継ぎをする時期だからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝It's about time for me to pick a successor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝It's about time for me to pick a successor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「決まったんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Have you decided on one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Have you decided on one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ま、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝As a matter of fact, yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝As a matter of fact, yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「さて、と。何の用事かしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝And, so. What did you need?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝And, so. What did you need?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ひょっとして三枝さんのこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Is it about Saigusa-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Is it about Saigusa-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それもありますけど…どうですか、その後」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, there is that... How did that business end up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, there is that... How did that business end up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「うーん、私も気にかけてはいるんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Hmm, well I'd like to do something about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Hmm, well I'd like to do something about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「噂するな、とも言えないしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝But it's not like I can tell people to not gossip.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝But it's not like I can tell people to not gossip.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「…なんともいえないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝...There's really nothing I can say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝...There's really nothing I can say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長は口を濁した。
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm head's mouth twisted distastefully.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm head's mouth twisted distastefully.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうですか…あの、二木さん来てませんか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see... Well, is Futaki-san around?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see... Well, is Futaki-san around?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は当初の目的を思い出し、訊ねた。
MESSAGE.EN: I got back to my original reason for coming.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got back to my original reason for coming.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「委員会室にはいなかったので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She wasn't in the committee meeting room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She wasn't in the committee meeting room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「何の用？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Did you need something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Did you need something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 思わず僕はのけぞった。
MESSAGE.EN: I let out a yelp.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let out a yelp.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「い、いつからいたのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W, when did you get here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W, when did you get here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「さっきからいたわよ。そこで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I've been here for a while, right over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I've been here for a while, right over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぴ、と右人差し指で示す。
MESSAGE.EN: She jabbed her finger at where she had been standing.
MESSAGE.Translation: She jabbed her finger at where she had been standing.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「書類整理手伝ってたんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I've been helping sort through the papers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I've been helping sort through the papers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「全然気がつかなかった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I didn't notice you at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I didn't notice you at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…埋伏は風紀を乱す不埒な輩に近づくには必須のスキルよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...The ability to approach miscreants without being noticed is a necessary skill for a member of the disciplinary committee.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...The ability to approach miscreants without being noticed is a necessary skill for a member of the disciplinary committee.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「単に仕事してるときは無口すぎて存在感がないだけなんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I'd say it's more like when you're working, you're so silent no one notices your presence.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I'd say it's more like when you're working, you're so silent no one notices your presence.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…あーちゃん先輩。それはどういう意味ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...A-chan-senpai. What is that supposed to mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...A-chan-senpai. What is that supposed to mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「おお、怖い。いえいえ。なんでもありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Ohh, scary. I promise there was no deep meaning behind it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Ohh, scary. I promise there was no deep meaning behind it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと話があるんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I need to ask you about something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I need to ask you about something.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Ask me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Ask me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは眉根を寄せた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san knitted her brows.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san knitted her brows.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「話って何よ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What did you want to ask?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What did you want to ask?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「単刀直入に言うと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll get right to the point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll get right to the point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんの…二木さんたちのもうひとりのお父さんに、話を訊きたいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We went to see Haruka-san's... your and her other father.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We went to see Haruka-san's... your and her other father.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「昨日も会いにいったんだけど取り付くしまもなくて門前払いされた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We met him again yesterday, but he turned us away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We met him again yesterday, but he turned us away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…私にどうしろと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...And what is it you want from me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...And what is it you want from me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「せめてこちらの質問ぐらい伝えたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I want you to ask him on our behalf.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I want you to ask him on our behalf.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは微かに唸った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san let out an exasperated groan.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san let out an exasperated groan.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「何故、それを私に頼むの？　直枝理樹？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Pray, why have you chosen me for that task, Riki Naoe?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Pray, why have you chosen me for that task, Riki Naoe?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「理由はある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I have a reason.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I have a reason.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一つ、葉留佳さんはあのひとのことを写真でしか知らない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝One, Haruka-san only knows that person from a picture.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝One, Haruka-san only knows that person from a picture.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二つ、身元引き受けの事情についてはきみが話してくれた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Two, you're the one who mentioned his sponsorship to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Two, you're the one who mentioned his sponsorship to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「三つ、きみとあのひとは面識がありそうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Three, it follows that you likely know that person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Three, it follows that you likely know that person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは鼻を鳴らした。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san laughed through her nose.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san laughed through her nose.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それはなんともロジカルなことね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That all sounds so logical.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That all sounds so logical.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そうね。条件をのんでくれたら考えてもいいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Alright. If you accept my condition, I'll give it some thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Alright. If you accept my condition, I'll give it some thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「条件？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Condition?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Condition?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私と一緒に行くこと。どう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝We'll go together. How's that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝We'll go together. How's that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少し考え込んだ二木さんはそんな条件を出してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: After thinking for a moment, Futaki-san brought up her condition.
MESSAGE.Translation: After thinking for a moment, Futaki-san brought up her condition.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの条件を…
MESSAGE.EN: I guess I'll...
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess I'll...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ううん、あなたはあの子を救いたいんだな、と思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Oh, it's nothing, the thought just came to me that you wish to save that girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Oh, it's nothing, the thought just came to me that you wish to save that girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「救いたいんじゃない。手伝ってあげたいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't want to ❛save❜ her. I just want to help her out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't want to ❛save❜ her. I just want to help her out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どっちでも同じよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝They're the same thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝They're the same thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: また鼻で笑う二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: She laughed through her nose again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She laughed through her nose again.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰かを手伝うことが悪いこととでも言いたげだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you saying it's wrong to want to help someone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you saying it's wrong to want to help someone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「悪いとまでは言ってない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I never said it was wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I never said it was wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ただ、他人を救いたい、だなんて。ナニサマなの、と思っただけよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's simply your way of thinking you can just come along and save someone that I think is a little arrogant.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's simply your way of thinking you can just come along and save someone that I think is a little arrogant.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…まぁあの子にとってみれば神さまも同然か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Well, I guess to that child you're probably like some kind of Messiah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Well, I guess to that child you're probably like some kind of Messiah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女の独り言は聞いていると不快なことばかりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Listening to her soliloquy gave me an unpleasant feeling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Listening to her soliloquy gave me an unpleasant feeling.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は視線で続きを促した。
MESSAGE.EN: I let her know with my eyes that I'd prefer she got on with it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let her know with my eyes that I'd prefer she got on with it.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…それじゃ、行きましょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Well then, shall we go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Well then, shall we go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いますぐに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「勿論。時間がもったいないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Of course. No sense in wasting time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Of course. No sense in wasting time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さっさと歩き出すので僕は慌てて後を追った。
MESSAGE.EN: She started off, walking so abruptly I had to chase after her hurriedly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started off, walking so abruptly I had to chase after her hurriedly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…それはのめない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'll pass.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'll pass.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「じゃあこの話はなしにしましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Then that's the end of the discussion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Then that's the end of the discussion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh come on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh come on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「忙しいから、失礼するわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm quite busy, excuse me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm quite busy, excuse me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはさっさと寮長室へ戻っていってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: That said, Futaki-san went right back to the dorm heads' room.
MESSAGE.Translation: That said, Futaki-san went right back to the dorm heads' room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「しまった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Damn...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Damn...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんから話を聞く事ができなかったら…他に一体誰に聞けばいいんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: If I couldn't ask Futaki-san... just who was I going to ask.
