MESSAGE.Translation: If I couldn't ask Futaki-san... just who was I going to ask.

MESSAGE.JP: …これじゃ、手詰まりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was a stalemate.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was a stalemate.

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「…また来たのか、おまえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝...You're here again, huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝...You're here again, huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…父さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Father.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Father.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「ん…？　…佳奈多か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Hm...? ...Ah, it's you, Kanata.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Hm...? ...Ah, it's you, Kanata.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「この人の話を聞いてあげて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I want you to listen to this boy's questions.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I want you to listen to this boy's questions.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「なんだ、ガキ。おまえもスミに置けねぇな…ふたまたかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝What, kid. You're with this girl too? ...You player.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝What, kid. You're with this girl too? ...You player.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひゃはは、と下卑た笑いをしながら言うので僕はむっとする。
MESSAGE.EN: I frowned as he let out a loud, unpleasant laugh while spouting such crass things.
MESSAGE.Translation: I frowned as he let out a loud, unpleasant laugh while spouting such crass things.

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「やめておけ、こいつらは怖いぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝You should give it up, this girl's scary, ya know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝You should give it up, this girl's scary, ya know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「根っこの部分が壊れてやがるからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝They're twisted ones, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝They're twisted ones, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そんな話をしにきたんじゃないのよ、父さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's not what we came to discuss, father.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's not what we came to discuss, father.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「…へいへい。おっかねぇな、佳奈多」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝...Fine, fine. Don't get your panties in a knot, Kanata.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝...Fine, fine. Don't get your panties in a knot, Kanata.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「誰に似たんだ？　あいつか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Who do you take after? That guy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Who do you take after? That guy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「冗談だよ、冗談…睨むなよ、佳奈多」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝I'm joking, I'm joking... don't glare at me, Kanata.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝I'm joking, I'm joking... don't glare at me, Kanata.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男は肩をすくめた。
MESSAGE.EN: The man shrugged.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man shrugged.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんとは会話もするようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like he was pretty talkative with Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like he was pretty talkative with Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「話がある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I've got something to ask you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I've got something to ask you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「俺にはねぇよ。おまえに話すことはない。帰れ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝No you don't. I got nothing to say to you. Go home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝No you don't. I got nothing to say to you. Go home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「第一おまえは何様だ。他人に話す義理はねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝First of all, who the hell are you. I've got no obligation to talk to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝First of all, who the hell are you. I've got no obligation to talk to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「訊きたいことがあるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's something I need to ask you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's something I need to ask you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕にとっては大事な葉留佳さんについてだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's about Haruka-san, who is precious to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's about Haruka-san, who is precious to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は繰り返した。
MESSAGE.EN: I repeated myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I repeated myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 男は二木さんを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: The man looked at Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man looked at Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは無言だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「…言ってみろ、モヤシ野郎」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝...Spit it out, sprout.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝...Spit it out, sprout.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …っ。僕は唇を噛んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I bit my lip.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I bit my lip.

MESSAGE.JP: 深呼吸して、言葉を吐く。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I took a deep breath, and forced out the words.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I took a deep breath, and forced out the words.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あなたは三枝晶か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you Shou Saigusa?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you Shou Saigusa?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「そうだよ。それがどうした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Yeah, I am. What about it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Yeah, I am. What about it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あなたは…葉留佳さんの父親なのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you... Haruka-san's father?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you... Haruka-san's father?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男の表情が歪んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The man's face twisted.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man's face twisted.

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「…なんだと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝...What'd you say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝...What'd you say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「なんて、言った？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝What... did you just say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝What... did you just say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あなたは、三枝葉留佳の父親か、って訊いたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm asking if you're Haruka Saigusa's father.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm asking if you're Haruka Saigusa's father.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 返事はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: He didn't reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: He didn't reply.

MESSAGE.JP: 男はポケットから指の先ほどしかない煙草を取り出し口に咥えた。
MESSAGE.EN: The man pulled the dog-end of a cigarette out of his pocket and jammed it into his mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man pulled the dog-end of a cigarette out of his pocket and jammed it into his mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「おまえに答える義務はない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝I don't have to answer that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝I don't have to answer that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男の顔から小馬鹿にしたような笑みが消える。
MESSAGE.EN: The cocky smile had completely vanished from the man's face.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cocky smile had completely vanished from the man's face.

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「佳奈多。もう帰っていい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Kanata. You can leave now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Kanata. You can leave now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…父さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Father.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Father.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「帰れ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Go home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Go home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…でも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「でももシカもねぇ。帰れ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝No buts. Go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝No buts. Go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕をちらり、と見て、二木さんは僕を残して帰って行く。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san shot me a glance, then left without another word.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san shot me a glance, then left without another word.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は二木さんを見送る。
MESSAGE.EN: I watched Futaki-san go.
MESSAGE.Translation: I watched Futaki-san go.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんがいたらまずいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Would it have been bad had she stayed?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Would it have been bad had she stayed?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沈黙。
MESSAGE.EN: Silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Silence.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は、返事が発せられるまで、じっと待つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I waited for him to answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I waited for him to answer.

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「…それを知ってどうしたいんだ、おまえは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝...What are you gonna do, if I tell you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝...What are you gonna do, if I tell you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今までとは違う口調に僕は驚く。
MESSAGE.EN: He spoke to me in a tone that was in stark contrast with the one he'd been using.
MESSAGE.Translation: He spoke to me in a tone that was in stark contrast with the one he'd been using.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたい、ってそれは…はっきりさせたいだけなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All I want to do... is just to set things straight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All I want to do... is just to set things straight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どっちが本当の親なのか、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Figure out which one the real father is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Figure out which one the real father is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「本当、ねぇ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝The ❛real❜ one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝The ❛real❜ one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男は鼻で笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: The man gave a spiteful laugh.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man gave a spiteful laugh.

MESSAGE.JP: その笑い方は誰かにそっくりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: A laugh that seemed very familiar.
MESSAGE.Translation: A laugh that seemed very familiar.

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「本当の親を知りたいってか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝You say you want to know which is the real one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝You say you want to know which is the real one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「それを知ってどうする？　真実を知ったって現実は何も変わらねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝What are you gonna do then? Knowing the truth won't change anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝What are you gonna do then? Knowing the truth won't change anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「…世間様にはな、生まれてからすぐ赤ん坊の首を絞める親がいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝...In this world, there are parents who would strangle their children as soon as they're out of the womb.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝...In this world, there are parents who would strangle their children as soon as they're out of the womb.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「言葉もしゃべれないガキに熱湯ぶっかけるヤツもいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝There's parents who burn their mute kids with boiling water.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝There's parents who burn their mute kids with boiling water.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「自分の道具みたいに扱って自殺に追い込む人間もいるだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝And there's people who use their kids as tools and drive them to suicide.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝And there's people who use their kids as tools and drive them to suicide.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「…そんなのは沢山いるんだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝...There are loads of people just like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝...There are loads of people just like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「そいつらみたいな親が『本当の親』の姿だったらどうするんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝If the ❛real father❜ was a guy like that, then what would you do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝If the ❛real father❜ was a guy like that, then what would you do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「そいつらにおまえは同じことを訊ねる気になるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Would you still be interested in asking those kinds of parents the same question?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Would you still be interested in asking those kinds of parents the same question?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「本当がどうとか、知ったって百害あって一利無しだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝If that were the truth, all it would bring is pain, not a single benefit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝If that were the truth, all it would bring is pain, not a single benefit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「だからおまえの質問には答えねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝That's why I'm not gonna answer your question.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝That's why I'm not gonna answer your question.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひょっとして…ひょっとして、二木さんは知っているんじゃないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So... So, does Futaki-san know the answer?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So... So, does Futaki-san know the answer?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「…さぁ、どうだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝...Hmph, who knows.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝...Hmph, who knows.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「知らないのは葉留佳さんだけなのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is Haruka-san the only one who doesn't?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is Haruka-san the only one who doesn't?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男@「さぁね。知らないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man@❝Beats me. No idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man@❝Beats me. No idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …男はうそぶくだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The man was obviously lying.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The man was obviously lying.

MESSAGE.JP: 中庭のベンチで考え込んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I sat on a bench in the courtyard, lost in thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sat on a bench in the courtyard, lost in thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんと今後について話し合うため待ち合わせをしていたのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was waiting for Haruka-san to show up so we could talk.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was waiting for Haruka-san to show up so we could talk.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…結局、誰も本当のことを話すつもりがないんだ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...In the end, seems like no one is inclined to tell the truth.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...In the end, seems like no one is inclined to tell the truth.)

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりの父親も、ひとりの母親も、二木さんも。
MESSAGE.EN: Not either of the fathers, nor the mother, nor Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not either of the fathers, nor the mother, nor Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんも胸のうちすべてを語っていない気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: And I got the feeling Haruka-san wasn't telling me everything, either.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I got the feeling Haruka-san wasn't telling me everything, either.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（僕は葉留佳さんを助ける立場に酔いたいだけなのかもしれない）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Maybe I'm just too drunk on the thought of appearing as some kind of a hero to Haruka-san.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Maybe I'm just too drunk on the thought of appearing as some kind of a hero to Haruka-san.)

MESSAGE.JP: そんな考えが浮かぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: That thought floated to the surface.
MESSAGE.Translation: That thought floated to the surface.

MESSAGE.JP: 『誰かを誰かが救う』という言葉には傲慢な響きがある。
MESSAGE.EN: For someone to ❛save❜ someone, that idea had an arrogant sound to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: For someone to ❛save❜ someone, that idea had an arrogant sound to it.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんが指摘したとおりに。
MESSAGE.EN: It was just like Futaki-san had said.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was just like Futaki-san had said.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（それでも…それでも、僕は誰かの助けになりたいんだ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Even so... If a person is in need, I still want to be able to help them.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Even so... If a person is in need, I still want to be able to help them.)

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が遠い昔、助けてもらったように。
MESSAGE.EN: The same way I had been helped such a long time ago.
MESSAGE.Translation: The same way I had been helped such a long time ago.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰かが苦しんでいるのであれば、僕はその誰かの力になってあげたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: If someone was in trouble, I wanted to be able to help that person.
MESSAGE.Translation: If someone was in trouble, I wanted to be able to help that person.

MESSAGE.JP: さっきまで晴れていた空は、沈んだ気持ちに連動したみたいに曇り始めている。
MESSAGE.EN: The sky, which had been clear until now, seemed to feel my emotions and grew cloudier.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sky, which had been clear until now, seemed to feel my emotions and grew cloudier.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ、いたいた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, there you are...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, there you are...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こにちわ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Afternoon, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Afternoon, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ベンチの隣に座っていいかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Is it alright if I share the bench with you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Is it alright if I share the bench with you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、もちろんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, of course.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, of course.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「考え事？　ちょっとお休みしようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Thinking about something? You should take a break.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Thinking about something? You should take a break.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほら、シフォンケーキ焼いてきたからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Here, I baked a chiffon cake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Here, I baked a chiffon cake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「前、リクエストしてもらったとおりジャムも持ってきたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And I brought some jam like you requested last time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And I brought some jam like you requested last time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは赤や紫の色とりどりの小さなジャムの小袋を見せてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san showed me the bag with red and purple jams that she'd brought.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san showed me the bag with red and purple jams that she'd brought.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「リンゴに、ブルーベリー。イチゴとバターも持ってきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There's apple and blueberry. Strawberry and butter, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There's apple and blueberry. Strawberry and butter, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: バターナイフと調理に使う小さなハサミまである。
MESSAGE.EN: She had a butter knife as well as a small pair of scissors.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had a butter knife as well as a small pair of scissors.

MESSAGE.JP: 用意周到だ。
MESSAGE.EN: She had prepared meticulously.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had prepared meticulously.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは赤や紫の色とりどりの小さなジャムの袋を見せてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san showed me the small bag with red and purple jams that she'd brought.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san showed me the small bag with red and purple jams that she'd brought.

MESSAGE.JP: バターナイフと調理に使う小さなハサミまである。
MESSAGE.EN: She had a butter knife as well as a small pair of scissors.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had a butter knife as well as a small pair of scissors.

MESSAGE.JP: 用意周到だ。
MESSAGE.EN: She had prepared meticulously.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had prepared meticulously.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、マーマレードは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm, where's the marmalade?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm, where's the marmalade?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…え？　…忘れちゃった。ごめんごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Eh? ...Oh, sorry, I forgot it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Eh? ...Oh, sorry, I forgot it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今回も上手くできたと思うよ。食べて食べて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I think I did a good job again this time. Go ahead and take a bite.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I think I did a good job again this time. Go ahead and take a bite.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ありがとう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, thanks...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, thanks...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 菓子箱の中から切り分けられたシフォンケーキが出てくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I cut off a slice of the chiffon cake in the cake box.
MESSAGE.Translation: I cut off a slice of the chiffon cake in the cake box.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとつ摘んで口に入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a piece of the slice and ate it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a piece of the slice and ate it.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん、お行儀わるいよ。フォーク出してるのにー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, that's bad manners. I brought forks and all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, that's bad manners. I brought forks and all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 生地がふわっととけて美味しい。
MESSAGE.EN: The cake melted in my mouth deliciously.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cake melted in my mouth deliciously.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ…こないだよりおいしいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh... it's way better than before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh... it's way better than before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そう？　ありがと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Is it? Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Is it? Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この前のはちょっとぱさぱさしてたっていうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The one before was just a little dry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The one before was just a little dry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ぱさぱさ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Dry?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Dry?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「生地の感じがね、ちょっと違ったんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The texture, you know? It was a little different...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The texture, you know? It was a little different...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだろう。何かひっかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: What was it? Something seemed out of place.
MESSAGE.Translation: What was it? Something seemed out of place.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…練習の成果、かな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I guess that's the result of my training?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I guess that's the result of my training?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうかも…っと、と？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I guess that's it... Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I guess that's it... Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 紙ナプキンを取ろうとして、フォークが肘にひっかかった。
MESSAGE.EN: As I tried to grab a paper napkin, the fork caught on my sleeve.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I tried to grab a paper napkin, the fork caught on my sleeve.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 地面に落ちたフォークを慌てて取ろうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurriedly made to pick up the fork that had fallen to the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurriedly made to pick up the fork that had fallen to the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: ごちんっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Bump*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bump*.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ow!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ow!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二人して屈んだため、額をぶつけてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: As both of us bent down for the fork, our foreheads hit.
MESSAGE.Translation: As both of us bent down for the fork, our foreheads hit.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「い、痛いよ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝T, that hurt, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝T, that hurt, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ご、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S, sorry!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S, sorry!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何度か間近で見たことがあっても、やっぱりドキドキする。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though we'd been seeing each other every day, my heart started pounding.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though we'd been seeing each other every day, my heart started pounding.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふわり、とミントのいい香りがする。
MESSAGE.EN: I caught a light scent of mint.
MESSAGE.Translation: I caught a light scent of mint.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの前髪の匂いかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the scent from Haruka-san's hair...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the scent from Haruka-san's hair...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…いたた、意外とソコツなんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Owww, you're surprisingly careless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Owww, you're surprisingly careless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 拾ったフォークを赤紫のマーブル模様なハンカチで拭きながら言う葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san admonished me as she wiped the fallen fork clean with a red and purple handkerchief.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san admonished me as she wiped the fallen fork clean with a red and purple handkerchief.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「たまたまだよ、でも、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Only occasionally, but sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Only occasionally, but sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちはベンチに座りなおした。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of us leaned back on the bench again.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of us leaned back on the bench again.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ま、まぁいいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝W, well, it's fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝W, well, it's fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはジャムの小袋を切る為かハサミを手に取ろうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san deftly cut open the small jam pouches with the scissors.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san deftly cut open the small jam pouches with the scissors.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、伸ばした右手を不意に引っ込めた。
MESSAGE.EN: But then she abruptly withdrew her right hand that was about to offer them to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: But then she abruptly withdrew her right hand that was about to offer them to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…先に、プレーンでじっくり食べてもらったほうがいいかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...We should probably see what it tastes like plain, first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...We should probably see what it tastes like plain, first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、もうプレーンのは食べたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, but I've already had it plain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, but I've already had it plain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「つまみ食いでしょ、ほら。食べて食べて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That was just a tiny bit. Here, eat up, eat up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That was just a tiny bit. Here, eat up, eat up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと押し込まないでっ…んぐっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, you don't have to shove it... mmnm!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, you don't have to shove it... mmnm!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「残っちゃったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's still some left over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's still some left over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「余りは真人くんたちにあげてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You can give the rest to Masato-kun and the rest of the guys.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You can give the rest to Masato-kun and the rest of the guys.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'll do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'll do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 甘いものをおなかに入れて、沈んだ気持ちが少し回復したような気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: Having eaten something sweet, my sunken feeling seemed to clear up a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having eaten something sweet, my sunken feeling seemed to clear up a little.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんも同じような心地なのか、ぽつりと呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san must have been feeling the same way. She murmured something softly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san must have been feeling the same way. She murmured something softly.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やっぱり、ここで止めようかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wonder if we should stop here, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wonder if we should stop here, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…調査のこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You mean the research?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You mean the research?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん。親たちが教えてくれないんじゃどうしようもないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah. If my parents don't want to talk, there's really nothing for it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah. If my parents don't want to talk, there's really nothing for it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに、親たちが非協力的では僕らには打つ手なしだった。
MESSAGE.EN: True enough, there was little we could do if her parents refused to cooperate.
MESSAGE.Translation: True enough, there was little we could do if her parents refused to cooperate.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「止める、って言ったら軽蔑する？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If I said ❛let's stop,❜ would you be upset?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If I said ❛let's stop,❜ would you be upset?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の隣に座った葉留佳さんは俯いたままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san didn't meet my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san didn't meet my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「考えてみればね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, if you think about it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, if you think about it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が三枝晶の子供じゃなかったら、あいつがそうだってことになるんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If it turns out I'm not Shou Saigusa's kid, that means she is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If it turns out I'm not Shou Saigusa's kid, that means she is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「つまり…私が今度はあいつを追い詰めちゃうことになる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝In other words... this time it'd be me backing her into a corner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝In other words... this time it'd be me backing her into a corner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんなことになったら、私…どうしたらいいか、わかんない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If it turns out like that, I... I don't really know what I should do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If it turns out like that, I... I don't really know what I should do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今度はあいつが私とおんなじ目にあうなんて、考えると…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I feel a pang thinking of her going through the same thing I have...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I feel a pang thinking of her going through the same thing I have...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だって、結局それはマイナスを押しつけ合っているだけだと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I mean, it'd just be shoving all the negative stuff onto someone else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I mean, it'd just be shoving all the negative stuff onto someone else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんなの、誰も幸せになれないと、思う…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't think something like that will end up making anyone happy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't think something like that will end up making anyone happy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だからもう止めた方がいいと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's why I think it'd be best if we stopped here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's why I think it'd be best if we stopped here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは顔を上げて微笑んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san raised her head and smiled.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san raised her head and smiled.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どっちがいいと思う？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What do you think we should do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What do you think we should do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: その問いに、僕はどう答えるべきか迷った。
MESSAGE.EN: I was stuck as to how to answer that question.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was stuck as to how to answer that question.

MESSAGE.JP: ここで、諦めていいのかな…？
MESSAGE.EN: Is it really alright to give up here...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is it really alright to give up here...?

MESSAGE.JP: もう、諦めたほうがいいのかな…？
MESSAGE.EN: Isn't it enough already...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Isn't it enough already...?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「諦めても…いいと、思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think it's alright... to give it up here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think it's alright... to give it up here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手がかりは全く得られていない。
MESSAGE.EN: We hadn't managed to find a single clue.
MESSAGE.Translation: We hadn't managed to find a single clue.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの言うことも一理あると僕は思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I figured that Haruka-san had a point.
MESSAGE.Translation: I figured that Haruka-san had a point.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それで、葉留佳さんが納得するならば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you're really all right with it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you're really all right with it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ジョーカーを引くのには慣れてるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm used to drawing the old maid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm used to drawing the old maid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ調査はおしまい、かな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then I guess that's it for the research...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then I guess that's it for the research...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうだね。今までありがとう、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah. Thanks for all the help, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah. Thanks for all the help, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いいよ、気にしないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Naw, don't mention it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Naw, don't mention it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ううん。本当に、ほんとうに、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No. I'm serious. Really, thank you so much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No. I'm serious. Really, thank you so much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは頭を下げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san bowed her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san bowed her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そろそろ行くね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I'd better get going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I'd better get going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。シフォンケーキおいしかったよ。ごちそうさま」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright. The chiffon cake was delicious. Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright. The chiffon cake was delicious. Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どういたしまして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're welcome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You're welcome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 立ち上がった葉留佳さんは僕の横にくると、ちょいちょい、と手招きをした。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san stood up and shifted over to my side, then made a beckoning gesture to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san stood up and shifted over to my side, then made a beckoning gesture to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何、葉留佳さん…っ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is it, Haruka-san...!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is it, Haruka-san...!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちゅ、とほっぺたに温かい感触。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a sudden soft, warm feeling against my cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a sudden soft, warm feeling against my cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: ふわり、と鼻腔をミントの匂いがくすぐった。
MESSAGE.EN: The faint scent of mint filled my nostrils.
MESSAGE.Translation: The faint scent of mint filled my nostrils.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「は、葉留佳さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H, Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H, Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはは、お礼だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahaha, it's a thank-you gift.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahaha, it's a thank-you gift.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「も、もう…びっくりしたよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝G, geez... you surprised me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝G, geez... you surprised me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「単なるお礼だよ。だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's just a simple thank-you. So...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's just a simple thank-you. So...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…私のこと、これ以上好きになっちゃ――」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Falling for me any more――❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Falling for me any more――❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ダメ、だからね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝is a no-no, okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝is a no-no, okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: と、くすくす笑いながら葉留佳さんは右の人差し指を唇に当てた。
MESSAGE.EN: And with a soft chuckle, Haruka-san touched her right index finger to her lips.
MESSAGE.Translation: And with a soft chuckle, Haruka-san touched her right index finger to her lips.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ばいばい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Bye-bye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Bye-bye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が二の句を継げないでいると、葉留佳さんはさっさと歩き去ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: While I was still trying to work out what she had just said to me, Haruka-san walked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: While I was still trying to work out what she had just said to me, Haruka-san walked away.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（ホントに脈絡ないんだから…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(She really is so random...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(She really is so random...)

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は苦笑した。
MESSAGE.EN: I smiled bitterly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I smiled bitterly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…諦めない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...We're not giving up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...We're not giving up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え、どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh, why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh, why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 違和感のある問い。
MESSAGE.EN: There was something strange in her voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was something strange in her voice.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、もしかしたら。
MESSAGE.EN: Could it be?
MESSAGE.Translation: Could it be?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、どういう心変わり？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, have you had a change of heart?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, have you had a change of heart?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どういうって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あんなに二木さんを罵ってたのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I mean, you're always saying bad things about Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I mean, you're always saying bad things about Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんないきなり達観したようなことを言って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now all of a sudden you're thinking objectively about the whole thing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now all of a sudden you're thinking objectively about the whole thing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…きみは、誰だ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just who... are you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just who... are you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「遅れてごめん、理樹く…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry I'm late, Riki-ku――❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry I'm late, Riki-ku――❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は振り返った。
MESSAGE.EN: I spun around.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spun around.

MESSAGE.JP: …葉留佳さんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え、あ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh, ah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh, ah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だ、誰？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝W, who?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝W, who?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 目の前の女の子から笑みが消える。
MESSAGE.EN: The smile had vanished from the face of the girl in front of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The smile had vanished from the face of the girl in front of me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…二木さん…か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Are you... Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Are you... Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『彼女』は答えない。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛She❜ didn't answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛She❜ didn't answer.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん…これ、ど、どういうこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun... this... Wh, what's going on here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun... this... Wh, what's going on here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: シフォンケーキ。
MESSAGE.EN: Chiffon cake.
MESSAGE.Translation: Chiffon cake.

MESSAGE.JP: 薄荷とマーマレード。
MESSAGE.EN: Mint and marmalade.
MESSAGE.Translation: Mint and marmalade.

MESSAGE.JP: 右手とハサミ。
MESSAGE.EN: Right hand and scissors.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right hand and scissors.

MESSAGE.JP: 違和感の正体。
MESSAGE.EN: That feeling of something being out of place.
MESSAGE.Translation: That feeling of something being out of place.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんでこんなことを」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Why would you do this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Why would you do this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…きみは…どうしてこんなことを！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Why... Why would you do something like this!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Why... Why would you do something like this!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何をしているのかきみはわかってるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you even understand what you're doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you even understand what you're doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ねぇ説明してよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, please explain this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, please explain this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こんなことをなぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why do this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why do this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ねぇってばっ、理樹くんっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, come on!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, come on!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…葉留佳さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうしたの？　どうして…私と同じかっこうを…してるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What's going on? Why... does that person... look just like me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What's going on? Why... does that person... look just like me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ベンチに近寄ってきた葉留佳さんは呆然と呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Drawing near the bench, Haruka-san murmured to herself in shock.
MESSAGE.Translation: Drawing near the bench, Haruka-san murmured to herself in shock.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うそ…どうして…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...No way... why...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...No way... why...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…シフォン、ケーキ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Chiffon... cake?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Chiffon... cake?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「嘘」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's a lie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's a lie.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「嘘だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝This has to be a lie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝This has to be a lie.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うそだ…うそだ…こんなの、認めないっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's a lie... it's a lie... I won't believe this!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's a lie... it's a lie... I won't believe this!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ベンチの上にあったシフォンケーキやジャムを手で払い落とした。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san swept the chiffon cake and jam off the bench and they fell onto the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san swept the chiffon cake and jam off the bench and they fell onto the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはハサミを握ってぶるぶると震えている。
MESSAGE.EN: She then grabbed the scissors and held them up, trembling violently.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then grabbed the scissors and held them up, trembling violently.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「は、葉留佳さん…、葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H, Haruka-san... Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H, Haruka-san... Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…だって、だって…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I mean, I mean...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I mean, I mean...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 無言のまま、『彼女』は身を翻した。
MESSAGE.EN: Without saying anything, ❛she❜ took off running.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without saying anything, ❛she❜ took off running.

MESSAGE.JP: 呆然と見送る僕の視界に『彼女』を追う葉留佳さんが見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I stood there, dumbfounded by the shocking reality, I saw Haruka-san go chasing off after ❛her.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: As I stood there, dumbfounded by the shocking reality, I saw Haruka-san go chasing off after ❛her.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕も追いかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I started after the both of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started after the both of them.

MESSAGE.JP: 晴れていたはずの中庭に、急に影が差す。
MESSAGE.EN: Though it had been a sunny day, the courtyard was suddenly cloaked in shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though it had been a sunny day, the courtyard was suddenly cloaked in shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: …光が遮られるよりも早く、雨が降り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And as soon as the light had faded, it began to rain.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And as soon as the light had faded, it began to rain.

MESSAGE.JP: 次第に暗くなっていく空の下、ふたりの葉留佳さんを追う。
MESSAGE.EN: Under the darkening sky, I chased the two Harukas.
MESSAGE.Translation: Under the darkening sky, I chased the two Harukas.

MESSAGE.JP: 言い争う声が、雨音に混じって聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear arguing voices over the sound of the rain.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear arguing voices over the sound of the rain.

MESSAGE.JP: そこで僕が見たのは葉留佳さんの後ろ姿。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I saw Haruka-san from behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I saw Haruka-san from behind.

MESSAGE.JP: そして――『彼女』は指を目に当て、視線を僕に向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Then―― ❛she❜ applied a finger to her eyes, and looked right at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then―― ❛she❜ applied a finger to her eyes, and looked right at me.

MESSAGE.JP: ゆっくりと、髪留めが、解かれる。
MESSAGE.EN: And slowly, she pulled loose the bands tying her hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: And slowly, she pulled loose the bands tying her hair.

MESSAGE.JP: ぱしゃり。
MESSAGE.EN: *Zing*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Zing*.

MESSAGE.JP: 水たまりに、ふたつ波紋が広がる。
MESSAGE.EN: In a puddle of water, two ripples spread.
MESSAGE.Translation: In a puddle of water, two ripples spread.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんと似て異なるその姿…その表情に僕は気圧された。
MESSAGE.EN: That face, so alike yet so different from Haruka-san's... with an overpowering expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: That face, so alike yet so different from Haruka-san's... with an overpowering expression.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「また…また…騙そうとしたんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Again... again... you've been cheating me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Again... again... you've been cheating me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いつもそうだ…そうやって、私を馬鹿にして…っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's always, always like this, you're always making an idiot of me...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's always, always like this, you're always making an idiot of me...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「みじめな私を笑っているでしょっ！　自分がなんでもできるから！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're just laughing at how pathetic I am! Because you're free to do whatever you want!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You're just laughing at how pathetic I am! Because you're free to do whatever you want!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いつも、いつも私から奪っていっただけのくせに高みから見下ろして！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Always, you always snatch everything away from me and then look down on me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Always, you always snatch everything away from me and then look down on me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いい加減にしてよっ！　もう、私を馬鹿にするのは止めてよぉ…っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Would you just stop it! Stop playing me for a fool already...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Would you just stop it! Stop playing me for a fool already...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「嘘つき！　優等生のフリしてる偽善者！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Liar! You hypocrite pretending to be miss perfect!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Liar! You hypocrite pretending to be miss perfect!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 雨脚が、少し弱くなった。
MESSAGE.EN: The drizzle began to lighten up.
MESSAGE.Translation: The drizzle began to lighten up.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あんたは…卵アレルギーがあるって…触れないって…ゆったくせに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Even though you... you told me you were allergic to eggs... that you couldn't even touch them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Even though you... you told me you were allergic to eggs... that you couldn't even touch them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 水たまりに映る二木さんの顔が嘲りで歪む。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san's face, reflected in the puddle, twisted in scorn.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san's face, reflected in the puddle, twisted in scorn.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そんなの、あなたがそう思いこんでいただけよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You just convinced yourself to think that on your own.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You just convinced yourself to think that on your own.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「思いこみは世界の有り様…視界を曇らせるものよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You see the world through your presumptions... and they cloud your vision.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You see the world through your presumptions... and they cloud your vision.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「慣れないカラコンまでしたのにバレちゃうなんてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's a shame I got found out like this, even after going through the trouble of wearing contacts.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's a shame I got found out like this, even after going through the trouble of wearing contacts.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「でもバレちゃったのはしょうがないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But now that I got caught, it's all the same.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But now that I got caught, it's all the same.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…卵に触れないことなんてないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...It's not that I can't touch eggs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...It's not that I can't touch eggs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「強いて言うなら、柑橘類がダメだったりするのよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝If you really must know, it's citrus fruits that I have a problem with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝If you really must know, it's citrus fruits that I have a problem with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うそだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Liar.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Liar.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「嘘じゃない。本当のこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm not lying. It's the truth.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm not lying. It's the truth.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「食べたの…？　あんたのを食べたの？　理樹くんが？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Did Riki-kun... Did he eat your cake? Did he?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Did Riki-kun... Did he eat your cake? Did he?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「食べたわよ。おいしい、って言ってくれたわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝He ate it. He told me it was delicious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝He ate it. He told me it was delicious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたのはまずかったって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And that yours was horrible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And that yours was horrible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うそだ…うそだよ、そんなの、うそだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Liar... You're lying, that's... gotta be a lie...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Liar... You're lying, that's... gotta be a lie...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うそだよぅ…っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's a lie...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's a lie...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんなのでたらめだ！　でまかせ言ってるだけだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's bull! You're just saying that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's bull! You're just saying that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あんたの言うことなんか、わた、私…絶対に信じてなんかやるもんかっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I, I won't... I can't believe a single thing you say!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I, I won't... I can't believe a single thing you say!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「じゃあ訊いてみればいいじゃない？　彼に訊いてみなさいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Then why don't we ask him? Just ask him about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Then why don't we ask him? Just ask him about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うそだ…うそだうそだうそだうそだ…っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Liar... lieslieslieslies...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Liar... lieslieslieslies...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…だましたんだ…私のフリして…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...You tricked him... pretending to be me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...You tricked him... pretending to be me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「だってしょうがないじゃない？　私とあなたとでは『違う』のよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Well there's no helping it, is there? There's that ❛difference❜ between you and I.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Well there's no helping it, is there? There's that ❛difference❜ between you and I.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたと私じゃ、誰だって私を選ぶでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Between you and me, obviously anyone would pick me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Between you and me, obviously anyone would pick me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「『誰だって』ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝❛Anyone❜ at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝❛Anyone❜ at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それを…そんなことを、また示すためだけに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Just... just to rub that in my face again, you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Just... just to rub that in my face again, you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「認めなさいよ。あなたはあなたでしかない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Just accept it. The fact that you are you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Just accept it. The fact that you are you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それだけのことよ。ねぇ、直枝理樹？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's all there is to it. Right, Riki Naoe?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's all there is to it. Right, Riki Naoe?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それ以上、理樹くんに話しかけないでっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Don't you dare say another word to Riki-kun!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Don't you dare say another word to Riki-kun!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 激高する葉留佳さんには視線を逸らして僕を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: Enraged, Haruka-san tore her gaze away from her and turned it to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Enraged, Haruka-san tore her gaze away from her and turned it to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なぁに？　三枝葉留佳のくせに独占欲？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What's this? So Haruka Saigusa has a monopoly on him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What's this? So Haruka Saigusa has a monopoly on him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それが叶うわけがない、って知ってるくせに…ホントおめでたいわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You should know well that you won't be able to keep him all to yourself... You really are an optimist.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You should know well that you won't be able to keep him all to yourself... You really are an optimist.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それで、彼氏にバレちゃったわけだけど。どうしよう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝So, now that your boyfriend has uncovered the truth... what next?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝So, now that your boyfriend has uncovered the truth... what next?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言葉と裏腹に彼女は楽しげでさえあった。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite her words, Futaki-san seemed to be enjoying herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite her words, Futaki-san seemed to be enjoying herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そんなにうろたえちゃって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You look terribly upset.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You look terribly upset.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ふふっ、うろたえるのも無理はないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Fufu, well I guess I can't fault you for that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Fufu, well I guess I can't fault you for that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「取り柄だと思ってたんだものね？　卵を使った料理」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Did you really think you had some special talent for it? Cooking those egg dishes, I mean.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Did you really think you had some special talent for it? Cooking those egg dishes, I mean.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うるさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Shut up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Shut up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「他の料理はからっきしダメだもんね、あなたは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're hopeless with any other kind of dish, aren't you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're hopeless with any other kind of dish, aren't you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うるさい…だまれ…だまれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Stop it... shut up... shut up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Stop it... shut up... shut up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「でも、それもヘタっぴなのよね、得意だと思っててもその程度なんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But, you're not even that good with egg dishes, that's the reality no matter how you may think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But, you're not even that good with egg dishes, that's the reality no matter how you may think.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝――!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝――!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 蔑みの視線に耐えられなくなったのか、葉留佳さんは拳を握り締めて俯いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Unable to hold up under Futaki-san's disdainful gaze, Haruka-san hung her head and gripped her fist tightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Unable to hold up under Futaki-san's disdainful gaze, Haruka-san hung her head and gripped her fist tightly.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたの彼氏さんもまずいものはまずい、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Your boyfriend said so too, that it was bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Your boyfriend said so too, that it was bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だまれ…だまれ、だまれぇぇぇぇっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Shut up... shut up, SHUT UP!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Shut up... shut up, SHUT UP!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を跳ね上げた葉留佳さんは二木さんに掴みかかろうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's head snapped up, and she reached out to grab Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's head snapped up, and she reached out to grab Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は慌てて葉留佳さんを抑える。
MESSAGE.EN: I restrained Haruka-san in a panic.
MESSAGE.Translation: I restrained Haruka-san in a panic.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「離してよ、離してっ、離せえぇぇっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Let me go, let go, LET GO!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Let me go, let go, LET GO!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん！　葉留佳さん、落ち着いて！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san! Haruka-san, calm down!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san! Haruka-san, calm down!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、わた、私、頑張ったのに…頑張ってたのに…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I, I, I tried too... I tried my best...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I, I, I tried too... I tried my best...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あんたは…あんたは、私から全部奪い取っちゃう…奪い取っちゃうんだ…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But you have to come... and, and snatch it all away... you take everything from me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But you have to come... and, and snatch it all away... you take everything from me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…じゃえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...ie...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...ie...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 呟きが漏れた。
MESSAGE.EN: A murmured word slipped out of her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: A murmured word slipped out of her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「しんじゃえっ!!　あんたなんかいなくなっちゃえ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝JUST DIE!! You should just disappear!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝JUST DIE!! You should just disappear!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あんたがいなければ、私、こんなじゃなかったのにっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If you weren't here, I wouldn't be like this!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If you weren't here, I wouldn't be like this!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あんたがいたからっ！　あんたのせいで私、私はぁっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's because you're here! It's all your fault! Yours!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's because you're here! It's all your fault! Yours!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「しんじゃぇぇぇっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝DIEEEEE!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝DIEEEEE!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは暴れて叫ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was screaming violently.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was screaming violently.

MESSAGE.JP: 堰を切ったかのように感情が流れ出る。
MESSAGE.EN: Her feelings were flooding out with the force of a broken dam.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her feelings were flooding out with the force of a broken dam.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…ふん。悲劇のヒロイン気取り？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Aw. Trying for the tragic heroine routine?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Aw. Trying for the tragic heroine routine?❞

MESSAGE.JP: けれど二木さんは鼻を鳴らし、言い放った。
MESSAGE.EN: But all Futaki-san did was snap another snide comment.
MESSAGE.Translation: But all Futaki-san did was snap another snide comment.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「自分だけが不幸だと思っているあなたには反吐がでるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're so convinced that you're the victim here, it makes me want to vomit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're so convinced that you're the victim here, it makes me want to vomit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「世界で一番辛いのは自分だと哀れんでほしいのよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You crave to be the most pathetic person on the planet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You crave to be the most pathetic person on the planet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「慰めてくれれば誰だっていいくせに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Even though you're just fishing for pity from whoever will give it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Even though you're just fishing for pity from whoever will give it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「構ってくれればなんでもいいくせに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝As long as you're cared for, everything's fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝As long as you're cared for, everything's fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…良かったわね、哀れんでくれるひとがいて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Isn't it great, you found someone to shower pity on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Isn't it great, you found someone to shower pity on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「慰めてくれるひとがいて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Someone to comfort you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Someone to comfort you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「構ってくれるひとがいて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Someone to care for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Someone to care for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「でもね、そんなのは幻…夢のようなもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But that's just an illusion... just a happy dream.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But that's just an illusion... just a happy dream.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「人は人を救えない。あなたも彼もまた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Nobody can save anyone else. Not you, nor him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Nobody can save anyone else. Not you, nor him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「神さまじゃないのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're not a god.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're not a god.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「う、う、うあーーーーーーーーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝U, u, uwaa――――――!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝U, u, uwaa――――――!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはとうとう僕を振り払って、二木さんに体を突っ込ませた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san shook me off and dove at Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san shook me off and dove at Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「は…葉留佳さんっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ha... Haruka-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ha... Haruka-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 怒りに任せた突進は軽くかわされてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: She was completely consumed by rage.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was completely consumed by rage.

MESSAGE.JP: そのとき僕は気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: That's when I noticed it.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's when I noticed it.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの左手に握られた小さなハサミ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was clutching the scissors in her left hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was clutching the scissors in her left hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 握られて突き出されたそれは切っ先が震えている。
MESSAGE.EN: As she thrust them forward, I could see the pointed end of the scissors trembling.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she thrust them forward, I could see the pointed end of the scissors trembling.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…どうしたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...What now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...What now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 静かで冷たい声がした。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice was cold and quiet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice was cold and quiet.

MESSAGE.JP: ぴたり、と葉留佳さんの動きが止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's movements stopped.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's movements stopped.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「もっと真剣にやりなさいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Come at me seriously.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Come at me seriously.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私が憎いんでしょ？　居なくなったほうがいいんでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You hate me, right? You want me dead, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You hate me, right? You want me dead, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「だったら真面目に突きなさい！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Then come at me like you mean it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Then come at me like you mean it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それであなたの気が済むのならね！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Then you'll be satisfied, right!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Then you'll be satisfied, right!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: けれど葉留佳さんはそれ以上踏み込まない。
MESSAGE.EN: But Haruka-san didn't take another step.
MESSAGE.Translation: But Haruka-san didn't take another step.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「はっ！　その覚悟もないの？　クズはどこまでいってもクズね！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Ha! You're not even prepared to do that much? Trash is trash, no matter how you look at it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Ha! You're not even prepared to do that much? Trash is trash, no matter how you look at it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「とんだお笑いぐさだわ。そんなだから、あなたはロクデナシだと言われるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What a joke. It's because of things like this that people always call you a good-for-nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What a joke. It's because of things like this that people always call you a good-for-nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「一生恨みを抱えて地べたをはいずり回っているがいいわ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝So just keep on clutching onto that grudge of yours for the rest of your life and crawl back to your hole!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝So just keep on clutching onto that grudge of yours for the rest of your life and crawl back to your hole!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は葉留佳さんからハサミを取り上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: I managed to pry the scissors away from Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I managed to pry the scissors away from Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんを背後に庇う形にして距離をあける。
MESSAGE.EN: I protectively forced some distance between the two.
MESSAGE.Translation: I protectively forced some distance between the two.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…こんなことをして何になるんだっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What the hell was the point of all this!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What the hell was the point of all this!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうまでして、何故葉留佳さんを追い詰める？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you've been doing all this, why were you also hounding Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you've been doing all this, why were you also hounding Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が気がつかなかったら…どうなっていたのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: If I hadn't noticed... just what would have happened?
MESSAGE.Translation: If I hadn't noticed... just what would have happened?

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「何度言わせるつもりなの？　あなたは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝How many times are you going to make me repeat myself?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝How many times are you going to make me repeat myself?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「繰り返すのも馬鹿らしい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝So stupid, having to say it again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝So stupid, having to say it again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「まぁ、いいわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But, whatever...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But, whatever...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…拠り所を全て失くせば、元に戻るからよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...If I take away everything she grasps onto, she'll finally be forced to revert.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...If I take away everything she grasps onto, she'll finally be forced to revert.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「元に戻る？　こんな葉留佳さんがきみのいう元の姿なのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Revert? You mean this is who she really is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Revert? You mean this is who she really is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…あなたには何もわからないでしょうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I'm sure there's no way you understand any of this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I'm sure there's no way you understand any of this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「きみも…あの親戚たちの同類だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're... the same as those relatives of yours.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're... the same as those relatives of yours.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんをいたぶった連中と同じだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The same as all the others who bully Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The same as all the others who bully Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉に、二木さんの唇が引きつった。
MESSAGE.EN: When I said that, Futaki-san's lips stiffened.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I said that, Futaki-san's lips stiffened.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 間を置いて、二木さんが言う。
MESSAGE.EN: After a moment of silence, Futaki-san spoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a moment of silence, Futaki-san spoke.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたの主観にすぎないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's just your selfish opinion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's just your selfish opinion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 疲れた老人のような呟きだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She muttered something an old lady would say.
MESSAGE.Translation: She muttered something an old lady would say.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「きみは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「きみは、本当にそう思うのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you really think that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you really think that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 悲しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was sad.

MESSAGE.JP: とても悲しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Really sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: Really sad.

MESSAGE.JP: なぜ傷つけ合わなければいけないのだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: Why do people feel the need to hurt each other like this?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why do people feel the need to hurt each other like this?

MESSAGE.JP: どうしていがみ合わなければならないのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Why do people have to fight like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: Why do people have to fight like this.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そうだ、と言ったら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And if I said that I did?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And if I said that I did?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ここまでする理由はなぜだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Why did you do all this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Why did you do all this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「理由？　理由なんて、ないわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Why? I don't have a reason.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Why? I don't have a reason.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「嘘をつくな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't lie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't lie.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「嘘をつくな、と言われても無理よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's pointless telling me not to lie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's pointless telling me not to lie.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…ずっと私はウソツキだから。物心ついたときからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I'm a born liar. I've been lying since the day I was born.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I'm a born liar. I've been lying since the day I was born.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「さようなら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Farewell.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Farewell.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 呟きみたいな挨拶だけ残して、二木さんの姿は視界から消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Leaving behind that toneless word, Futaki-san disappeared from my sight.
MESSAGE.Translation: Leaving behind that toneless word, Futaki-san disappeared from my sight.

MESSAGE.JP: 何事か、と遠巻きに見ている野次馬たちの傘の花。
MESSAGE.EN: A crowd that had been drawn by the commotion stood at a distance, their umbrellas like a garden of flowers.
MESSAGE.Translation: A crowd that had been drawn by the commotion stood at a distance, their umbrellas like a garden of flowers.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と視線があったひとたちはそそくさと立ち去った。
MESSAGE.EN: The people who met my gaze hurriedly turned to go on their way.
MESSAGE.Translation: The people who met my gaze hurriedly turned to go on their way.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は立ちつくす葉留佳さんを黙って抱き寄せた。
MESSAGE.EN: I put my arms around Haruka-san, who was standing stock still.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put my arms around Haruka-san, who was standing stock still.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはいきなり僕に抱きつくと、嗚咽した。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san suddenly returned my embrace, and broke down into sobs.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san suddenly returned my embrace, and broke down into sobs.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ごめん、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'm sorry, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm sorry, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぽんぽん、と背中を叩いてあやした。
MESSAGE.EN: I patted her back softly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I patted her back softly.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うう…うぁ…ぁ…うっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uuu... uwa... a... uu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uuu... uwa... a... uu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: にわか雨が通り過ぎた後も、葉留佳さんはなかなか泣きやまなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even when the sudden rain had ran its course, Haruka-san still hadn't stopped crying.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even when the sudden rain had ran its course, Haruka-san still hadn't stopped crying.

MESSAGE.JP: 家の前につくまで僕たちは無言だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of us were silent until we arrived at her house.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of us were silent until we arrived at her house.

MESSAGE.JP: ひんやりとした葉留佳さんの左手を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked down at Haruka-san's left hand, which felt chilly to my touch.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked down at Haruka-san's left hand, which felt chilly to my touch.

MESSAGE.JP: ぎゅ、と握られた力の強さ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was clasping my hand tightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was clasping my hand tightly.

MESSAGE.JP: それは僕に対する葉留佳さんの気持ちの強さだと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: For that moment, I believed the strength of her grip was a reflection of the strength of her feelings toward me.
MESSAGE.Translation: For that moment, I believed the strength of her grip was a reflection of the strength of her feelings toward me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、ついたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, we're here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, we're here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「家…入らないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't you want to... go inside?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't you want to... go inside?❞

MESSAGE.JP: あんな出来事のあとじゃ寮に居られそうもない。
MESSAGE.EN: After what had happened, I doubted she would be able to go back to the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: After what had happened, I doubted she would be able to go back to the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 家まで送ってあげたかったのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: So I had walked her all the way to her home.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I had walked her all the way to her home.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…かえっちゃうの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Are you going home?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Are you going home?❞

MESSAGE.JP: かすれ声が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice cracked a little as she asked the question.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice cracked a little as she asked the question.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…帰って欲しいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Do you want me to go home?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Do you want me to go home?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはぶんぶん、と首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san shook her head fervently.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san shook her head fervently.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いっしょに、いて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Stay, with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Stay, with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…かえらないで、理樹くん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Don't go away, Riki-kun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Don't go away, Riki-kun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 家の中はしん、と静まりかえっている。
MESSAGE.EN: The inside of her house was silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: The inside of her house was silent.

MESSAGE.JP: 幸いなことに、家族は誰もいないようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Happily, it looked like no one was home.
MESSAGE.Translation: Happily, it looked like no one was home.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「落ち着いた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Feeling better?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Feeling better?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ごめんね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Sorry, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Sorry, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謝らなくてもいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't need to apologize.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't need to apologize.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「また、みっともないトコ、見せちゃったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I've shown you something shameful again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I've shown you something shameful again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「みっともなくなんてないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It wasn't anything to be ashamed of.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It wasn't anything to be ashamed of.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「悔しいけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It eats at me to say it, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It eats at me to say it, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「悔しいけど、あいつの言ったこと、ほんと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It eats at me to say it, but what she said is the truth.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It eats at me to say it, but what she said is the truth.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「料理を教えてくれるひともいなかったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There was no one around to teach me how to cook,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There was no one around to teach me how to cook,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「卵料理しかできないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝so egg dishes are the only thing I can make.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝so egg dishes are the only thing I can make.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…私だけの取り柄だと思ってたんだけどなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I used to think it was my specialty, or something...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I used to think it was my specialty, or something...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あいつに出来なくて、私が出来ること、もう無くなっちゃった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Looks like I've lost the one thing I thought I could do that she couldn't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Looks like I've lost the one thing I thought I could do that she couldn't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなことない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんなことあるよ…私、やっぱりヤクタタズのロクデナシで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It is true... I, I really am a worthless good-for-nothing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It is true... I, I really am a worthless good-for-nothing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなこと、ない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not true!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not true!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…じゃあ、私に出来ることって、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Then, what can I do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Then, what can I do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「直ぐに答えられないんだ。やっぱり、ないんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No answer comes to mind, right? There isn't anything, really.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No answer comes to mind, right? There isn't anything, really.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 温もりが離れる。
MESSAGE.EN: The warmth was leaving Haruka-san's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: The warmth was leaving Haruka-san's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんをじっと見た。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked straight into her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked straight into her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There is something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There is something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…それはなに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...What is that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...What is that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕に好かれることができる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You were able to make me fall for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You were able to make me fall for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは、目を見開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san's eyes widened.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san's eyes widened.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「彼女は、そうじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's something she couldn't do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's something she couldn't do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゆるゆると葉留佳さんの表情が緩む。
MESSAGE.EN: Her expression softened.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her expression softened.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あは…自惚れ屋さんだよ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Aha... You're being kinda conceited, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Aha... You're being kinda conceited, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「自分が好きになるということが、価値があるとでも言ってるみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You make it sound like being liked by you is something special.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You make it sound like being liked by you is something special.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの頬にぽろぽろと涙がこぼれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Tears were rolling down Haruka-san's cheeks.
MESSAGE.Translation: Tears were rolling down Haruka-san's cheeks.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それ以外に好きという言葉に何の意味があるのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is there any other meaning for the word ❛love❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is there any other meaning for the word ❛love❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「恥ずかしい台詞だよ理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's such an embarrassing line, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's such an embarrassing line, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰も聞いてないから平気」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No one can hear, so it's fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No one can hear, so it's fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が、聞いてるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I can hear you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I can hear you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって葉留佳さんに聞かせてるんだから当たり前だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's because I wanted you to be the one to hear it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's because I wanted you to be the one to hear it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝N...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝N...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そっと唇を合わせた。
MESSAGE.EN: Our lips met softly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our lips met softly.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…でも、私、ひょっとしたら誰でもいいのかもしれないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...But, I, I might be the kind of person who doesn't care who it is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...But, I, I might be the kind of person who doesn't care who it is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「本当は、ほんとうは、好きになってくれるのなら誰でもいいのかもしれないよ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The truth is... The truth is, it could be I don't care who it is, as long as they love me...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The truth is... The truth is, it could be I don't care who it is, as long as they love me...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それでもいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…それでもいい。僕が好きなのは変わらないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's fine. Even if that's true, it won't change my love for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's fine. Even if that's true, it won't change my love for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 隣に座った葉留佳さんの指をぎゅっと握る。
MESSAGE.EN: I sat down next to Haruka-san and entwined my fingers with hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sat down next to Haruka-san and entwined my fingers with hers.

MESSAGE.JP: それからゆっくり口づけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I slowly kissed her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I slowly kissed her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、大丈夫だから、安心して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So it's alright, you don't have to worry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So it's alright, you don't have to worry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「う…うん…ぐす」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A... alright... heh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A... alright... heh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ぉんと…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...eally...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...eally...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、本当だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, really.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, really.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも、でも、でも私…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But, but... but I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But, but... but I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんに迷惑ばっかりかけてたし…振り回してたし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm always causing you trouble, Riki-kun... and exploiting our friendship...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm always causing you trouble, Riki-kun... and exploiting our friendship...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それに、私は、…私は、やっぱり人に選んでもらえる資格なんて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And I... I still don't think I deserve someone to love me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And I... I still don't think I deserve someone to love me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ストップ。変わらない、ってさっき言ったよ、僕は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Stop. I just told you that I'm not going to change my mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Stop. I just told you that I'm not going to change my mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…でも、あいつのほうが…だって…あいつの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...But, she's so much... I mean... she's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...But, she's so much... I mean... she's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: また葉留佳さんが大泣きし始めそうになったので、僕は慌てて髪を撫でる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san looked like she was going to start sobbing again, so I started stroking her hair in alarm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san looked like she was going to start sobbing again, so I started stroking her hair in alarm.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うう…ぇくっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uuu... *sniffle*...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uuu... *sniffle*...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「安心して。僕が盗られるなんてことはない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't worry. I won't get stolen away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't worry. I won't get stolen away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから泣かないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So don't cry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So don't cry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん…わかった…そうだね…気がついてくれたんだもんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah... I understand... It's true, you noticed it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah... I understand... It's true, you noticed it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あいつが私じゃない、って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That she wasn't me, I mean...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That she wasn't me, I mean...❞

MESSAGE.JP: すん、と葉留佳さんは鼻をすすった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san sniffled loudly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san sniffled loudly.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nn...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nn...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Nnn...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Nnn...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…はぁ…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Haa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Haa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 唇を離したあと、葉留佳さんは心底安心したかのようにため息を吐いた。
MESSAGE.EN: As our lips parted, Haruka-san let out a relaxed sigh from deep within her chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: As our lips parted, Haruka-san let out a relaxed sigh from deep within her chest.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なに、葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What, Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What, Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もう少し、そばに居てよ、理樹くん…それだけでいいから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Just stay close to me a little longer, Riki-kun... Then I'll be alright...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Just stay close to me a little longer, Riki-kun... Then I'll be alright...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから…ひとりに…しない、で…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So... just don't leave me... alone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So... just don't leave me... alone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: すぅ、と寝息が聞こえだした。
MESSAGE.EN: Her breathing rapidly turned shallower until she was fast asleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her breathing rapidly turned shallower until she was fast asleep.

MESSAGE.JP: 安心したのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: The relief must have finally got to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: The relief must have finally got to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は好きな女の子がせめて夢の中で安らかにいられますように、と祈らずにはいられなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: All I could do was pray for the girl I loved to be able to at last find peace, if even only in her dreams.
MESSAGE.Translation: All I could do was pray for the girl I loved to be able to at last find peace, if even only in her dreams.

MESSAGE.JP: んん…？
MESSAGE.EN: Hmm...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Hmm...?

MESSAGE.JP: 一瞬自分がどこにいるかわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: For a moment I had no idea where I was.
MESSAGE.Translation: For a moment I had no idea where I was.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Huh, I...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Huh, I...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 目の上を何か温かいものが覆っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Something warm was covering my forehead.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something warm was covering my forehead.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…起きた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...You awake?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...You awake?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの声。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard Haruka-san's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard Haruka-san's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 段々記憶が蘇ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Little by little, my memory came back to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Little by little, my memory came back to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ…そうか…僕、葉留佳さんの部屋で」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah... that's right... I'm in Haruka-san's room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah... that's right... I'm in Haruka-san's room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …葉留佳さんの手を握りながら寝ちゃったのか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I had fallen asleep while holding Haruka-san's hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I had fallen asleep while holding Haruka-san's hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…今、何時？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What time... is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What time... is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もう門限過ぎちゃったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's already past curfew.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's already past curfew.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「起こそうと思ったけど、寝顔見ていたかったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I was gonna wake you up, but... I wanted to keep watching your sleeping face.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I was gonna wake you up, but... I wanted to keep watching your sleeping face.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、いいよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nah, it's fine...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nah, it's fine...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで目隠ししてるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why are you covering my eyes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why are you covering my eyes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「膝枕してるから、見上げられるの恥ずかしい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You were kinda sleeping on my lap, so it'll be embarrassing if you look up...❞
