MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You were kinda sleeping on my lap, so it'll be embarrassing if you look up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そっか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝O, oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝O, oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…理樹くんの寝顔見ながら考えてたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I was thinking while I watched your sleeping face.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I was thinking while I watched your sleeping face.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぽつり、と葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san sighed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san sighed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どんなこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What were you thinking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What were you thinking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うちの親たちはどうだったのかなって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I was wondering how it was for my parents.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I was wondering how it was for my parents.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が感じたみたいに、好きなひとに抱きしめて貰えたのかなって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wonder if they felt like I do now, being able to hold and be held by the one I love.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wonder if they felt like I do now, being able to hold and be held by the one I love.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、お子様だったからかもしれないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I, I don't know if maybe it was because I'm childish, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I, I don't know if maybe it was because I'm childish, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「好きなひとの腕の中にいるだけで安心できたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I can only feel safe in the arms of someone I love.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I can only feel safe in the arms of someone I love.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「心の隙間が埋められていくみたいで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's like it patches up a hole in my heart...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's like it patches up a hole in my heart...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…それでね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...And...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...And...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それで思ったんだけど、しきたりに従ったのかな、二人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...you see, I wonder if that's what those two also thought, back then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...you see, I wonder if that's what those two also thought, back then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんたちの二人のお父さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you talking about your two fathers?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you talking about your two fathers?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん。二人のひとに好きって言ったのかな、うちの母親は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep. I wonder if my mother told them both that she loved them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep. I wonder if my mother told them both that she loved them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんなの変だと思う…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And I was thinking how that was just weird...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And I was thinking how that was just weird...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「嫌だと思わなかったのかな…私ならヤだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wonder if she really didn't hate the situation... If it were me, I would have hated it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wonder if she really didn't hate the situation... If it were me, I would have hated it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「好きなのは一人だけでいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝All I need is one person to love.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝All I need is one person to love.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうして、二人いる状況に耐えられたのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wonder why those two put up with it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wonder why those two put up with it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ひょっとしたら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Maybe...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Maybe...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二人とも、葉留佳さんのお母さんが好きだったのかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe they both really loved your mother.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe they both really loved your mother.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…母親も二人が好きだったから成り立ったの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...And so my mother loved both of them in return...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...And so my mother loved both of them in return...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇ葉留佳さん。二人のお父さんの関係、訊いたことある？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Haruka-san. Have you ever asked what the relationship between your two fathers was?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Haruka-san. Have you ever asked what the relationship between your two fathers was?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そういえば、ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Now that you brought it up, no, I haven't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Now that you brought it up, no, I haven't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりの父親とひとりの母親。
MESSAGE.EN: Two fathers and one mother.
MESSAGE.Translation: Two fathers and one mother.

MESSAGE.JP: その間にどんないきさつがあり、どんな感情のやりとりがあったのか。
MESSAGE.EN: What had been the real circumstances between them, their genuine feelings?
MESSAGE.Translation: What had been the real circumstances between them, their genuine feelings?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どんな気持ちだったんだろうね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wonder what they were feeling...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wonder what they were feeling...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ふしぎ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's odd.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's odd.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何が不思議なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's odd?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's odd?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だって…今まで、私がどうやって生まれたのか、なんて思わなかったんだもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I mean... before now, I never even wondered about the stuff that led up to me being born.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I mean... before now, I never even wondered about the stuff that led up to me being born.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうして私は生まれてきたんだろう、ってことばかり考えてた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I just kept mulling over the reason that I had been born.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I just kept mulling over the reason that I had been born.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私、自分のことしか考えてなかったのかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wasn't thinking of anyone but myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wasn't thinking of anyone but myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うちの親たちは、どうしてそんなことをしたのかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wonder why our folks did such a thing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wonder why our folks did such a thing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「訊いてみようよ、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's ask them, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's ask them, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしてなのか、を」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's ask them why.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's ask them why.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん。そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah. You're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah. You're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ふぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Fuaa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Fuaa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、ベッドに入ってしっかり寝たほうがいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, you should get to bed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, you should get to bed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時計がないからわからないが、日付はもう変わっている時刻だろう。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no clock so I couldn't tell, but I figured it was already well past midnight.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no clock so I couldn't tell, but I figured it was already well past midnight.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうだね。そうする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're right. I'll do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You're right. I'll do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぱちん。電気を消す音。
MESSAGE.EN: *Click*. She turned off the light.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Click*. She turned off the light.

MESSAGE.JP: ごそごそ、と布団の音。
MESSAGE.EN: And then there was a rustling sound from the futon.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then there was a rustling sound from the futon.

MESSAGE.JP: 視界は真っ暗なままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was pitch black.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was pitch black.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は立ち上がり、ドアノブを握った。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up and grasped the doorknob.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up and grasped the doorknob.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ソファ使っていいよ。タオルケットあると思う…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You can use the sofa. I think there are blankets there...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You can use the sofa. I think there are blankets there...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「みかんの模様のやつのが私のだから。それ使ってほしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The one with the tangerine print is mine. Use that one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The one with the tangerine print is mine. Use that one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「匂いあんまり嗅いじゃイヤだよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Don't go smelling it too much, 'kay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Don't go smelling it too much, 'kay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「し、しないよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I, I'm not going to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I, I'm not going to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはは…冗談だよ。じゃ、おやすみ理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha... just kidding. Alright, g'night, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha... just kidding. Alright, g'night, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、おやすみ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, good night...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, good night...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドアを閉めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I closed the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I closed the door.

MESSAGE.JP: 階段を下りながら考える。
MESSAGE.EN: As I descended the stairs, I thought to myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I descended the stairs, I thought to myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが変わりつつある。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was changing, little by little.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was changing, little by little.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、事態の解決の役に立ちそうな気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt that we might yet be able to come to a resolution for the current situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt that we might yet be able to come to a resolution for the current situation.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「お待たせ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sorry to keep you waiting, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sorry to keep you waiting, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「行こっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Shall we go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Shall we go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 校門の前で待ち合わせをし、僕たちは葉留佳さんの家に向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: After meeting in front of the school gate, the two of us headed toward Haruka-san's house.
MESSAGE.Translation: After meeting in front of the school gate, the two of us headed toward Haruka-san's house.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「寮長とかに何か言われなかった？　理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Did the dorm head say anything, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Did the dorm head say anything, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大丈夫だったよ、真人が上手くやってくれたみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think it's fine, Masato covered for me pretty well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think it's fine, Masato covered for me pretty well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「真人くんには感謝しなくっちゃね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Guess I'll have to thank Masato-kun, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Guess I'll have to thank Masato-kun, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…今日はお父さんたち、いる日なんだっけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...So your parents should be here today, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...So your parents should be here today, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 門扉の前の葉留佳さんは緊張しているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Once we were standing in front of the gate, Haruka-san paused with a nervous look.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once we were standing in front of the gate, Haruka-san paused with a nervous look.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん。大丈夫」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...'kay. It'll be fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...'kay. It'll be fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いこ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Let's go, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Let's go, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの手を握り、僕は門扉に手を掛けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I took Haruka-san's hand in mine, and with the other I reached out to open the gate.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took Haruka-san's hand in mine, and with the other I reached out to open the gate.

MESSAGE.JP: 食卓に会話はない。
MESSAGE.EN: The dinner table was silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dinner table was silent.

MESSAGE.JP: かちゃかちゃと食器と箸が立てる音がしている。
MESSAGE.EN: There was just the clattering of the plates and utensils.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was just the clattering of the plates and utensils.

MESSAGE.JP: こんな空気の中では、食べるのが苦痛でしょうがなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was an agony trying to eat normally in that kind of atmosphere.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was an agony trying to eat normally in that kind of atmosphere.

MESSAGE.JP: 料理はこんなに美味しそうなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though the food itself was delicious.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though the food itself was delicious.

MESSAGE.JP: まるで、砂を噛んでるみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt as though I was chewing on sand.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt as though I was chewing on sand.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは僕をちらりと見た。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san stole a glance at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san stole a glance at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（がんばれ、葉留佳さん…っ！）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Good luck, Haruka-san...!)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Good luck, Haruka-san...!)

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が見ているこの食卓には、すべてが揃っているように思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking at this scene lain out in the dining room, it had a feeling of completeness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking at this scene lain out in the dining room, it had a feeling of completeness.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕がなくしてしまったもの。
MESSAGE.EN: There was something there I had lost.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was something there I had lost.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が得難いもの。
MESSAGE.EN: Something that was out of my reach.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something that was out of my reach.

MESSAGE.JP: それはロウで作った店先のサンプルのように――
MESSAGE.EN: It was like looking at the wax food displayed in front of a restaurant――
MESSAGE.Translation: It was like looking at the wax food displayed in front of a restaurant――

MESSAGE.JP: 『全てがある』のにそこには『何もない』。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Everything was there,❜ but at the same time ❛there was nothing.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Everything was there,❜ but at the same time ❛there was nothing.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あのね。訊きたいことがあるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Um. There's something I want to ask.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Um. There's something I want to ask.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「…なぁに、葉留佳」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝...What is it, Haruka?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝...What is it, Haruka?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私はどうやって生まれてきたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝How was I born?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝How was I born?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「…『どうやって』？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝...❛How❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝...❛How❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「『どうして』、ではなくて？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Not, ❛why❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Not, ❛why❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二人は顔を見合わせ、それから疲れた笑いを浮かべた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her parents' gazes met, and they both joined in a tired smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her parents' gazes met, and they both joined in a tired smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「…そう。とうとう、知りたくなったのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝...I see. So you've started wanting to know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝...I see. So you've started wanting to know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 前から予見された事態がようやく訪れた、とでも言いたげに。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like something she had predicted long ago and had been wishing for a chance to talk about.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like something she had predicted long ago and had been wishing for a chance to talk about.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「訊いてくれて、ありがとう、葉留佳」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Thank you for asking, Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Thank you for asking, Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うっすらと笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: A faint smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: A faint smile.

MESSAGE.JP: そのひとの笑みは、葉留佳さんの痛々しい笑みそっくりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her smile was a perfect match for Haruka-san's pitiably pained one.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her smile was a perfect match for Haruka-san's pitiably pained one.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「式の前夜に、二人のひとに抱かれたのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝The night before the wedding, I was held by two men.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝The night before the wedding, I was held by two men.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「嫌じゃなかったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Didn't you hate it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Didn't you hate it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「二人とも、よく知ってるひとだった。昔から、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝They were both people I knew well. Had for a long time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝They were both people I knew well. Had for a long time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 傍らにいるもうひとりの父親――当時は婿のひとり――そのひとはくるりと後ろを向いた。
MESSAGE.EN: The man by her side, the other father - and at the same time, one of her husbands - looked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man by her side, the other father - and at the same time, one of her husbands - looked away.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「好きだったの。二人とも。どっちかを選ぶなんて考えなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝I loved them. Both of them. I had never thought of trying to choose between them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝I loved them. Both of them. I had never thought of trying to choose between them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「そういう風に育てられたのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝That's how you were born.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝That's how you were born.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「しきたりだから？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Because those were the rules?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Because those were the rules?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「そうよ。でも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Yes. However...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Yes. However...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「…終わった後。なにか違うって思ったの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝...After it was over. I began to think that something had changed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝...After it was over. I began to think that something had changed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「私の好きな二人はそれぞれのやり方で私を好きだと言ってくれた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝The two men I loved both had different ways of expressing their love for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝The two men I loved both had different ways of expressing their love for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「でもそれは結局誰か――私たち以外の誰かの手のひらの上でしかない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝But I came to understand that―― in the end we were just puppets on someone else's strings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝But I came to understand that―― in the end we were just puppets on someone else's strings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「それに気がついてしまった。私たちは…モノだったの。モノでしかなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝That's what I realized. That we were... objects. Nothing but things to be used.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝That's what I realized. That we were... objects. Nothing but things to be used.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「私は泣いた。初めてのときにそんなことに気がついて…辛くて苦しくて悔しくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝I cried. It was painful, mortifying, unbearable to figure out a fact like that on my very first time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝I cried. It was painful, mortifying, unbearable to figure out a fact like that on my very first time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あなたは？　あなたはどうだったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And you? How did you feel?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And you? How did you feel?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは父親に訊ねる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san addressed the question to her father.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san addressed the question to her father.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「…僕は二木の人間だ。承知済みだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝...I was a Futaki. Everything had been decided for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝...I was a Futaki. Everything had been decided for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「でも、あのひとは違ったの。外のことを教えてくれたのはあのひと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝But that man was different. He was the one who taught me about the world outside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝But that man was different. He was the one who taught me about the world outside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三人は話し合った。
MESSAGE.EN: The three of them had talked together.
MESSAGE.Translation: The three of them had talked together.

MESSAGE.JP: このしがらみから逃れよう、と。
MESSAGE.EN: They had talked about escaping from the rules of the family.
MESSAGE.Translation: They had talked about escaping from the rules of the family.

MESSAGE.JP: そう決意したのだ。初夜の晩に。
MESSAGE.EN: They decided on that. On the night of their wedding.
MESSAGE.Translation: They decided on that. On the night of their wedding.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それから？　それからどうなったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And then? Then what happened?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And then? Then what happened?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「………」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ。問題はそこからだ。一体何があったのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Of course. The real answers lay immediately ahead from here. What had happened after that?
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course. The real answers lay immediately ahead from here. What had happened after that?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「…それは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝That...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝That...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「言えないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝...I can't say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝...I can't say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は耳を疑った。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't believe my ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't believe my ears.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの顔には失望感が浮かんでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san had a look of despair.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san had a look of despair.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「言えるのは…それだけ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Just that one thing... I cannot tell you about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Just that one thing... I cannot tell you about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「でもわかってほしいの。私たちは、無理矢理あなたたちを産んだわけじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝But there's something I want you to understand. You and your sister were not born by accident.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝But there's something I want you to understand. You and your sister were not born by accident.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「ちゃんとお互いを好きあった、その結果だったということを…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝We were lovers, and you were the result of that love...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝We were lovers, and you were the result of that love...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そんなことはどうでもいいのっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I don't care about that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I don't care about that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: がしゃん！
MESSAGE.EN: *THUD*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *THUD*!

MESSAGE.JP: テーブルを叩く音。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of her slamming her fist on the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of her slamming her fist on the table.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そのあとだよ！　それから何があったのか、私は知りたいの！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝After that! I want to know what happened after that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝After that! I want to know what happened after that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「葉留佳…もう一人のお父さんには会ったわね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Haruka... you've met your other father, haven't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Haruka... you've met your other father, haven't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頷く葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「ここから先は、あのひとしか話せないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝If you want to know what happened next, he's the only one who can tell you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝If you want to know what happened next, he's the only one who can tell you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「私たちに話せるのはここまで。あなたたちは望まれた、のだということと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝This is as much as I can tell you. Only that we were longing for you two to be born, and...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝This is as much as I can tell you. Only that we were longing for you two to be born, and...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「…そしてね。それをずっと話したい、と願っていたのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝...And... that we've always wished we could tell you about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝...And... that we've always wished we could tell you about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「信じられないかもしれないけれど。何度も助けにいこうとしたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝You may not believe it, but I wanted to save you so many times over the years.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝You may not believe it, but I wanted to save you so many times over the years.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 跡継ぎはもう決めてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: The heir had already been decided on.
MESSAGE.Translation: The heir had already been decided on.

MESSAGE.JP: となれば厄介者たちはもう要らない。
MESSAGE.EN: Which meant that all the other hangers-on were just potential trouble.
MESSAGE.Translation: Which meant that all the other hangers-on were just potential trouble.

MESSAGE.JP: いざこざがまた起ってしまうから。
MESSAGE.EN: Since a conflict might break out again over the inheritance.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since a conflict might break out again over the inheritance.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「でも結局本家に入らせてもらえなかった。なんにもできなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝So in the end we weren't able to bring you to the main house. There was nothing we could do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝So in the end we weren't able to bring you to the main house. There was nothing we could do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一族の恥は追放せよ。
MESSAGE.EN: The family's shame had to be banished.
MESSAGE.Translation: The family's shame had to be banished.

MESSAGE.JP: 野で死ね。
MESSAGE.EN: Cast away to die in the wilderness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Cast away to die in the wilderness.

MESSAGE.JP: 地に骨を晒せ。
MESSAGE.EN: To become nothing but bleached bones on the earth.
MESSAGE.Translation: To become nothing but bleached bones on the earth.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「ごめんね。葉留佳。ごめんなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝I'm sorry. Haruka, forgive me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝I'm sorry. Haruka, forgive me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひとを道具だとしかみない考え方。
MESSAGE.EN: The two had been seen as nothing but tools to create an heir for their house.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two had been seen as nothing but tools to create an heir for their house.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの両親は、子供を取り上げられ、生活苦にあえいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Because of that, their children had been taken without a second thought, leaving the parents to suffer through the trials of their life.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because of that, their children had been taken without a second thought, leaving the parents to suffer through the trials of their life.

MESSAGE.JP: 二人生きるのに精一杯だったのだ、と目の前のオトナは頭を下げた。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛The two of us had our hands full just getting through our lives back then.❜ With that confession, the ❛adult❜ before us bowed her head in a apology.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛The two of us had our hands full just getting through our lives back then.❜ With that confession, the ❛adult❜ before us bowed her head in a apology.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「こんな駄目なお母さんで、ごめんなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Please forgive this worthless failure of a mother.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Please forgive this worthless failure of a mother.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 深々と…葉留佳さんのお母さんは頭を下げた。
MESSAGE.EN: More deeply still... Haruka-san's mother bowed her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: More deeply still... Haruka-san's mother bowed her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…謝ってもらいたくなんかない…謝ってもらっても…何の役にも立たない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I don't want an apology... Even if you apologize... nothing will change...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I don't want an apology... Even if you apologize... nothing will change...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が…私が知りたいのは…っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What... What I want to know is...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What... What I want to know is...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が、どっちの子供か、ってことなんだよぅっ…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Whose, just which one's child am I...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Whose, just which one's child am I...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: どん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*.

MESSAGE.JP: どん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*.

MESSAGE.JP: どん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*.

MESSAGE.JP: 駄々っ子のように何度もテーブルを叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: Like a child throwing a tantrum, Haruka-san beat her hands on the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like a child throwing a tantrum, Haruka-san beat her hands on the table.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん…葉留佳さん、落ち着いて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san... Haruka-san, calm down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san... Haruka-san, calm down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 涙を浮かべている葉留佳さんを僕は宥めた。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned to look at me with tears in her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned to look at me with tears in her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…こんな私が『どうやって』生まれたかが知りたいの…知りたいの…！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...❛How❜ was I born... that's all I want to know...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...❛How❜ was I born... that's all I want to know...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 双子の片割れと比べられ…選ばれなかった片方が蔑まれ、踏みにじられて生きていかなければならない。
MESSAGE.EN: The two twins were compared... and the one that was not chosen was disdained, downtrodden, and told it was better if she hadn't been born.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two twins were compared... and the one that was not chosen was disdained, downtrodden, and told it was better if she hadn't been born.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな風に葉留佳さんは『生まれて』しまった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the story of ❛how❜ Haruka-san had been born.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the story of ❛how❜ Haruka-san had been born.

MESSAGE.JP: 事情も、理由も、知らない葉留佳さんにとって何の力も及ばないところで、決まった『存在』のありよう。
MESSAGE.EN: To Haruka-san, who knew neither the circumstances or reason, it had always been like something fate had decided for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: To Haruka-san, who knew neither the circumstances or reason, it had always been like something fate had decided for her.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の父@「すまない、葉留佳。これ以上は話せない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Dad@❝Sorry, Haruka. We can't say anything more beyond this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Dad@❝Sorry, Haruka. We can't say anything more beyond this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そういう約束なんだ…その言葉に、僕は問い返した。
MESSAGE.EN: Why did such a promise exist... that's what I wanted to know.
MESSAGE.Translation: Why did such a promise exist... that's what I wanted to know.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたら教えてもらえるんですか？　あの三枝晶から」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How can we get him to tell us? Shou Saigusa, I mean.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How can we get him to tell us? Shou Saigusa, I mean.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 両親は、無言だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Neither parent responded.
MESSAGE.Translation: Neither parent responded.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃ…帰るから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Then... I guess I'll go home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Then... I guess I'll go home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんにとって…帰る場所はこの家ではないのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I suppose... the place Haruka-san considered home was not here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I suppose... the place Haruka-san considered home was not here.

MESSAGE.JP: そしてそれがわかっているからこそ、両親たちは無言だった。
MESSAGE.EN: And, maybe because they understood that, her parents remained silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: And, maybe because they understood that, her parents remained silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…助けようとしてくれたって、ホント？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Did you really want to save me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Did you really want to save me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「…本当よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝...It's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝...It's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それが嘘でも…うれしいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Even if that's a lie... I'm glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Even if that's a lie... I'm glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「…葉留佳…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝...Haruka...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝...Haruka...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うれしいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I am glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I am glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「…佳奈多に協力を頼みなさい、葉留佳」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝...Ask Kanata for help, Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝...Ask Kanata for help, Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「っ！　ど、どうして、あいつに頼まないとだめなの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝!! W-why should I ask that girl for help!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝!! W-why should I ask that girl for help!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「あのひとはあなたたち二人で頼めば話してくれるでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝If both of you together ask him, that person will surely talk to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝If both of you together ask him, that person will surely talk to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「そうすれば、あなたに話すという、約束なの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝That was the condition we promised on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝That was the condition we promised on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは唇を噛んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san bit her lip.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san bit her lip.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「葉留佳…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝Haruka...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝Haruka...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…嫌」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳の母@「………」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka's Mom@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka's Mom@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「絶対に、嫌！　あいつに頼むなんて、嫌、イヤっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Absolutely not! I refuse to ever ask her for help! No!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Absolutely not! I refuse to ever ask her for help! No!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 片割れを拒否する娘を見る両親たちは、辛そうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It must be hard for her parents, to watch one of their children reject the other.
MESSAGE.Translation: It must be hard for her parents, to watch one of their children reject the other.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は葉留佳さんの手を引く。
MESSAGE.EN: I took Haruka-san's hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took Haruka-san's hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「行こう、葉留佳さん…もうすぐ門限になっちゃうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's go, Haruka-san... it'll be curfew time soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's go, Haruka-san... it'll be curfew time soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そういって、僕は葉留佳さんの手を引いて歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: With that, I tugged on Haruka-san's hand and started walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: With that, I tugged on Haruka-san's hand and started walking.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…わかってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…わかってるけど…でも、でも、でも、…イヤなの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I understand... but, but, but... I don't want to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I understand... but, but, but... I don't want to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐ、と拳を握った葉留佳さんはぎりぎりと歯ぎしりして感情を押し殺した。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san closed her fist and grit her teeth, looking like she was trying to squash down all of her feelings.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san closed her fist and grit her teeth, looking like she was trying to squash down all of her feelings.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「わかってる…わかってる…でも、私…私…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I understand... I do... but, I... I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I understand... I do... but, I... I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を手で覆いながらぶるぶると震える。
MESSAGE.EN: While hiding her eyes with one hand, she trembled.
MESSAGE.Translation: While hiding her eyes with one hand, she trembled.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は抱き寄せてあやした。
MESSAGE.EN: I drew her into my arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: I drew her into my arms.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。わかるよ葉留佳さん…でも、知りたいんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. I understand, Haruka-san... But, you want to know, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. I understand, Haruka-san... But, you want to know, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあやってみるしかない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then we have no choice but to do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then we have no choice but to do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やろうよ。二木さんと話してみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's do it. Let's ask Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's do it. Let's ask Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ヤだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 拒否の言葉。
MESSAGE.EN: Flat refusal.
MESSAGE.Translation: Flat refusal.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇ葉留佳さん。さっきのお母さんたちとの会話なんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Haruka-san. About what you said to your mother earlier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Haruka-san. About what you said to your mother earlier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「『どっちの子供か知りたい』って言ってたよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝❛Whose child am I?❜ is what you asked her, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝❛Whose child am I?❜ is what you asked her, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…言ったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんは調査始める前、こう言った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You said that before we started our investigation, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You said that before we started our investigation, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が『ハズレ』だったのかどうか、知りたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I have to know whether or not I'm the ❛wrong one.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I have to know whether or not I'm the ❛wrong one.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、葉留佳さん…もしも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, Haruka-san... what if...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, Haruka-san... what if...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…それならそれでいい。諦め、つくもん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...If that's how it is, that's how it is. I've already resigned myself to that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...If that's how it is, that's how it is. I've already resigned myself to that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん、どっちかが貶められなければならないって考えてる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, do you happen to be thinking that either one of you has to be mistreated?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, do you happen to be thinking that either one of you has to be mistreated?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Huh...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Huh...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「違うよね。『どっちかが知りたい』っていうのは手段なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not it, right? Your reason for wanting to know ❛which❜ one you are has changed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not it, right? Your reason for wanting to know ❛which❜ one you are has changed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あのときは自分の境遇を諦めるため」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Before, it was about trying to escape your current situation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Before, it was about trying to escape your current situation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも今はどうなのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But isn't it different now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But isn't it different now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんのフリをしていた二木さんはなんと言った？
MESSAGE.EN: What was it that Futaki-san had said while pretending to be Haruka-san?
MESSAGE.Translation: What was it that Futaki-san had said while pretending to be Haruka-san?

MESSAGE.JP: 『だって、結局それはマイナスを押しつけ合っているだけだと思うんだ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I mean, it'd just be shoving all the negative stuff onto someone else.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I mean, it'd just be shoving all the negative stuff onto someone else.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんだけが貶められるのは間違ってると思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think you're the only one who's been mistreated, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think you're the only one who's been mistreated, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でもだからといって彼女を貶めたいわけじゃないでしょ、葉留佳さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't it because of that, that you yourself don't want to hate that girl?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't it because of that, that you yourself don't want to hate that girl?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 唇を噛んで返事をしない。
MESSAGE.EN: She bit her lip and didn't respond.
MESSAGE.Translation: She bit her lip and didn't respond.

MESSAGE.JP: そうともいえない、か。
MESSAGE.EN: She must've wanted to deny my words.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must've wanted to deny my words.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは迷っているのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was torn.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was torn.

MESSAGE.JP: 自分と同じ目に合わせてやりたい、と願ったことがないと言えば嘘になるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I suppose it would be a lie to say she wasn't hoping for someone else to have to shoulder her suffering.
MESSAGE.Translation: I suppose it would be a lie to say she wasn't hoping for someone else to have to shoulder her suffering.

MESSAGE.JP: でもかといって、自分が逆の立場になれば問題が解決するのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Even with that, would trading situations with someone else really resolve the problem?
MESSAGE.Translation: Even with that, would trading situations with someone else really resolve the problem?

MESSAGE.JP: 解決なんてしない。
MESSAGE.EN: No, it wouldn't.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, it wouldn't.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真実がわかったとき…本当に何がしたいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Once you find out the truth... what do you really intend to do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Once you find out the truth... what do you really intend to do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「諦めるため。相手を貶めるため」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Will you resign yourself to the answer? Or do you just want to drag her down?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Will you resign yourself to the answer? Or do you just want to drag her down?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…それで、葉留佳さんの問題は解決できるのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...With that, will your problems be solved?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...With that, will your problems be solved?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…どうしたらいいの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...What do you think I should do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...What do you think I should do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は答えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't answer.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうしたらいいの…教えて…解答を教えて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What should I do...? Please... tell me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What should I do...? Please... tell me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こんなの…覚えてない…どうしたらいいのか、わかんない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't remember... something like this... I don't know what I should do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't remember... something like this... I don't know what I should do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰も教えられないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nobody can answer that question for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nobody can answer that question for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Why not!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Why not!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…葉留佳さんのことじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝because this is your life, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝because this is your life, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「自分のことを本当に決められるのは自分だけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The only one who can decide what to do with it is you, yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The only one who can decide what to do with it is you, yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「他人に歪められるのが嫌ならば、それより先に…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you don't want to be led on a leash by others...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you don't want to be led on a leash by others...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…自分で自分を決めなくちゃいけない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...you have to make your own decisions.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...you have to make your own decisions.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よく言うよ、僕は。
MESSAGE.EN: I was talking big.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was talking big.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなこと、偉そうに言えるほどなのか、僕は？
MESSAGE.EN: What was all this patronizing stuff coming out of my mouth?
MESSAGE.Translation: What was all this patronizing stuff coming out of my mouth?

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はそこまで強かったのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was I really that strong a person?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was I really that strong a person?

MESSAGE.JP: でも、今は強い自分を演じなければいけない。
MESSAGE.EN: At the very least, I had to act like I was strong.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the very least, I had to act like I was strong.

MESSAGE.JP: でないと、葉留佳さんは自分が抱えている黒い感情に押し潰されてしまうだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: If I lacked the strength to support her, Haruka-san would be crushed under the weight of the dark emotions she carried.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I lacked the strength to support her, Haruka-san would be crushed under the weight of the dark emotions she carried.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…話…してみる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I'll... talk to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I'll... talk to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 長い沈黙の果てに、葉留佳さんは固い表情で頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: After a long silence, Haruka-san gave her answer with a stiff expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a long silence, Haruka-san gave her answer with a stiff expression.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay. I understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay. I understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの協力が得られなければ――葉留佳さんに未来は、ない。
MESSAGE.EN: Without Futaki-san's help―― Haruka-san would have no future.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without Futaki-san's help―― Haruka-san would have no future.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 休み時間、僕は二木さんを呼び止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: During break, I called out to Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: During break, I called out to Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: そのまま通り過ぎようとする彼女の腕を掴む。
MESSAGE.EN: As she turned to walk away, I seized her arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she turned to walk away, I seized her arm.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…何か用？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Did you need something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Did you need something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと話がしたいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I just want to talk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I just want to talk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私はしたくない。じゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I don't. Bye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I don't. Bye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「待ってよ…大事な話なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, please... it's important.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, please... it's important.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「大事？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Important?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Important?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鼻で笑う二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san gave a sarcastic laugh.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san gave a sarcastic laugh.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…あなたにとって大事でも、私にとっては小事なのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...It may be important to you, but not to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...It may be important to you, but not to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「忙しいから。手、離して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm busy. Let go of me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm busy. Let go of me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんが話をしたい、と伝えてくれって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What I wanted to tell you is that Haruka-san wants to talk to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What I wanted to tell you is that Haruka-san wants to talk to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの動きが止まった。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san froze.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san froze.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…なんですって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...What did you say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...What did you say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんが話をしたいって言ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm telling you Haruka-san wants to talk to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm telling you Haruka-san wants to talk to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: じっと、見つめられる。
MESSAGE.EN: She stared at me without a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stared at me without a word.

MESSAGE.JP: 何かを見透かすような視線。
MESSAGE.EN: Like she was trying to glare a hole right through me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like she was trying to glare a hole right through me.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私はしたくない。以上」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I don't want to talk to her. We're done here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I don't want to talk to her. We're done here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぱん、と腕が振られる。
MESSAGE.EN: She jerked away from my grasp.
MESSAGE.Translation: She jerked away from my grasp.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…二木さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Futaki-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Futaki-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「放課後、中庭の…あのベンチの前で待ってるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝After school, in the courtyard... we'll be waiting by that bench.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝After school, in the courtyard... we'll be waiting by that bench.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「行かないわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I won't be there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I won't be there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「伝えたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I've delivered the message.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I've delivered the message.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「行かないって言ってるでしょ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And I told you I'm not going, understand!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And I told you I'm not going, understand!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 右手を大きく振った二木さんは、イライラと髪の毛をかき回し始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san raised her right hand to her hair and began mussing it violently in irritation.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san raised her right hand to her hair and began mussing it violently in irritation.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…今更、何が話したいの、あの子は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...After all this time, what does that girl want to talk to me about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...After all this time, what does that girl want to talk to me about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは、葉留佳さんに直接訊いてあげてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You'll have to ask her about that yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You'll have to ask her about that yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「お節介もきわまれり、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I've had just about enough of you sticking your nose into this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I've had just about enough of you sticking your nose into this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたは…何様のつもり？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You... just who do you think you are?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You... just who do you think you are?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何様でもなんでもないよ。僕はただ…葉留佳さんの手伝いをしているだけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think I'm anyone special. I'm just... trying to help out Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think I'm anyone special. I'm just... trying to help out Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「行かないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm not going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm not going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「行かないから、そう伝えておいて！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm not going, you tell her that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm not going, you tell her that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは言い捨てると、階段を下りていった。
MESSAGE.EN: With that, Futaki-san swung around and strode away down the hall.
MESSAGE.Translation: With that, Futaki-san swung around and strode away down the hall.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…本当に来ないつもりかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I wonder if she really doesn't plan on coming.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I wonder if she really doesn't plan on coming.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 中庭。
MESSAGE.EN: In the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: 携帯の時計を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I glanced at the clock on my cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I glanced at the clock on my cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: 放課後になってから随分と経つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Quite some time had passed since school ended.
MESSAGE.Translation: Quite some time had passed since school ended.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らはずっとここで待っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We'd been waiting there ever since.
MESSAGE.Translation: We'd been waiting there ever since.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは無言だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was silent.

MESSAGE.JP: 唇を真一文字に結んで、中空を見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood with her lips drawn in a tight line, staring up at the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood with her lips drawn in a tight line, staring up at the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: 靴音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: A footstep.
MESSAGE.Translation: A footstep.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…二木さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Futaki-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Futaki-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「やれやれ、保護者付き？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝My my, the bodyguard's here again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝My my, the bodyguard's here again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「誰かがいないと何にもできないのね、三枝葉留佳？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Can't you do anything by yourself, Haruka Saigusa?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Can't you do anything by yourself, Haruka Saigusa?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いきなり喧嘩腰だな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Picking a fight right off the bat...
MESSAGE.Translation: Picking a fight right off the bat...

MESSAGE.JP: けれどよく彼女の表情を見ると、緊張感が漂っている。
MESSAGE.EN: But, judging by her expression, she seemed in fact nervous.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, judging by her expression, she seemed in fact nervous.

MESSAGE.JP: 何かを期待しているようにも思える…。
MESSAGE.EN: It almost felt as though she was hoping for something...
MESSAGE.Translation: It almost felt as though she was hoping for something...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「協力して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Help me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Help me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが口を開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san opened her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san opened her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「協力…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Help...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Help...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あのひとたちが…あんたと協力しろって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Those two told me... I have to ask you for help,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Those two told me... I have to ask you for help,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そういうから。協力して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝so there you have it. Help me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝so there you have it. Help me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの表情が歪む。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san's expression fell.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san's expression fell.

MESSAGE.JP: それは失望の表情だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Now she had a look of plain disappointment.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now she had a look of plain disappointment.

MESSAGE.JP: ため息。
MESSAGE.EN: A sigh left her lips.
MESSAGE.Translation: A sigh left her lips.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「嫌よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どうして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「『どうして』？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝❛Why❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝❛Why❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「昔からあなたはそればっかりね。どうして、どうして、どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's all you know how to say, isn't it. Why, why, why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's all you know how to say, isn't it. Why, why, why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「馬鹿みたいにそればっかり。答えが得られてもその先は考えようともしない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You keep asking that all the time like an idiot. Even if someone gives you the answers, you never try to think for yourself beyond them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You keep asking that all the time like an idiot. Even if someone gives you the answers, you never try to think for yourself beyond them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どうして怒られるの、とかどうして余所とは違うの、とか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝❛Why are they mad at me?❜, ❛Why is our family different from others?❜, that's all you think, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝❛Why are they mad at me?❜, ❛Why is our family different from others?❜, that's all you think, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「その頭には何にも詰まってないんでしょう？　空っぽだからそんなザマなのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There's nothing in your head, is there? You should start realizing that's why you've ended up like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There's nothing in your head, is there? You should start realizing that's why you've ended up like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたに協力するメリットがないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There's no merit to helping you out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There's no merit to helping you out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほら、駄目だよ理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝See, it's pointless, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝See, it's pointless, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こういうやつだもん。私のことなんかどーでもいいんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's how she is. She couldn't care less about me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's how she is. She couldn't care less about me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「話はそれだけ？　はっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Is that all you wanted to ask me? Hmph!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Is that all you wanted to ask me? Hmph!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 右手で髪の毛を払うと肩をすくめた二木さんは僕を睨み付けた。
MESSAGE.EN: Brushing her hair away with her right hand as she shrugged her shoulders, Futaki-san shot me a glare.
MESSAGE.Translation: Brushing her hair away with her right hand as she shrugged her shoulders, Futaki-san shot me a glare.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「時間の無駄ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What a waste of time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What a waste of time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そうでもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You're wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You're wrong.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「少なくとも、きみは来てくれた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝At the very least, you showed up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝At the very least, you showed up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはくるり、と背を向けて歩き去った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san spun around on her heels, turning her back to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san spun around on her heels, turning her back to us.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ふう。賭けは僕の勝ちだね、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Phew. Looks like I won that bet, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Phew. Looks like I won that bet, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが黙って五百円玉を出してくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san silently took out a 500 yen coin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san silently took out a 500 yen coin.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ない方に…葉留佳さんは賭けていたのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san had bet that... Futaki-san wouldn't come.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san had bet that... Futaki-san wouldn't come.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は硬貨を押し戻した。
MESSAGE.EN: I pushed the coin back to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pushed the coin back to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんは来てくれたよ、葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san came, Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san came, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: きっかけが、必要だ。
MESSAGE.EN: We had needed something to start with.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had needed something to start with.

MESSAGE.JP: どんなことでも。
MESSAGE.EN: Anything at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anything at all.

MESSAGE.JP: それは僕が一番よく知っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: That was one thing I understood clearly.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was one thing I understood clearly.

MESSAGE.JP: 自分の過去の日々を思うと――それは小さいけれど大事なことのはずだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking back over my childhood days―― that small thing was actually a huge step forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking back over my childhood days―― that small thing was actually a huge step forward.

MESSAGE.JP: 委員会室に入ると、彼女はぼんやりと窓の外を見つめていた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I entered the committee room, I found Futaki-san staring out the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I entered the committee room, I found Futaki-san staring out the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 人の気配に振り返ると、第一声はこれだった。
MESSAGE.EN: When the girl sensed my presence, she turned to look at me and spoke first.
MESSAGE.Translation: When the girl sensed my presence, she turned to look at me and spoke first.

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは僕の顔を見ると嫌そうな顔をした。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked at me like I was something the dog had brought in.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked at me like I was something the dog had brought in.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「用事はないけど、入っていく後ろ姿見つけたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't really need anything, I just saw you going in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't really need anything, I just saw you going in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: もっと嫌そうな顔をされた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her face turned, if possible, even sourer.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her face turned, if possible, even sourer.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…協力なんてしないわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I'm not going to help her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I'm not going to help her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 回転椅子をぐるり、と回すとそっぽを向く。
MESSAGE.EN: She spun her chair around, facing away from me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She spun her chair around, facing away from me.

MESSAGE.JP: 机の上に頬杖をついたままの呟き。
MESSAGE.EN: Resting her chin on her hand, she muttered something to herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Resting her chin on her hand, she muttered something to herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「疑問がひとつあるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's just one thing I want to know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's just one thing I want to know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…何よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんが、きみが卵アレルギーだと信じていたのはどうしてだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why did you have Haruka-san believe you had an egg allergy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why did you have Haruka-san believe you had an egg allergy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なんだ…そんなこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What... just that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What... just that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「簡単なことよ。小学校の家庭科の課題があって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Simple. There was an assignment in our grade school home economics class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Simple. There was an assignment in our grade school home economics class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「自宅で作って写真を撮ってこいっていうやつ…でもあの子、あんなだったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝We had to bring a picture of something we'd made at home... but that child, well, she was her usual self.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝We had to bring a picture of something we'd made at home... but that child, well, she was her usual self.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「料理も何も知らなくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝She knew nothing about cooking either...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝She knew nothing about cooking either...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは言葉を切った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san suddenly stopped talking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san suddenly stopped talking.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 舌打ちの音。つい喋ってしまった、という表情。
MESSAGE.EN: She clicked her tongue. Her face said she regretted telling me that much.
MESSAGE.Translation: She clicked her tongue. Her face said she regretted telling me that much.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が黙っていると、しょうがないと思ったのか続きを口にした。
MESSAGE.EN: As I let the silence grow, after a while she seemed to resign herself to finishing her story.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I let the silence grow, after a while she seemed to resign herself to finishing her story.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…その日はたまたま『品評会』だった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...And on that day our family happened to have a ❛competition.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...And on that day our family happened to have a ❛competition.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「品評会？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Competition?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Competition?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どっちが劣っているか、を比べ合う日よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝To determine which one of us was inferior.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝To determine which one of us was inferior.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「上手い具合に家庭科の課題が出てたからそれがお題になって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝They chose to compare which of us could complete the assignment better...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝They chose to compare which of us could complete the assignment better...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは目をつむる。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san closed her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san closed her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『かなたは何作るのー？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❛What're you gonna make, Kanata-?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❛What're you gonna make, Kanata-?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『そういうはるかは何をつくるの？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛What about you, Haruka?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛What about you, Haruka?❜

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『うーん、たまごやきとかー…めだまやきとかー…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❛Umm, maybe omelette... or sunny-side up fried eggs...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❛Umm, maybe omelette... or sunny-side up fried eggs...❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『…それフライパンに卵おとすだけじゃない』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛...Isn't that just dumping some eggs into a frying pan?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛...Isn't that just dumping some eggs into a frying pan?❜

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『それがむつかしいんだよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❛It's hard enough.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❛It's hard enough.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『いつもくろこげこげ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❛I always end up burning them...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❛I always end up burning them...❜

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「品評会ではいつも私が勝ってたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I always won the little family ❛competitions.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I always won the little family ❛competitions.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そのころから扱いが段々悪くなっていったと聞いてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And from there, they gradually started treating her worse and worse.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And from there, they gradually started treating her worse and worse.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san murmured.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san murmured.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「結果はどうなったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How did it end up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How did it end up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私は味噌汁にした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I made miso soup.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I made miso soup.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…同じものを作れ、と叔父たちに言われていたけれど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Even though we had been told to make the same thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Even though we had been told to make the same thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あえて出すものを変えたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: She had dared to make something different.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had dared to make something different.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「でもその必要もなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But there was no need for me to do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But there was no need for me to do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「出てきたのはやっぱり黒こげの目玉焼き…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Her sunny-side up egg ended up burned to black, after all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Her sunny-side up egg ended up burned to black, after all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…じゃあ勝負もなにもない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...So it wasn't even a contest...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...So it wasn't even a contest...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「一目瞭然、というやつね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It was a victory by default.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It was a victory by default.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…台所で、何度も作り直してるのを見た」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I watched her in the kitchen, trying time after time to cook it right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I watched her in the kitchen, trying time after time to cook it right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『うーん、うまくいかないなぁ…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❛Hmm, it's just not working...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❛Hmm, it's just not working...❜

MESSAGE.JP: 頬にも、腕にも、青いアザ。
MESSAGE.EN: On her cheeks and arms, there were blue bruises.
MESSAGE.Translation: On her cheeks and arms, there were blue bruises.

MESSAGE.JP: 痛々しいそれを見ないふりをした。
MESSAGE.EN: She pretended she hadn't seen them.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pretended she hadn't seen them.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『かなたー。またまけちゃったね。やはは』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❛Kanata-. Looks like I lost again. Yahaha.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❛Kanata-. Looks like I lost again. Yahaha.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@『でも、どうして同じ目玉焼きにしなかったの？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❛But, how come you didn't fry a sunny-side up egg like me?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❛But, how come you didn't fry a sunny-side up egg like me?❜

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…卵にさわれないから、と言ったのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...And so you told her it was because you couldn't touch eggs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...And so you told her it was because you couldn't touch eggs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、それは嘘だった。
MESSAGE.EN: And, that's where the lie came from.
MESSAGE.Translation: And, that's where the lie came from.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なぜすぐ教えてやらなかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why didn't you ever tell her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why didn't you ever tell her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そしてその勘違いをシフォンケーキで利用した。
MESSAGE.EN: And then she even used that misguided impression to bake a chiffon cake.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then she even used that misguided impression to bake a chiffon cake.

MESSAGE.JP: なぜ？
MESSAGE.EN: Why?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why?

MESSAGE.JP: なぜだ。
MESSAGE.EN: How come.
MESSAGE.Translation: How come.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…滑稽な話ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Such a silly story, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Such a silly story, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 目を開けた彼女はいつもの無表情に戻っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: When she opened her eyes, she was back to her old emotionless self.
MESSAGE.Translation: When she opened her eyes, she was back to her old emotionless self.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「滑稽な話よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Just a silly story.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Just a silly story.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それきり、黙ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: With that, she fell silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: With that, she fell silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…交わらないまま、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You're going to keep avoiding her, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You're going to keep avoiding her, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ねじれの視点を互いに持っている。
MESSAGE.EN: They were both viewing each other in a twisted way.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were both viewing each other in a twisted way.

MESSAGE.JP: だからすれ違うだけ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why they couldn't see eye to eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why they couldn't see eye to eye.

MESSAGE.JP: 幼い頃のその経験が、葉留佳さんに自分の取り柄を自覚させた。
MESSAGE.EN: Even at such a young age, Haruka-san had registered it as a single merit of her own.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even at such a young age, Haruka-san had registered it as a single merit of her own.

MESSAGE.JP: それは葉留佳さんの支えになっただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That one thing might have become a priceless support for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: That one thing might have become a priceless support for her.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、それは嘘だった。
MESSAGE.EN: But it had been a lie.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it had been a lie.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんが片割れを気遣ってついた嘘。
MESSAGE.EN: A lie Futaki-san had made in consideration for her sister.
MESSAGE.Translation: A lie Futaki-san had made in consideration for her sister.

MESSAGE.JP: 『…ずっと私はウソツキだから。物心ついたときからね』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛...I'm a born liar. I've been lying since the day I was born.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛...I'm a born liar. I've been lying since the day I was born.❜

MESSAGE.JP: なのにその嘘は葉留佳さんを打ちのめした。
MESSAGE.EN: Eventually that lie had hurt Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Eventually that lie had hurt Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 気遣ってついた嘘を、二木さんは利用した。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though Futaki-san had told it to protect her from pain.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though Futaki-san had told it to protect her from pain.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、相手を思いやりながら傷つけるという、相反する態度。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, it's possible to hurt another even while being considerate of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, it's possible to hurt another even while being considerate of them.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下にたたずむ葉留佳さんに気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed Haruka-san loitering in the hallway outside.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed Haruka-san loitering in the hallway outside.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…何の話、してたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What were you two... talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What were you two... talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「少し場所を変えようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's go somewhere else first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's go somewhere else first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…って、二木さんは言ってた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...And that's what Futaki-san said.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...And that's what Futaki-san said.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はさっき聞いた話を伝える。
MESSAGE.EN: I told her what we'd been talking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: I told her what we'd been talking about.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そんなの、言われてもなぁ、って感じだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I feel like saying ❛even if you tell me that❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I feel like saying ❛even if you tell me that❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「言いたいことはわかるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I understand what you're trying to say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I understand what you're trying to say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はいはい、お気遣いありがとうございます、ってかんじ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yes yes, thank you -so- much for your concern, is what I'm supposed to say here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yes yes, thank you -so- much for your concern, is what I'm supposed to say here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんだけだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「その話には続きがあるんだ。あいつは知らないだろうけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There's a continuation to that story. Though she probably doesn't know about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There's a continuation to that story. Though she probably doesn't know about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「何度かあいつが試食してさ。あとから二木の家から怒鳴り込みがあって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She had sampled the food a few times. After that, the Futakis came running over from their house to shout at me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She had sampled the food a few times. After that, the Futakis came running over from their house to shout at me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「沢山殴られたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They hit me a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They hit me a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうして味噌汁を作ったのかという叔父たちの問いに…
MESSAGE.EN: Her relatives had asked Kanata why she'd made miso soup...
MESSAGE.Translation: Her relatives had asked Kanata why she'd made miso soup...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あいつは卵さわるとじんましんが出るとか言ったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She'd said that if she touched eggs she'd break out in hives, or something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She'd said that if she touched eggs she'd break out in hives, or something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『アナフィラキシーで殺すつもりか』って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So ❛Are you trying to kill her with an anaphylactic shock!?❜, is what they shouted at me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So ❛Are you trying to kill her with an anaphylactic shock!?❜, is what they shouted at me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『汚れた娘だなやっぱり』って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝❛She really is the ❞dirty❝ twin.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝❛She really is the ❞dirty❝ twin.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「怒鳴り込んできた二木の叔父たちに責められたから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The Futakis shouted at me like that in a rage...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The Futakis shouted at me like that in a rage...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は三枝の叔父たちに殴られたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So the Saigusas all started to beat me too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So the Saigusas all started to beat me too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ちっともいい話じゃないよ、そんなの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...How is that something I should be thankful for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...How is that something I should be thankful for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私だけ、殴られただけだよ。そんな話、聞いても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I was the only one getting beat up that night. So even if you tell me her side of the story...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I was the only one getting beat up that night. So even if you tell me her side of the story...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いい話だなぁ、なんてすぐには思えないよ…思えないじゃない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm not going to immediately say I feel better having heard it... I don't feel that way at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm not going to immediately say I feel better having heard it... I don't feel that way at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「教えてくれてありがとう、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Thank you for telling me, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Thank you for telling me, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは弱々しい笑みを浮かべた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san gave me a frail smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san gave me a frail smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「たまごやきの件も…最初から私を陥れるためだったんだって思ってたけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The thing with the eggs... I thought she had said that just to get me in trouble.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The thing with the eggs... I thought she had said that just to get me in trouble.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうじゃなかったっていうのは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I guess I was wrong...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I guess I was wrong...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…嬉しくないっていったら…嘘になるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...To say I'm not even a little glad... would be a lie, I guess...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...To say I'm not even a little glad... would be a lie, I guess...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「殴るのは二木と三枝の叔父たちだもんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The ones doing the hitting were the Futakis and the Saigusas.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The ones doing the hitting were the Futakis and the Saigusas.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…わたしたちは、わるくない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The two of us... weren't the ones in the wrong...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The two of us... weren't the ones in the wrong...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうだ…わるくない…ない…はず…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's true... we weren't in the wrong... we weren't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's true... we weren't in the wrong... we weren't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 否定の口調は弱まっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: The denial in her tone softened.
MESSAGE.Translation: The denial in her tone softened.

MESSAGE.JP: ――葉留佳さんはとっくにわかっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ――Haruka-san had already understood it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――Haruka-san had already understood it.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女を憎んでも何にもならないということ。
MESSAGE.EN: That her hatred of that girl was misguided.
MESSAGE.Translation: That her hatred of that girl was misguided.

MESSAGE.JP: つまり――彼女が『本当』に悪いとは言い切れないことに。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words―― she couldn't honestly convince herself that Futaki-san was ❛truly❜ a bad person.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words―― she couldn't honestly convince herself that Futaki-san was ❛truly❜ a bad person.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ちがう…ちがう。『私は』悪くない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...No... no. ❛I'm❜ not bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...No... no. ❛I'm❜ not bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「『私は』悪くない…あいつが…あいつが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝❛I'm❜ not bad... she is... she is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝❛I'm❜ not bad... she is... she is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あいつが悪いんだよ…そうだよ…そうじゃなきゃダメなんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She's the bad one... she has to be... if she isn't, then everything is wrong...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She's the bad one... she has to be... if she isn't, then everything is wrong...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「う、うう…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ng, ghh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ng, ghh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 唇を噛みしめながら、葉留佳さんは耐えている。
MESSAGE.EN: Biting her lips, Haruka-san tried to endure it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Biting her lips, Haruka-san tried to endure it.

MESSAGE.JP: 何に？
MESSAGE.EN: Endure what?
MESSAGE.Translation: Endure what?

MESSAGE.JP: ――痛みだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ――The pain.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――The pain.

MESSAGE.JP: 認められない事実。
MESSAGE.EN: Of a truth she couldn't accept.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of a truth she couldn't accept.

MESSAGE.JP: 認めたくない事実。
MESSAGE.EN: Of a truth she refused to accept.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of a truth she refused to accept.

MESSAGE.JP: 自分自身の暗い感情と、それに反するものに焦がされているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was like she was being burned by the truth that had pierced her own dark feelings.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was like she was being burned by the truth that had pierced her own dark feelings.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…う、うううううう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Uu, uuuuuu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Uu, uuuuuu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 認められない。
MESSAGE.EN: She couldn't accept it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She couldn't accept it.

MESSAGE.JP: でも認めてしまいそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But she knew she had to.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she knew she had to.

MESSAGE.JP: 自分は悪くない。
MESSAGE.EN: She was not bad.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was not bad.

MESSAGE.JP: 相手が悪い。
MESSAGE.EN: It was her enemy that was the bad one.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was her enemy that was the bad one.

MESSAGE.JP: ――では、その相手って、誰だ？
MESSAGE.EN: ――Then, who exactly was her enemy?
MESSAGE.Translation: ――Then, who exactly was her enemy?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…う、うう、ううう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Uu, uuuu, uuuuu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Uu, uuuu, uuuuu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「う、う…う…ううっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uu, uuu... uu... uuuu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uu, uuu... uu... uuuu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 片割れを憎む。
MESSAGE.EN: She had hated her twin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had hated her twin.

MESSAGE.JP: でも片割れは悪くない。
MESSAGE.EN: But her twin wasn't evil, either.
MESSAGE.Translation: But her twin wasn't evil, either.

MESSAGE.JP: ――じゃあ次は『誰』を憎めばいいのか？
MESSAGE.EN: ――Then ❛who❜ should she hate next?
MESSAGE.Translation: ――Then ❛who❜ should she hate next?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…私も…あいつも悪くなければ…誰が悪者なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...If I'm not... and she's not... then who's the bad one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...If I'm not... and she's not... then who's the bad one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ねぇ…理樹くん…教えてよ…誰が悪者なの？　誰を憎めばいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey... Riki-kun... tell me... Who's the villain? Who can I hate?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey... Riki-kun... tell me... Who's the villain? Who can I hate?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私の敵は誰？　親戚のあいつらを憎めばいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Who is my enemy? Is it alright if I hate my relatives?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Who is my enemy? Is it alright if I hate my relatives?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも親戚のあいつらは私に言ったよ…私が汚れてなければ殴らないって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But my relatives told me... if I hadn't been the ❛dirty❜ one, they wouldn't have hit me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But my relatives told me... if I hadn't been the ❛dirty❜ one, they wouldn't have hit me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あいつらは悪くないって教えられたよ…じゃあ…じゃあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They told me they weren't in the wrong either... then... then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They told me they weren't in the wrong either... then... then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私が、やっぱり、いちばん、わるいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Am I, am I the worst one, after all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Am I, am I the worst one, after all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ…あぁ…私、じゃあ私…私が…私が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A... ahh... I... then I'm... I'm... I'm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A... ahh... I... then I'm... I'm... I'm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は葉留佳さんの肩を掴んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I gripped Haruka-san's shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gripped Haruka-san's shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「違う！　それは違う！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're wrong! That's wrong!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're wrong! That's wrong!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「でも…でも、でも…っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But... but, but...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But... but, but...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「誰が悪いの…！　私でもなかったら、誰が悪いの！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Who is it then...! If it's not me, who's the bad one!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Who is it then...! If it's not me, who's the bad one!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は誰を憎めばいいの！　私はその『誰か』から居場所を取り返さなくちゃいけないのに！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Who can I hate! I need to take that person's place!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Who can I hate! I need to take that person's place!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「返して欲しいんだよぅ…！　私の場所！　私の場所が欲しいの！　私の、私の…っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I want to take their place...! My place! I want a place for myself! For me, mine...!!❞
