MESSAGE.EN: She had made up her mind that she was going to do it on ❝this day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She had made up her mind that she was going to do it on ❝this day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「買いすぎたかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Maybe we bought too much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Maybe we bought too much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「作りすぎるぐらいが葉留佳さんらしくていいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It'd be just like you to make too much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It'd be just like you to make too much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「むぅ、それはどういう意味ですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, what's that supposed to mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, what's that supposed to mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「言葉どおりだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just what I said.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just what I said.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ぷー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Pfft.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Pfft.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ん、まぁそうかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Ahah, maybe you're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Ahah, maybe you're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 買い物が終わったので、葉留佳さんの…いや、ふたりの家に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: We were done shopping so we headed for Haruka-san's... no, ❝their❞ house.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were done shopping so we headed for Haruka-san's... no, ❝their❞ house.

MESSAGE.JP: ――今日は、葉留佳さんが『かぞくのひと』に初めて提案した日。
MESSAGE.EN: Today was the first time Haruka-san had proposed a ❝family photo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Today was the first time Haruka-san had proposed a ❝family photo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『アルバムの一枚目を撮りたい』。
MESSAGE.EN: ❝I want to take the first photo for the album.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝I want to take the first photo for the album.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんも、親たちも、素直に賛成してくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san and their parents had readily agreed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san and their parents had readily agreed.

MESSAGE.JP: それが葉留佳さんには嬉しかったのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That probably made Haruka-san happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: That probably made Haruka-san happy.

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱりはしゃいでいるな、と僕は微笑ましく思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I was glad that she was in high spirits.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was glad that she was in high spirits.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、撮るよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, you guys ready...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, you guys ready...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、葉留佳さん、なんでこっちいるのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Haruka-san, why are you beside me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Haruka-san, why are you beside me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahaha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahaha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんか照れくさいじゃん、こういうの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's a little embarrassing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's a little embarrassing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「全く誰なんだろうね、こんなコトをしようとゆったのは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sheesh, whose idea was this, anyway?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sheesh, whose idea was this, anyway?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「…あなたでしょうが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...I believe it was yours...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...I believe it was yours...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ひっ！　い、いたひっ！　みみ、みみー、耳ちぎれるーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hii! Oww! My ear, my ear-, it's gonna tear!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hii! Oww! My ear, my ear-, it's gonna tear!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ちぎれるわけないでしょ、こっち来なさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Of course it isn't, get over here!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Of course it isn't, get over here!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は苦笑した。
MESSAGE.EN: I smiled wryly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I smiled wryly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほら、葉留佳さん。撮るから大人しくしててよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Here, Haruka-san. I'm taking the picture now, so sit still.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Here, Haruka-san. I'm taking the picture now, so sit still.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 騒いでいる姉妹を、三人の大人たちが見守っている。
MESSAGE.EN: The three adults behind the arguing twins stood still.
MESSAGE.Translation: The three adults behind the arguing twins stood still.

MESSAGE.JP: 一人は、感慨深げに微笑みながら。
MESSAGE.EN: One was smiling, deeply moved.
MESSAGE.Translation: One was smiling, deeply moved.

MESSAGE.JP: 一人は、安堵した表情で。
MESSAGE.EN: One had a relieved expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: One had a relieved expression.

MESSAGE.JP: 最後の一人は少し離れた場所に立っている。
MESSAGE.EN: And the last one was standing a little apart from the rest.
MESSAGE.Translation: And the last one was standing a little apart from the rest.

MESSAGE.JP: …けれどその横顔は嬉しさを隠せていない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But that gruff profile couldn't conceal his joy.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But that gruff profile couldn't conceal his joy.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いくよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Here we go―.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Here we go―.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう、結局これは始まりにしか過ぎない。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right, this was just the beginning.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right, this was just the beginning.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰にとっても――問題を解決したところから、物語は始まる。
MESSAGE.EN: For everyone―― rather than the end of a story, this was only the beginning.
MESSAGE.Translation: For everyone―― rather than the end of a story, this was only the beginning.

MESSAGE.JP: これから先のことを思えば、笑っていられないことだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: From hereafter, thinking about the past will erase the smiles from their faces.
MESSAGE.Translation: From hereafter, thinking about the past will erase the smiles from their faces.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも――。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so――
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so――

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、すれ違い続けた姉妹が。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, those sisters who were always passing by each other...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, those sisters who were always passing by each other...

MESSAGE.JP: 望まぬまま憎み合いいがみ合っていた姉妹が、仲直りできたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Those sisters who hated each other and constantly argued without wanting to, finally made up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those sisters who hated each other and constantly argued without wanting to, finally made up.

MESSAGE.JP: 最初のスタート地点。
MESSAGE.EN: This was the starting line.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was the starting line.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは、そこに立つことを決意して…今、立っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san had been determined to stand there, and now she was.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san had been determined to stand there, and now she was.

MESSAGE.JP: そのことを祝福してあげようと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to congratulate her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to congratulate her.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「何、葉留佳。引っ張らないでよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝What, Haruka. Don't tug.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝What, Haruka. Don't tug.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ねぇねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, hey.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, hey.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「だから、何っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahaha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahaha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えいっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「っきゃぁっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Kyaaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Kyaaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「撮って、撮ってー、理樹くんー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Take it, take it, Riki-kun-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Take it, take it, Riki-kun-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佳奈多@「ちょ、ちょっと、こんな、何抱きついてるのっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝W, wait, hey, why are you clinging to me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝W, wait, hey, why are you clinging to me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ぶれちゃうよ、葉留佳さん。いいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's gonna blur, Haruka-san. Is that fine?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's gonna blur, Haruka-san. Is that fine?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いいの、いいの！　はい、チーズ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Fine fine! Alright, cheese!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Fine fine! Alright, cheese!❞

MESSAGE.JP: カシャリ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Click*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Click*.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はデジカメのボタンを押した。
MESSAGE.EN: I pressed the button on the digital camera.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pressed the button on the digital camera.

MESSAGE.JP: 撮影音が、スタートラインに立った姉妹を祝うように、軽やかに鳴った。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of the picture being taken was like a voice of congratulation for the twin sisters who had finally, side by side, reached their starting line.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of the picture being taken was like a voice of congratulation for the twin sisters who had finally, side by side, reached their starting line.

SELECT.JP: いいと思う$dダメだと思う
SELECT.EN: That's a good idea$dIt's a bad idea
SELECT.Translation: That's a good idea$dIt's a bad idea

SELECT.JP: マーマレードとか$dブルーベリーとか
SELECT.EN: Maybe some marmalade$dMaybe some blueberry jam
SELECT.Translation: Maybe some marmalade$dMaybe some blueberry jam

SELECT.JP: 条件をのむ$d条件をのまない
